tika-s0501t0:6_0: Yena yā racitā netti, yena sā anumoditā;
tika-s0501t0:23_0: Tattha yassa sikkhattayasaṅgahassa navaṅgassa satthusāsanavarassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ yaṃ nettippakaraṇaṃ kātukāmo,
tika-s0501t0:23_2: saṃvaṇṇetabbaṃ eva vā salokapālena tilokena sadā pūjetabbassa ceva namassitabbassa ca naruttamassa satthuno sāsanavaraṃ vidūheva ñātabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:24_0: “Yaṃ loko pūjayate, salokapālo sadā namassati ca;
tika-s0501t0:25_0: Tasseta sāsanavaraṃ, vidūhi ñeyyaṃ naravarassā”ti. – paṭhamagāthamāha;
tika-s0501t0:26_0: Imāya hi paṭhamagāthāya “etaṃ sāsanavaraṃ ñeyya”nti ettakameva ekantato karaṇavisesabhāvena adhippetaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:26_2: Ekantādhippetasāsanavarameva nettisaṃvaṇṇanāya saṃvaṇṇetabbattā visayaṃ teneva vakkhati aṭṭhakathācariyo –
tika-s0501t0:27_1: varaṃ aggaṃ uttamaṃ nipuṇañāṇagocaratāya paṇḍitavedanīyamevā”ti ca,
tika-s0501t0:28_0: “Etaṃ tividhampi ‘sāsanavara’nti padena saṅgaṇhitvā tattha yaṃ paṭhamaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:28_2: attano pakaraṇassa ca visayabhūtaṃ pariyattisāsanamevā”ti ca,
tika-s0501t0:29_1: tattha nettisaṃvaṇṇanāya visayabhūtaṃ pariyattidhammameva pakārantarena niyametvā dassetu”nti ca.
tika-s0501t0:30_1: Etena kammasādhanenapi adhippetatthe siddhe nānāvidhasādhakavacanaṃ nānāvādānaṃ anokāsakaraṇatthāya kataṃ.
tika-s0501t0:30_2: Svākkhātatādidhammaguṇā pana sāsanassa visesadesakanaravarasaddena vā paridīpakatthabhāvena vā dīpitā avinābhāvato.
tika-s0501t0:30_4: Tena ca aggapuggalo sāsanavarajanako vācakatthasambandhibhāvena vutto.
tika-s0501t0:30_5: Anaññasādhāraṇamahākaruṇāsabbaññutaññāṇādiguṇavisesā pana janakasambandhibhūtassa narassa visesakenavarasaddena vā paridīpakatthabhāvena vā dīpito.
tika-s0501t0:31_0: Kiṃ nu so sāsanavarajanako naravaro paramatthova,
tika-s0501t0:31_1: udāhu pūjanīyo ceva namassanīyo cāti vuttaṃ “yaṃ loko…pe…
tika-s0501t0:31_3: tena sāsanavarajanako naravaro paramatthova na hoti,
tika-s0501t0:31_4: atha kho salokapālena lokena sadā sabbakālesu pūjanīyo ceva namassanīyo cāti visesito thomitoti.
tika-s0501t0:32_0: Ettha ca pūjananamassanacetanāvācakena vā pūjananamassanasaddena phalūpacārattho puññamahattasaṅkhāto
tika-s0501t0:33_0: Tādisassa naravarassa tādisaṃ sāsanavaraṃ kiṃ yena kenaci viññeyyanti vuttaṃ “vidūhī”ti.
tika-s0501t0:33_1: Tena tipiṭakadharā ariyabhūtā paṇḍitā vācakatthabhāvena gahitā,
tika-s0501t0:33_2: suppaṭipannatādisaṅghaguṇā pana vandadhātuvacanena vā dīpakatthabhāvena vā dīpitāti.
tika-s0501t0:33_3: Evaṃ pariggahetvā dīpite ratanattayaguṇe sandhāya “evaṃ paṭhamagāthāya sātisayaṃ ratanattayaguṇaparidīpanaṃ katvā”ti vakkhati,
tika-s0501t0:33_5: Tattha evanti evaṃ sāsanavaradassanabhūtāya paṭhamagāthāyāti atthova daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0501t0:33_6: Apare panācariyā “imāya paṭhamagāthāya ekantato adhippetānādhippetavacanāni ceva vācakatthadīpakatthavisesāni
tika-s0501t0:33_7: ca suṭṭhu avicāretvā ‘evaṃ paṭhamagāthāya sātisayaṃ ratanattayaguṇaparidīpanaṃ katvā’ti vacanacchāyaṃ
tika-s0501t0:33_8: nissāya sātisayaṃ ratanattayaguṇaparidīpanaṃ kātuṃ ‘yaṃ lokotyādimāhā’ti ca sātisayaratanattayaguṇe dassento
tika-s0501t0:33_11: Kāraṇaṃ pana mayā heṭṭhā vuttānusārena ñātabbanti ayaṃ padānukkamānurūpānusandhyattho.
tika-s0501t0:34_0: Atha vā ekaṃ samayaṃ jambuvanasaṇḍe nisīditvā sissānaṃ hitaṃ cintento,
tika-s0501t0:34_3: mahākaccāyano satthārā anumoditaṃ sāsanāyattaṃ navaṅgassatthavaṇṇanaṃ soḷasahārādianekatthavidhaṃ nettippakaraṇaṃ ārabhanto,
tika-s0501t0:34_5: Yadi evaṃ yathāvuttappakāraṃ nettippakaraṇabhūtaṃ soḷasahārātyādikaṃ ārabhitabbaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:34_6: taṃ anārabhitvā kasmā nettippakaraṇato bahibhūtaṃ “yaṃ loko”tyādikaṃ ārabhitabbaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:34_10: Tathāpi yassa yathāvuttassa sāsanavarassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ yaṃ nettippakaraṇaṃ kātukāmo yassa nettippakaraṇassa visayabhūtaṃ saṃvaṇṇetabbasahitaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:34_11: saṃvaṇṇetabbaṃ eva vā taṃ sāsanavaraṃ tāva dassento taṃjanakena,
tika-s0501t0:35_0: “Yaṃ loko pūjayate, salokapālo sadā namassati ca;
tika-s0501t0:37_0: Niggahitalopaṃ katvā racitā gāthā ariyāsāmaññalakkhaṇena sampannā. Kathaṃ?
tika-s0501t0:38_1: Salokapālo sabbo sattaloko sakkaccaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇādianekaguṇānussaraṇena vā pūjetabbapūjanena vā paṭipattipūjanena
tika-s0501t0:38_2: vā sadā sabbakālesu sakkaccaṃ yaṃ naravaraṃ pūjayate ceva namassati ca,
tika-s0501t0:38_3: tassa pūjetabbassa ceva namassitabbassa ca satthuno naravarassa tilokaggassa mayā saṃvaṇṇetabbasahitaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:38_4: saṃvaṇṇetabbaṃ eva vā vidūheva ñeyyaṃ ñātabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:38_5: Nipuṇañāṇagocaraṃ etaṃ mayā buddhiyaṃ ṭhapitaṃ sāsanavaraṃ mayā ārabhitabbassa nettippakaraṇassa visayanti
tika-s0501t0:38_6: paṭhamaṃ jānitabbaṃ dassetvā tassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanābhūtaṃ nettippakaraṇaṃ ahaṃ ārabhissāmi,
tika-s0501t0:38_7: taṃ tumhe sādhavo suṇātha manasi karothāti samudāyayojanā,
tika-s0501t0:39_2: Lokapālo vajjetvā avaseso loko ca na hoti,
tika-s0501t0:39_4: “Loko pūjayate ceva namassati cā”ti kattukārakaākhyātakiriyābhāvena yojanā “yo karoti,
tika-s0501t0:39_8: Yo loko pūjayate ceva namassati ca,
tika-s0501t0:39_11: sa kattā”ti suttassa “yo karoti kiriyaṃ nipphādeti,
tika-s0501t0:39_12: so kiriyānipphādako kattā”ti atthasambhavato sayanabhuñjanādisabbakiriyānipphādako kattāyeva hoti.
tika-s0501t0:39_15: “Loko”ti sattapaññattiyā paramatthato avijjamānāyapi paññāpetabbo santāne pavattamāno hadayavatthunissito cittuppādo gahetabbo,
tika-s0501t0:39_16: so yathārahaṃ hetādhipatisahajātādipaccayena paccayo nipphādako bhave.
tika-s0501t0:39_17: Evaṃ lokassa kattukārakabhāvo vijānitabboti paccayapaccayuppannabhāvena yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:39_18: Esa nayo tīsu piṭakesupi evarūpesu ṭhānesu.
tika-s0501t0:40_0: “Yaṃ naravaraṃ pūjayate ceva namassati cā”ti kammakārakaākhyātakiriyābhāvena yojanā “yaṃ karoti,
tika-s0501t0:40_7: taṃ kamma”nti suttassa “yaṃ karoti kiriyāya sambajjhati,
tika-s0501t0:40_8: kiriyāya sambajjhitabbaṃ kamma”nti atthasambhavato karaṇavācakavacanīyādisabbakiriyāya sambajjhitabbaṃ kammaṃ hotveva.
tika-s0501t0:40_14: “Yaṃ naravara”nti paññattiyā paramatthato avijjamānāyapi paññāpetabbo santānavasena pavattamāno lokiyalokuttaraguṇasahito khandhapañcako vutto,
tika-s0501t0:40_17: Esa nayo tīsu piṭakesu evarūpesu ṭhānesu.
tika-s0501t0:41_2: atha kho pūjetabbo namassitabbo evāti viseseti.
tika-s0501t0:41_3: Tassa pūjetabbassa ceva namassitabbassa ca naravarassa sāsanavaranti jaññajanakabhāvena yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:41_4: Sāsanavaraṃ nāma paccekabuddhasāvakabuddharājarājādīnaṃ sāsanavaraṃ na hoti,
tika-s0501t0:41_5: pūjetabbassa ceva namassitabbassa ca naravarassa tilokasseva sāsanavaranti niyameti.
tika-s0501t0:42_2: “Vidūhī”ti sattapaññattiyā paramatthato avijjamānāyapi paññāpetabbo santāne pavattamāno sāsanavare sammohadhaṃsakañāṇasahito
tika-s0501t0:42_4: so yathārahaṃ hetādhipatisahajātādipaccayena paccayo nipphādako bhave. Ñā-
tika-s0501t0:42_5: itidhātuyā atthabhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ paccayuppannaṃ nipphādeyyaṃ bhave,
tika-s0501t0:43_1: Sāsanavaraṃ nāma na yena kenaci ñeyyaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:43_2: atha kho vidūheva saṇhasukhumañāṇena ñeyyaṃ sāsanavaranti viseseti.
tika-s0501t0:44_1: Sāsanavaraṃ nāma mayā buddhiyaṃ aṭṭhapitaṃ appavattetabbaṃ hoti,
tika-s0501t0:44_2: mayā idāni nettippakaraṇassa visayabhāvena buddhiyaṃ viparivattamānaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ pavattetabbaṃ sāsanavaranti viseseti.
tika-s0501t0:44_3: Etaṃ sāsanavaraṃ nettippakaraṇassa visayanti yojanā kātabbā.
tika-s0501t0:44_5: Iccevaṃ nettiyā paṭhamagāthāya saṅkhepena yojanattho samatto.
tika-s0501t0:45_0: Tattha yanti aniyamanaravarassa satthuno vācakaṃ payogavantasabbanāmaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:45_5: tabbipāko cāti loko.Ettha sattanikāye puññāpuññāni lokiyanti pavattanti,
tika-s0501t0:45_8: tabbipākassa ca pavattanassa ādhārabhāvato “etthā”tipadena niddiṭṭho sattanikāyo lokonāma.
tika-s0501t0:46_1: puññāpuññānañceva tabbipākassa ca pavattanādhārattā lokā ca. Ke te?
tika-s0501t0:46_7: Atha vā ye hirottappā lokaṃ pālenti,
tika-s0501t0:46_12: Lokapālehi hirottappehi samannāgato loko salokapālo nāma.
tika-s0501t0:46_13: Hirottappasampanno hi sappuriso loko sakkaccaṃ sadā sabbakālesu pūjayati ceva namassati ca pāpahirijigucchanato,
tika-s0501t0:47_0: Aññe pana pūjentā namassantāpi kadāciyeva pūjenti namassanti,
tika-s0501t0:47_6: Tassetāti ettha tassāti niyamavācakaṃ payogavantasabbanāmaṃ viggahavirahitameva.
tika-s0501t0:47_8: Tasmā tassa pūjananamassanakiriyāya niyamitabbassa pūjetabbassa namassitabbassa naravarassāti attho yuttova.
tika-s0501t0:48_2: navavidhasuttantasahitena vā varena sabbena samatthe veneyye diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi tividhayānamukhena
tika-s0501t0:48_4: Iti sāsanānusāsanakiriyānusārena veneyyasattānaṃ jānanapaṭipajjanādhigamassa kāraṇakaraṇattā “etenā”ti padena niddiṭṭhaṃ navavidhasuttantaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:48_5: navavidhasuttantasahitaṃ vā varaṃ sabbaṃ sāsanaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:48_6: Navavidhasuttantadesanāya hi veneyyānaṃ jānanaṃ purimajānanena pacchimajānanaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:48_9: Tena vuttaṃ “saddhā sīlaṃ sutaṃ cāgo paññā saddhāya sīlassa sutassa cāgassa paññāyā”ti ca “paṭhamassa
tika-s0501t0:48_11: Sāsadhātuyā desanāsaddo ca taṃjanako desanāñāṇasampayuttacittuppādo ca mukhyattho,
tika-s0501t0:48_13: “etenā”ti padena vuttāya sāsanabhūtāya nāmapaññattiyā karaṇasattisaṅkhātā upanissayapaccayasatti phalūpacārattho. Iti-
tika-s0501t0:48_14: saddopi tameva nāmapaññattiyā upanissayapaccayasattiṃ hetubhāvena parāmasati,
tika-s0501t0:48_17: Eseva nayo tīsu piṭakesu evarūpesu ṭhānesu.
tika-s0501t0:49_4: sāvakādīhi ajaniyattā asādhāraṇaṭṭhena ca uttamaṭṭhena varaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:49_6: Yathāvuttassa sāsanassa paṇḍitehi abhipatthitasamiddhihetutāya varitabbattā patthetabbattā sāsanavaraṃ nāma,
tika-s0501t0:49_7: yathāvuttaṭṭhena vā sāsanañca taṃ varañcāti sāsanavaraṃ. Ca-
tika-s0501t0:50_3: iti vidanato te paṇḍitā vidū nāma, tehi.
tika-s0501t0:50_9: saddena parāmasitabbassa ārammaṇapaccayabhāvassa ādhāraṃ sāsanavaraṃ ṇya-
tika-s0501t0:50_12: vidūnaṃ ñāṇaṃ jānanaṃ ārammaṇabhāvena arahatīti attho.
tika-s0501t0:51_1: Yo puriso attānaṃ itthīnaṃ uccaṭṭhānaṃ narati neti,
tika-s0501t0:51_2: iti naranato nayanato so puriso naro nāma.
tika-s0501t0:51_3: So hi puttabhūtopi mātuyā pituṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0501t0:51_6: So hi jātakālato paṭṭhāya yāva attano sabhāvena attānaṃ dhāretuṃ samattho na hoti,
tika-s0501t0:51_9: Ettha pana satthuvisayatāya narati veneyyasatteti naroti attho adhippeto.
tika-s0501t0:51_10: Satthā hi satte apāyādito sugatiṃ vā maggaphalanibbānaṃ vā netīti.
tika-s0501t0:51_14: Pakatiyā uccaṭṭhānaṭṭho naro guṇuttamena samannāgato varo,
tika-s0501t0:51_15: naro ca so varo cāti naravaro. Ca- ta-
tika-s0501t0:51_21: taṃ vacanaṃ “aggapuggalassāti attho”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanena virujjhati maññe.
tika-s0501t0:51_23: Iccevaṃ nettippakaraṇassa ādigāthāya samāsena ca vacanattho samatto.
tika-s0501t0:52_1: Tathāpi visuṃ suṭṭhu jānanatthāya puna vattabbo.
tika-s0501t0:52_5: Lokasaddo ekavacanayuttopi jātisaddattā niravasesato satte saṅgaṇhāti yathā “mahājano”ti.
tika-s0501t0:53_0: Pūjayateti ettha pūjanakiriyāya mukhyato pūjanasaṅkhāto pūjentānaṃ cittuppādo sarūpattho,
tika-s0501t0:53_1: phalūpacārena taṃcittuppādassa ārammaṇapakatūpanissayabhūtā vuttappakārā sabbe buddhaguṇā sarūpatthā. Te-
tika-s0501t0:53_2: vibhattipaccayassa pūjanakiriyāsādhako vuttappakāro loko ca sarūpattho,
tika-s0501t0:53_3: evaṃ sati atthabhedābhāvato dvīsu vācakesu ekova vācako vattabbo,
tika-s0501t0:53_4: kasmā ekasmiṃ atthe dve vācakā vuttāti?
tika-s0501t0:53_7: aññakiriyāsādhako ca vadatīti sāmaññavācako ca hoti. Pūjayate-
tika-s0501t0:53_14: Tīsu piṭakesu aññesupi evarūpesu ṭhānesu eseva nayo.
tika-s0501t0:54_2: “Sadā”ti padassa rattidivasakālo atītabhagavato dharamānakālo tato parakālo abhinīhārato yāva sāsanantaradhānā kālo tato parakālo sarūpattho.
tika-s0501t0:54_3: So pana anāgatabuddhuppajjanakālo atītasammāsambuddhe idāni pūjayanti namassanti viya pūjayissati ceva namassissati ca.
tika-s0501t0:54_4: Namassatīti ettha namassanakiriyāya mukhyato namassanasaṅkhāto cittuppādo sarūpattho,
tika-s0501t0:54_5: phalūpacārena taṃcittuppādassa ārammaṇapakatūpanissayabhūtā vuttappakārā sabbe buddhaguṇā sarūpattho. Ti-
tika-s0501t0:54_6: vibhattipaccayassa namassanakiriyāsādhako yathāvuttasattanikāyo loko ca sarūpattho,
tika-s0501t0:54_7: atthabhedābhāvepi dvinnaṃ vācakānaṃ pavattabhāvo heṭṭhā vuttova.
tika-s0501t0:54_10: ayaṃ pana sattanikāyo loko pūjayati ceva namassati cāti samuccayattho sarūpattho.
tika-s0501t0:55_1: saddassa sabbaññutaññāṇādianekaguṇasamannāgato pūjetabbo namassitabbo tilokaggo satthā sarūpattho,
tika-s0501t0:55_2: chaṭṭhīvibhattiyā janakassa naravarassa jaññena sāsanavarena sambandho padhānasarūpattho,
tika-s0501t0:55_4: Tīsu piṭakesu evarūpesu aññesupi eseva nayo.
tika-s0501t0:56_2: etaṃ sāsanavaraṃ pariyattipaṭipattipaṭivedhabhedena tividhampi pariyattisāsanameva sabbasāsanamūlabhūtattā,
tika-s0501t0:56_3: nettippakaraṇassa visayabhūtattā ca visesato adhippetaṃ tassa mūlabhūtabhāvato vinayasaṃvaṇṇanādīsu bahūpakārena dassitoti amhehi na vattabbo.
tika-s0501t0:56_4: Vadantopi aññaṃ racitabbaṃ racituṃ asamatthova hutvā vadatīti gahitabbo vadeyya.
tika-s0501t0:57_25: Tassa visayabhāve sati paṭipattipaṭivedhasaṅkhātaṃ sāsanadvayampi tammūlakattā visayaṃ hoti pariyāyatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:58_2: “Ñeyya”nti padassa tādisehi vidūhi saṇhasukhumañāṇādinā vijānitabbaṃ sāsanavaraṃ sarūpattho.
tika-s0501t0:58_3: “Naravarassā”ti padassa ekavidhādibhedassa sāsanavarassa janako anekaguṇasampanno tilokaggo sarūpattho.
tika-s0501t0:58_4: Iccevaṃ nettiyā ādigāthāya sarūpattho saṅkhepena vijānitabbo.
tika-s0501t0:59_0: Evaṃ tassā anusandhyādīnaṃ jānitabbabhāve satipi ajānanto viya pucchitvā dosaṃ āropetvā parihāravasenāpi
tika-s0501t0:59_2: Tasmā pucchitvā dosaṃ ropetvā parihāravasena gambhīrādhippāyaṃ sampiṇḍetvā kathayissaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:59_5: Evaṃ sati nettippakaraṇabhūtaṃ “soḷasahārā netti”tyādikaṃ eva vattabbaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:59_6: kasmā taṃ avatvā tato nettippakaraṇato aññaṃ “yaṃ loko pūjayate”tyādimāha.
tika-s0501t0:59_9: evameva nettippakaraṇaṃ karonto sāsanavaradassanaṃ karotīti? Saccaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:59_10: tathāpi yassa saṃvaṇṇanaṃ nettippakaraṇaṃ kātukāmo taṃ sāsanavaraṃ paṭhamaṃ dassetuṃ “yaṃ loko”tyādimāha.
tika-s0501t0:59_13: Taṃ sāsanavaraṃ janakena naravarena niyametvā thometuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:59_16: Taṃ janakaṃ naravaraṃ lokapālena lokaseṭṭhena saddhiṃ sabbena lokena pūjanīyanamassanīyabhāvena thometuṃ “yaṃ loko”tyādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:59_19: Tathāpi keci kesañci pūjāsakkārādīni karontāpi tesaṃ apākaṭaguṇatāya namakkāraṃ na karonti.
tika-s0501t0:59_20: Evaṃ bhagavato yathābhūtaabbhuggatasaddatāya pana bhagavantaṃ pūjetvāpi vandatiyevāti dassetuṃ “namassati cā”ti vuttaṃ. Pūjento,
tika-s0501t0:59_23: Tādisassa naravarassa tādisaṃ sāsanavaraṃ saṇhasukhumañāṇasampannehi vidūheva sukhumañāṇeneva ñeyyanti sāsanavaraṃ thometuṃ “vidūhi ñeyya”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:60_1: namassatī”ti etehi pūjananamassanakiriyāya hetubhūtā sabbaññutaññāṇādayo aneke lokiyalokuttaraguṇā pakāsitā
tika-s0501t0:60_2: honti te guṇe āgamma sabbalokassa pūjananamassanacetanāya pavattanato.
tika-s0501t0:60_17: dhammādhipatitā ca lokanāthaattanāthatā ca pubbakārikataññutā ca aparantapatā,
tika-s0501t0:60_18: anattantapatā ca buddhakaraṇadhammabuddhabhāvasiddhi ca paratāraṇaattatāraṇañca sattānuggahacittatā,
tika-s0501t0:60_21: Tena pūjanakanamassanakānaṃ yathicchitabbapayojanasampatti pakāsitāti sabbaguṇā pakāsitāti.
tika-s0501t0:61_2: tasmā “varaṃ ñeyya”nti vacanehi svākkhātatādayo sabbe dhammaguṇā pakāsitā.
tika-s0501t0:61_8: Tasmā ye suppaṭipannatādayo anekehi suttapadehi saṃvaṇṇitā,
tika-s0501t0:61_10: Evaṃ nettiyā paṭhamagāthāya “etaṃ sāsanavara”nti padena sāsanattayaṃ saṅgaṇhitvā tattha itaresaṃ dvinnaṃ adhigamūpāyabhāvato sabbasāsanamūlabhūtassa,
tika-s0501t0:61_11: attano nettippakaraṇassa ca visayabhūtassa pariyattisāsanavarassa dassanamukhena sabbe ratanattayaguṇāpi thomanāvasena nayatova pakāsitā honti.
tika-s0501t0:61_12: Nayato hi dassitā sabbe guṇā niravasesā gahitā bhavanti,
tika-s0501t0:61_14: Tenāha bhagavantaṃ ṭhapetvā paññavantānaṃ aggabhūto dhammasenāpatisāriputtattheropi buddhaguṇaparicchedanamanuyutto
tika-s0501t0:64_2: Amhākaṃ pana yāvajīvaṃ ratanattayaguṇaparidīpane atiussāhantānampi sarūpato nīharitvā dassetuṃ asamatthabhāvo pageva paṇḍitehi veditabboti.
tika-s0501t0:66_0: “Yaṃ loko pūjayate, salokapālo sadā namassati ca;
tika-s0501t0:68_0: Niggahitalopavasena vuttāya gāthāya saṅkhepena kathito anusandhyādiko samattoti.
tika-s0501t0:69_0: “Yaṃ loko pūjayate, sa lokapālo sadā namassati ca;
tika-s0501t0:70_0: Taṃ tassa sāsanavaraṃ, vidūhi ñeyyaṃ naravarassā”ti. –
tika-s0501t0:71_3: Tattha hi salokapālo loko yassa satthuno naravarassa yaṃ sāsanavaraṃ saṃvaṇṇetabbasahitaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:71_4: saṃvaṇṇetabbaṃ eva vā pūjayate ceva namassati ca,
tika-s0501t0:71_7: etaṃ sāsanavaraṃ nettippakaraṇassa visayanti gahetabbanti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:72_3: Tehi lokapālehi sahitaṃ sabbalokaṃ pāleti lokagganāyakattāti lokapāloti bhagavāpi lokapālasaddena vutto.
tika-s0501t0:72_6: tasmā tassa lokapālassa satthuno naravarassāti attho gahito.
tika-s0501t0:72_7: Yadi evaṃ lokapālo guṇībhūto apadhāno padhānabhūtaṃ lokaṃ visesetvā vinivatto,
tika-s0501t0:72_10: Lokavisesako samānopi sāsanavarāpekkhatāya janakasāmibhāvena sambandhivisesabhūtattā padhānabhūto viya parāmasīyatīti.
tika-s0501t0:72_12: Kathaṃ sāsanavarassa sāmī bhagavā sāsanavaraṃ pūjayatīti?
tika-s0501t0:72_17: tameva dhammaṃ sakkatvā garuṃ katvā mānetvā pūjetvā upanissāya vihareyya”nti vutto,
tika-s0501t0:72_18: tasmā lokapālo bhagavā sāsanavaraṃ pūjayatīti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0501t0:72_19: Evaṃ sati lokapālo bhagavā sāsanavaraṃ pūjayatīti attho yutto hotu,
tika-s0501t0:72_20: kathaṃ lokapālo bhagavā sāsanavaraṃ namassatīti yuttoti?
tika-s0501t0:72_21: Yuttova “namassatī”ti padassa garukaraṇena tanninnapoṇapabbhāroti atthassāpi labbhanato.
tika-s0501t0:72_22: Bhagavā hi dhammagarutāya sabbakālaṃ dhammaninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvena viharatīti.
tika-s0501t0:72_24: Sesamettha heṭṭhā vuttanayena vā saṃvaṇṇanāsu vuttanayena vā ñātabbanti amhehi na vitthārīyati.
tika-s0501t0:73_0: Evaṃ paṭhamagāthāya “sāsanavara”nti padena tividhampi sāsanaṃ saṅgaṇhitvā tattha pariyattisāsanameva
tika-s0501t0:73_1: attano nettippakaraṇassa visayaṃ niyametvā dassento “dvādasa padāni”tyādimāha.
tika-s0501t0:73_2: Atha vā paṭhamagāthāya ratanattayathomanena saha nettippakaraṇatāvisayaṃ sāsanavaraṃ ācariyena dassitaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:73_4: udāhu pariyattisāsanamevā”ti pucchitabbattā pariyattisāsanabhūtaṃ suttamevāti dassento “dvādasa padāni sutta”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0501t0:73_5: Tattha “sāsanavara”nti sāmaññena vuttampi pariyattisuttameva sāsanavaranti gahetabbanti attho.
tika-s0501t0:73_8: Pabhedato dvādasavidhampi byañjanapadaatthapadato pana duvidhamevāti dassetuṃ “taṃ sabbaṃ byañjanañca attho cā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:73_9: “Tasmiṃ dvaye ekameva sarūpato nettippakaraṇassa visayanti viññeyyaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:73_10: udāhu ubhaya”nti pucchitabbattā ubhayanti dassetuṃ “taṃ viññeyyaṃ ubhaya”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:73_13: taṃ ubhayaṃ sarūpato nettippakaraṇassa visayanti viññeyyanti attho.
tika-s0501t0:73_18: suttaṃ mama nettippakaraṇassa visayaṃ sāsanavaranti ñātabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:74_0: Evaṃ paṭhamagāthāya “sāsanavara”nti vuttassa suttassa pariyattibhāvañceva atthapadabyañjanapadabhāvena
tika-s0501t0:74_1: veditabbattañca dassetvā idāni tassa suttassa pavicayūpāyaṃ nettippakaraṇaṃ padatthavibhāgena dassetuṃ
tika-s0501t0:74_3: Atha vā dutiyagāthāya nettippakaraṇassa visayaṃ sāsanavaraṃ niyametvā dassitaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:74_5: katividhā”ti pucchitabbattā nettināma ettikāti saṅkhepato dassetuṃ “soḷasahārā”tyādimāha.
tika-s0501t0:74_6: Tattha tassa sāsanassa suttassa atthapariyeṭṭhi nettisaṃvaṇṇanā mayā mahākaccāyanena niddiṭṭhā netti
tika-s0501t0:75_1: Veneyyasatte ariyadhammaṃ netīti nettīti evamādi attho saṃvaṇṇanāsu vuttova.
tika-s0501t0:75_7: te hārā suttassa byañjanavicayo vā honti,
tika-s0501t0:75_10: atthavicayo vāti vicāraṇāyaṃ sati “ime imassa vicayo”ti niyametvā dassetuṃ “hārā byañjanavicayo”tiādimāha.
tika-s0501t0:75_12: na atthavicayo soḷasahārānaṃ mūlapadaniddhāraṇaṃ vajjetvā byañjanamukheneva saṃvaṇṇanābhāvato.
tika-s0501t0:75_13: Tayo pana nayā suttassa atthavicayo honti,
tika-s0501t0:76_0: “Taṃ ubhayaṃ sutte saṃvaṇṇanābhāvena kenaci katthaciyeva yojetabbaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:76_1: udāhu sabbathā sabbattha yojita”nti pucchitabbabhāvato taṃ ubhayaṃ sabbattha suttesu sabbathā yojitanti dassetuṃ “ubhayaṃ pariggahīta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:76_2: Hārā ceva nayā ca ubhayaṃ suttassa atthaniddhāraṇavasena parito samantato gahitaṃ sabbathā suttesu yojitanti.
tika-s0501t0:77_0: “Hārādisamudāyabhūtaṃ nettisaṅkhātaṃ suttaṃ kathaṃ saṃvaṇṇetabbaṃ suttaṃ saṃvaṇṇetī”ti vattabbabhāvato vuttaṃ “vuccati suttaṃ yathāsutta”nti.
tika-s0501t0:77_1: Nettisaṅkhātaṃ saṃvaṇṇanāsuttaṃ saṃvaṇṇetabbasuttānurūpaṃ yathā yena yena desanāhārena vā aññena vā saṃvaṇṇetabbaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:77_3: Atha vā “nettisaṅkhātaṃ suttaṃ kittakaṃ saṃvaṇṇetabbaṃ suttaṃ saṃvaṇṇetī”ti vattabbabhāvato vuttaṃ “vuccati suttaṃ yathāsutta”nti.
tika-s0501t0:77_4: Tattha yathāsuttaṃ yaṃ yaṃ suttaṃ bhagavatā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:77_5: taṃ taṃ sabbaṃ suttaṃ nettisaṅkhātaṃ suttaṃ vuccati vadati assādādīnavadassanavasena saṃvaṇṇetīti.
tika-s0501t0:77_6: Tena vuttaṃ “nettinayena hi saṃvaṇṇetuṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ nāma suttaṃ natthī”ti.
tika-s0501t0:78_0: “Yaṃ yaṃ bhagavatā desitaṃ suttaṃ nettisaṃvaṇṇanāya saṃvaṇṇitaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:78_3: Yā ceva desanā pāḷi saṃvaṇṇitā, sā ca,
tika-s0501t0:78_5: tañca ubhayaṃ vimuttāyatanadesanāsīsena paricayaṃ karontehi ekantena viññeyyaṃ ubhayasseva anupādisesaparinibbānapariyosānānaṃ
tika-s0501t0:78_7: “Tassa ubhayassa vijānane sādhetabbe sādhetabbassa vijānanassa hetubhūtā katamā anupubbī”ti pucchitabbabhāvato vuttaṃ “tatrā”tyādi.
tika-s0501t0:78_8: Tattha tatra vijānane sādhetabbe suttādinavaṅgassa sāsanassa atthapariyesanā atthavicāraṇā hāranayānaṃ
tika-s0501t0:78_9: ayaṃ anupubbī vijānanassa sādhetabbassa hetubhūtā anupubbī nāmāti attho.
tika-s0501t0:78_10: Atha vā tassa ubhayassa vijānane sādhetabbe suttādinavaṅgassa sāsanassa atthapariyesanāya atthavicāraṇāya
tika-s0501t0:78_11: ayaṃ anupubbī vijānanassa sādhetabbassa hetubhūtā anupubbī nāmāti.
tika-s0501t0:78_12: Atha vā vakkhamānāya hāranayānupubbiyā navavidhasuttantapariyesanā vijānanassa hetubhūtāti veditabbā.
tika-s0501t0:81_1: Evaṃ saṅgahavārena saṅkhepato dassite hārādayo idāni vibhāgena dassetuṃ “tattha katame soḷasa hārā”tiādidesanā āraddhā.
tika-s0501t0:81_2: Atha vā soḷasahārādisamudāyā netti nāma mayā mahākaccānena niddiṭṭhāti vuttā,
tika-s0501t0:81_3: “katame te soḷasa hārā”ti pucchitabbattā vuttaṃ “tattha soḷasa hārā”tyādi.
tika-s0501t0:81_7: sāmāropano hāroti ime soḷasa hārāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0501t0:82_0: Tattha sabbasādhāraṇattā hārapadassa vacanattho paṭhamaṃ vattabbo.
tika-s0501t0:82_3: Etehi saṃvaṇṇanāvisesehi saṃvaṇṇiyesu suttageyyādīsu aññāṇasaṃsayavipallāsā harīyanti,
tika-s0501t0:82_4: iti aññāṇādiharaṇakāraṇattā “etehī”ti padena niddiṭṭhā saṃvaṇṇanāvisesā hārā nāma, hara-
tika-s0501t0:82_8: tassa upanissayapaccayabhūtānaṃ saṃvaṇṇanāvisesānaṃ upanissayapaccayasatti phalūpacārattho, iti-
tika-s0501t0:83_1: Etāya saṃvaṇṇanāya saṃvaṇṇetabbasuttattho desīyati saṃvaṇṇīyati saṃvaṇṇanānusārena ñāpīyati,
tika-s0501t0:83_2: iti ñāpanakāraṇattā “etāyā”ti padena niddiṭṭhā visesasaṃvaṇṇanā desanā nāma,
tika-s0501t0:83_5: Kiñcāpi aññe hārā desanāpāḷisaṅkhātassa suttassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanābhāvato desanāya sahacārino honti,
tika-s0501t0:83_6: ayaṃ pana hāro yebhuyyena yathārutavaseneva viññāyamānattā pāḷidesanāya saha caratīti vattabbataṃ arahati,
tika-s0501t0:84_2: iti vicāraṇakāraṇattā so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso vicayo nāma.
tika-s0501t0:85_1: Etāya visesasaṃvaṇṇanāya sabbesaṃ hārānaṃ bhūmigocarānaṃ yuttāyutti vicārīyati,
tika-s0501t0:85_2: iti vicāraṇakāraṇattā “etāyā”ti padena niddiṭṭhā visesasaṃvaṇṇanā yutti nāma.
tika-s0501t0:85_6: Sabbahārānaṃ bhūmigocarānaṃ yuttāyuttivicāraṇalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso yutti hāro.
tika-s0501t0:86_0: Padati pavatteti phalaṃ etenāti padaṃ, kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:86_1: Ṭhanti tiṭṭhanti ettha phalāni tadāyattavuttitāyāti ṭhānaṃ, kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:86_4: Sutte āgatadhammānaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ vicārīyati etāyāti padaṭṭhānā,
tika-s0501t0:86_8: tesañca padaṭṭhānānaṃ vicāraṇalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso padaṭṭhāno hāro.
tika-s0501t0:87_0: Sutte avuttāpi samānalakkhaṇā dhammā lakkhīyanti etena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesenāti lakkhaṇo,
tika-s0501t0:87_1: sutte vuttena dhammena samānalakkhaṇānaṃ dhammānaṃ avuttānampi niddhāraṇalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso lakkhaṇo hāro.
tika-s0501t0:88_0: Sutte dassiyamānā nibbacanādayo cattāropi viyūhīyanti vibhāgena sampiṇḍīyanti ettha,
tika-s0501t0:88_3: Nibbacanādhippāyabyañjanānañceva desanānidānassa ca pubbāparena saddhiṃ sandassanalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso catubyūho hāro.
tika-s0501t0:89_3: desanāya gahitadhammānaṃ sabhāgavisabhāgadhammavasena āvaṭṭanalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso āvaṭṭo hāro.
tika-s0501t0:90_3: bhūmito ca vibhajanalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso vibhatti hāro.
tika-s0501t0:91_0: Sutte niddiṭṭhā dhammā paṭipakkhavasena parivattīyanti iminā,
tika-s0501t0:91_2: sutte niddiṭṭhānaṃ dhammānaṃ paṭipakkhato parivattanalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso parivattano hāro.
tika-s0501t0:92_0: Sutte vuttassa ekasseva atthassa vācakaṃ vividhaṃ vacanaṃ ettha saṃvaṇṇanāviseseti vivacanaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:92_2: sutte vutte ekasmiṃ atthe anekapariyāyasaddayojanālakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso vevacano hāro.
tika-s0501t0:93_0: Sutte vuttā atthā pakārehi ñāpīyanti iminā,
tika-s0501t0:93_2: ekekassa dhammassa anekāhi paññattīhi paññāpetabbākāralakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso paññatti hāro.
tika-s0501t0:94_0: Suttāgatā dhammā paṭiccasamuppādādīsu otarīyanti anuppavesīyanti ettha,
tika-s0501t0:94_2: paṭiccasamuppādādimukhehi suttatthassa otaraṇalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso otaraṇo hāro.
tika-s0501t0:95_2: sutte padapadatthapañhārambhānaṃ sodhanalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso sodhano hāro.
tika-s0501t0:96_0: Sāmaññavisesabhūtā dhammā vinā vikappena adhiṭṭhīyanti anuppavattīyanti ettha,
tika-s0501t0:96_2: suttāgatānaṃ dhammānaṃ avikappanavasena sāmaññavisesaniddhāraṇalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso adhiṭṭhāno hāro.
tika-s0501t0:97_0: Yo hetu ceva paccayo ca phalaṃ parikaroti abhisaṅkharoti,
tika-s0501t0:97_1: iti so hetu ceva paccayo ca parikkhāro,
tika-s0501t0:97_2: yo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso taṃ parikkhāraṃ hetuñceva paccayañca ācikkhati,
tika-s0501t0:97_4: Sutte āgatadhammānaṃ parikkhārasaṅkhāte hetupaccaye niddhāretvā saṃvaṇṇanālakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso parikkhāro hāro.
tika-s0501t0:98_3: Bhāvasādhanavasenāpi sabbattha vacanattho vattabboti tassāpi vasena yojetabbanti.
tika-s0501t0:99_0: “Tattha katame soḷasa hārā desanā”tyādinā hārasarūpaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:99_2: Anugītigāthāya sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ puna “tassānugīti desanā vicayo yutti”tyādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:99_7: Atthato asaṃkiṇṇāti desanādipadatthato lakkhaṇatthato saṅkarato rahitā.
tika-s0501t0:99_8: Tena vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “so ca nesaṃ asaṅkaro lakkhaṇaniddese supākaṭo hotī”ti.
tika-s0501t0:99_10: “Keci hārā kehici hārehi saṃkiṇṇā viya dissanti,
tika-s0501t0:99_12: Tattha etesañceva bhavatīti etesaṃ soḷasannaṃ hārānaṃ yathā yenākārena asaṅkaro hoti,
tika-s0501t0:99_19: na pañcanayavibhattāhārānaṃ vitthārena pavattā ñāyavibhatti tathā asaṅkarākārena bhavati tasmiṃ asaṃkiṇṇāti ñātabbāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0501t0:100_3: “katame pañca nayā”ti vattabbabhāvato tathā pucchitvā sarūpato uddisituṃ “tattha katame pañca nayā”tyādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:100_4: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “evaṃ hāre uddisitvā idāni naye uddisituṃ ‘tattha katame’tiādi vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:100_8: etehi vāti nayā”tiādinā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vitthārena vacanattho vutto. Nī-
tika-s0501t0:100_10: vodāne ca ālambitvā pavatto ñāṇasampayuttacittuppādo mukhyattho,
tika-s0501t0:101_1: samathavipassanāhi vodānapakkhassa suttassa catusaccayojanamukhena nayanalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso nandiyāvaṭṭo nayo.
tika-s0501t0:101_2: Tattha catusaccanti taṇhā ca avijjā ca bhavamūlattā samudayasaccaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:102_1: tīhi avayavehi alobhādīhi ca vodānapakkhe pukkhalo sobhanoti tipukkhalo,
tika-s0501t0:102_3: kusalamūlehi vodānapakkhassa suttatthassa catusaccayojanamukhena nayanalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso tipukkhalo.
tika-s0501t0:103_0: Sīhassa bhagavato vikkīḷitaṃ ettha nayeti sīhavikkīḷito,
tika-s0501t0:103_2: saddhindriyādīhi vodānapakkhassa suttatthassa catusaccayojanamukhena nayanalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso sīhavikkīḷitanayo.
tika-s0501t0:104_1: Tassa tassa atthanayassa yojanatthaṃ katesu suttassa atthavissajjanesu ye vodānādayo,
tika-s0501t0:104_2: saṃkilesikā ca tassa tassa nayassa disābhūtā dhammā suttato niddhāretvā kathitā,
tika-s0501t0:105_0: Tathā ālocitānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthanayattayayojane samānayanato aṅkuso viyāti aṅkuso,
tika-s0501t0:105_1: tassa tassa nayassa disābhūtānaṃ kusalādidhammānaṃ samānayanaṃ aṅkuso nayo.
tika-s0501t0:106_2: iti lañjanato pakāsanato so nayo lañjako nāma,
tika-s0501t0:106_3: nayo ca so lañjako cāti nayalañjako.
tika-s0501t0:109_4: itarāpohe vā cittena kate na tathā buddhi,
tika-s0501t0:110_0: Vacane ghaṭakathalaāpajalakaddamādisaṅkhātaṃ samūhādiṃ upādāya lokassa pubbe ghaṭakathalaāpajalakaddamādisaṅketasiddhā
tika-s0501t0:110_4: “Yadi evaṃ ghaṭādike abhinne vā āpādike vā anurūpena ūnabhāvena appavattamāne vā sati sammutibhāvo hotu,
tika-s0501t0:110_5: bhinne vā ūne vā kathaṃ sammutibhāvo bhaveyya,
tika-s0501t0:110_7: kakkhaḷaphusanādīnañca pathavīphassādīhi anaññattā kathaṃ paramatthasabhāvo bhaveyya,
tika-s0501t0:110_9: paramatthasabhāvo ca amhehi jānitabbo”ti vattabbabhāvato “ayañhettha saṅkhepo”tiādimāha.
tika-s0501t0:110_10: Tattha etthāti etesu sammutisabhāvaparamatthasabhāvesu ayaṃ nayo vuccamāno saṅkhepo attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0501t0:111_0: Yasmiṃ ghaṭādike bhinne sati tato ghaṭādito itaro kathalādibhāvo cittena pubbe katena yathā yena kathalādivohārena bhavati,
tika-s0501t0:111_1: yasmiṃ āpādike sambhārajalādike ūnabhāvena pavattamāne sati vā tato āpādito itaro kaddamādibhāvo cittena
tika-s0501t0:111_2: pubbe katena yathā yena kaddamādivohārena bhavati,
tika-s0501t0:111_3: tathā tena vohārena buddhi kathalādisabhāvajānanaṃ kaddamādisabhāvajānanaṃ bhavati,
tika-s0501t0:111_4: idaṃ abhinne ghaṭādikaṃ vā bhinne kathalādikaṃ vā anūne āpādikaṃ vā ūne kaddamādikaṃ vā sabbaṃ sammutisaccaṃ hotveva.
tika-s0501t0:111_6: kaddamasmiṃ ūne vā sati itaro sammutisabhāvo”ti pucchitabbabhāvato “ghaṭe,
tika-s0501t0:112_4: phassādīnañca phusanādilakkhaṇato itarassa kakkhaḷādilakkhaṇassa asambhavato pathavīphassādīnaṃ lakkhaḷaphusanādilakkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0501t0:112_5: paramatthasaccaṃ hotvevāti imasmiṃ saṅkhepatthe gahite koci virodho natthīti adhippāyoti.
tika-s0501t0:113_4: katamāni tānī”ti pucchitabbattā tāni sarūpato dassetuṃ “tattha katamāni aṭṭhārasa mūlapadāni”tyādimāha.
tika-s0501t0:113_5: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “evaṃ nayepi uddisitvā idāni mūlapadāni uddisituṃ ‘tattha katamānī’tiādi āraddha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:113_7: akusalāni nava padāni aṭṭhārasa mūlapadānīti daṭṭhabbānīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:113_13: vuttappakāraṭṭhena mūlāni ca tāni padāni cāti mūlapadāni.
tika-s0501t0:114_3: “katamāni tānī”ti pucchitabbattā nava padāni akusalāni paccāsattinyāyena sarūpato dassetuṃ “katamāni nava padāni akusalānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:115_1: jātibhedato ca mūlapadāni dassetvā idāni sarūpato dassento saṃkilesapakkhaṃyeva paṭhamaṃ uddisati ‘taṇhā’tiādinā”ti –
tika-s0501t0:116_1: Tattha rūpādike khandhe tasati paritasatīti taṇhā.
tika-s0501t0:116_12: Anattasabhāvesu cakkhādīsu khandhesu “attā”ti pavattā saññā attasaññā.
tika-s0501t0:116_13: Yatthāti yesu padesu sabbo akusalapakkho saṅgahaṃ samosaraṇaṃ gacchati,
tika-s0501t0:117_0: Paccanīkadhamme uddhaccādike nīvaraṇe sameti vūpasameti tadaṅgavikkhambhanavasenāti samatho.
tika-s0501t0:117_1: Saṅkhāre aniccādīhi vividhehi ākārehi passatīti vipassanā.
tika-s0501t0:117_13: Anicce khandhādike vipariṇāmadhamme “anicca”nti pavattā saññāpadhānacittuppādā aniccasaññā,
tika-s0501t0:117_24: Yatthāti yesu padesu sabbo kusalapakkho saṅgahaṃ samosaraṇaṃ gacchati,
tika-s0501t0:118_2: Uddāne avutte sati heṭṭhā vuttassa atthassa vippakiṇṇabhāvo dinno viya bhaveyya,
tika-s0501t0:119_1: Indriyabhūmīti saddhādīnaṃ vimuttiparipācanindriyānaṃ bhūmī pavattanaṭṭhānāni samosaraṇaṭṭhānāni.
tika-s0501t0:120_2: Navahi kusalapadehi saha kusalapakkhā yujjanti yujjantā bhavanti,
tika-s0501t0:120_3: navahi akusalapadehi saha akusalapakkhā yujjanti yujjantā bhavantīti uddesavāre vuttāvaseso saṃvaṇṇanānusārena vijānitabbo.
tika-s0501t0:125_3: “katamo niddeso”ti pucchitabbattā uddiṭṭhe hārādayo niddisituṃ “tattha saṅkhepato nettī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:125_4: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “evaṃ uddiṭṭhe hārādayo niddisituṃ ‘tattha saṅkhepato’tiādi āraddha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:125_5: Tattha tatthāti tasmiṃ “tattha katame soḷasa hārā?
tika-s0501t0:129_0: Gāthāyaṃ yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena sutte āgatā assādopi ādīnavatā ādīnavopi nissaraṇampi phalampi upāyopi
tika-s0501t0:129_1: yogīnaṃ atthāya bhagavato āṇattipi ime dhammā dassitā saṃvaṇṇitā saṃvaṇṇanāvasena ñāpitā,
tika-s0501t0:130_5: Assādeti etāyāti vā assādo, ko so? Taṇhā,
tika-s0501t0:130_7: Vipallāsavasena hi ekacce sattā aniṭṭhampi ārammaṇaṃ iṭṭhākārena assādenti.
tika-s0501t0:131_0: Ābhusaṃ kammena dīnaṃ dukkhādi hutvā vāti pavattatīti ādīnavo, dukkhādi.
tika-s0501t0:131_1: Atha vā ativiya ādīnaṃ kapaṇaṃ hutvā vāti pavattatīti ādīnavo,
tika-s0501t0:133_3: tathāpi bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ sutvā puññasambhārā sambhavanti,
tika-s0501t0:134_0: Paccayasāmaggiṃ upagantvā ayati pavattati phalaṃ etenāti upāyo, ko so?
tika-s0501t0:134_2: Purimā paṭipadā hi pacchimāya paṭipadāya adhigamūpāyo,
tika-s0501t0:134_5: tesaṃ matena nibbānameva nissaraṇanti vuttaṃ siyā.
tika-s0501t0:134_6: “Te pahāya tare oghanti idaṃ nissaraṇa”nti pana ariyamaggassa nissaraṇabhāvaṃ vakkhati,
tika-s0501t0:135_0: Āṇattīti āṇārahassa bhagavato veneyyānaṃ hitasiddhiyā “evaṃ sammāpaṭipattiṃ paṭipajjāhi,
tika-s0501t0:135_1: micchāpaṭipattiṃ mā paṭipajjāhī”ti vidhānaṃ āṇāṭhapanaṃ āṇatti nāma.
tika-s0501t0:136_1: tesaṃ yogīnaṃ atthāyāti vacanasesaṃ nīharitvā yojanā kātabbā.
tika-s0501t0:136_2: Sutte āgatānaṃ sabbesaṃ assādādīnaṃ ekadesāgatānampi nīharitvā sabbesaṃ vibhajanasaṃvaṇṇanāviseso desanāhāroti niddesato gahetabbo,
tika-s0501t0:136_3: so ca vibhajanākāro desanāhāravibhaṅge āgamissatīti idha na dassitoti.
tika-s0501t0:137_0: Desanāhāraniddeso niddiṭṭho, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo vicayahāraniddeso”ti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t0:139_0: “Yaṃ pucchitañca vissajjitañca, suttassa yā ca anugīti.
tika-s0501t0:140_0: Suttassa yo pavicayo, hāro vicayoti niddiṭṭho”ti. –
tika-s0501t0:141_1: Tattha suttassa yaṃ pucchitañca yā pucchā vicayamānā ca suttassa yaṃ vissajjitañca yā vissajjanā vicayamānā ca suttassa yo padādivicayo,
tika-s0501t0:141_3: te vuttappakārā vicayamānā pucchādayo yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena viciyanti,
tika-s0501t0:141_4: so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso vicayo hāroti niddiṭṭhoti atthayojanā kātabbā.
tika-s0501t0:143_0: “Suttassā”ti niyamitattā saṃvaṇṇanāvasena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgataṃ na gahetabbanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:143_1: So vicayo hāro aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttova. Kathaṃ? –
tika-s0501t0:144_0: “Ayaṃ pucchā adiṭṭhajotanā diṭṭhasaṃsandanā vimaticchedanā anumatipucchā kathetukamyatāpucchā sattādhiṭṭhānā
tika-s0501t0:144_1: dhammādhiṭṭhānā ekādhiṭṭhānā anekādhiṭṭhānā sammutivisayā paramatthavisayā atītavisayā anāgatavisayā
tika-s0501t0:144_3: “Idaṃ vissajjanaṃ ekaṃsabyākaraṇaṃ vibhajjabyākaraṇaṃ paṭipucchābyākaraṇaṃ ṭhapanaṃ sāvasesaṃ niravasesaṃ
tika-s0501t0:145_2: vicayo pubbenāparaṃ saṃsanditvā ca vicayo pubbāparavicayo.
tika-s0501t0:145_3: “Ayaṃ anugīti vuttatthasaṅgahā avuttatthasaṅgahā tadubhayatthasaṅgahā kusalatthasaṅgahā akusalatthasaṅgahā”tiādinā anugītivicayo.
tika-s0501t0:145_8: dvācattālīsādhike ca dukasate labbhamānapadavasena taṃtaṃassādatthavisesaniddhāraṇaṃ assādavicayo.
tika-s0501t0:146_2: aniccatādīnaṃ ādiantavantatāya aniccantikatāya ca “aniccā”tiādinā sabbesañca lokiyadhammānaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyahānabhāgiyatādivasena
tika-s0501t0:146_6: Phalādīnaṃ taṃtaṃsuttadesanāya sādhetabbaphalassa tadupāyassa tattha tattha suttavidhivacanassa ca vibhāganiddhāraṇavasena vicayo veditabbo.
tika-s0501t0:149_11: Vissajjanassa pana sāvasesato veneyyajjhāsayavasena desanāyaṃ veditabbā.
tika-s0501t0:150_1: Saṃvaṇṇanāsu vutto attho anākulo pākaṭo yatipotehi viññāto,
tika-s0501t0:150_2: so sabbattha amhehi na vibhattoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0501t0:151_0: Vicayahāraniddeso niddiṭṭho, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo yuttihāraniddeso”ti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t0:153_0: “Sabbesaṃ hārānaṃ, yā bhūmī yo ca gocaro tesaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:155_1: Tattha sabbesaṃ soḷasannaṃ hārānaṃ yā bhūmi pavattanaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ byañjanaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:155_3: tesaṃ bhūmisaṅkhātabyañjanagocarasaṅkhātasuttatthānaṃ yā yuttāyuttaparikkhā yuttāyuttīnaṃ vicāraṇā saṃvaṇṇanā katā,
tika-s0501t0:155_4: so yuttiayuttiparikkhāvicāraṇasaṅkhāto saṃvaṇṇanāviseso “yutti hāro”ti niddiṭṭhoti atthayojanā.
tika-s0501t0:156_0: Tesaṃ hārānaṃ bhūmibhūtassa sutte āgatassa byañjanassa yuttibhāvo duvidho sabhāvaniruttibhāvo,
tika-s0501t0:156_2: Gocarabhūtassa pana sutte āgatassa yuttibhāvo suttavinayadhammatāhi avilomanaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:157_0: Yuttihāraniddeso niddiṭṭho, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo padaṭṭhānahāraniddeso”ti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t0:159_0: “Dhammaṃ deseti jino, tassa ca dhammassa yaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:160_0: Iti yāva sabbadhammā, eso hāro padaṭṭhāno”ti. –
tika-s0501t0:161_1: Tattha dhammanti yaṃ kiñci kusalādidhammaṃ sutte jino deseti,
tika-s0501t0:161_2: tassa sutte jinena desitassa kusalādidhammassa yañca padaṭṭhānaṃ niddhāretabbaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:161_3: taṃ taṃ padaṭṭhānañcāti evaṃ vuttanayena yāva yattakā sabbe dhammā sutte jinena desitā,
tika-s0501t0:161_4: tattakānaṃ sabbesaṃ dhammānaṃ yañca padaṭṭhānaṃ niddhāretabbaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:161_5: tassa ca padaṭṭhānassa yañca padaṭṭhānaṃ niddhāretabbaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:161_7: iti evaṃ vuttanayena yāva yattakā sabbe padaṭṭhānadhammā niddhāretabbāva,
tika-s0501t0:161_8: tattakāni sabbāni dhammapadaṭṭhānāni yathānurūpaṃ niddhāretvā yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena kathitāni,
tika-s0501t0:162_2: abyākatassa dhammassa yathārahaṃ kusalākusalābyākatā padaṭṭhānantiādinā niddhāretabbanti.
tika-s0501t0:163_0: Padaṭṭhānahāraniddeso niddiṭṭho, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo lakkhaṇahāraniddeso”ti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t0:166_0: Vuttā bhavanti sabbe, so hāro lakkhaṇo nāmā”ti. –
tika-s0501t0:167_2: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ niddhārite vā sati tena dhammena ye keci dhammā ekalakkhaṇā bhavanti,
tika-s0501t0:167_3: sabbe te dhammā sutte sarūpato avuttāpi samānalakkhaṇatāya saṃvaṇṇetabbabhāvena ānetvā yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena vuttā bhavanti,
tika-s0501t0:167_4: so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso “lakkhaṇo nāma hāro”ti niddiṭṭhoti atthayojanā.
tika-s0501t0:168_2: sahacāritāya vā samānakiccatāya vā samānahetutāya vā samānaphalatāya vā samānārammaṇatāya vā avuttāpi niddhāritāti. Kathaṃ? –
tika-s0501t0:168_4: nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā”tiādīsu sahacāritāya saññāya sahagatā dhammā niddhāritā.
tika-s0501t0:168_10: taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjatī”tiādīsu samānārammaṇatāya taṃsampayuttā vedanādayopi niddhāritā,
tika-s0501t0:169_0: Lakkhaṇo hāro niddiṭṭho, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo catubyūho hāro”ti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t0:173_1: Tattha neruttaṃ suttapadanibbacanañca buddhānaṃ tassa tassa suttassa desakānaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:173_2: sāvakānaṃ vā adhippāyo ca atthabyañjanena byañjanamukhena desanānidānañca pubbāparena anusandhi ca ete
tika-s0501t0:173_6: Catubyūhahārassa bahuvisayattā vibhaṅge lakkhaṇasampattiṃ katvā kathayissāma.
tika-s0501t0:174_0: Catubyūhahāraniddeso niddiṭṭho, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo āvaṭṭahāraniddeso”ti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t0:177_0: Āvaṭṭati paṭipakkhe, āvaṭṭo nāma so hāro”ti. –
tika-s0501t0:178_1: Tattha parakkamadhātuādīnaṃ padaṭṭhāne ekamhi ārambhadhātuādike desanāruḷhe sati visabhāgatāya vā sesakaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ pariyesati,
tika-s0501t0:178_2: desanāya sarūpato aggahaṇena vā sesakaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ pariyesati,
tika-s0501t0:178_3: yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena pariyesitvā yojento desanaṃ pamādādīnaṃ padaṭṭhānabhūte kosajjādike paṭipakkhe āvaṭṭati āvaṭṭāpeti,
tika-s0501t0:178_4: so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso “āvaṭṭo hāro nāmā”ti niddiṭṭhoti atthayojanā.
tika-s0501t0:179_2: Na hi ārambhadhātuādike desanāruḷhe sati tappaṭipakkhe kosajjādikeyeva desanaṃ āvaṭṭeti,
tika-s0501t0:180_0: Āvaṭṭahāraniddeso niddiṭṭho, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo vibhattihāraniddeso”ti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t0:184_1: Tattha kusalādivasena anekavidhaṃ sabhāvadhammañca dānasīlādipadaṭṭhānañca “dassanabhūmi bhāvanābhūmī”ti
tika-s0501t0:184_2: evamādikaṃ bhūmiñca sādhāraṇe ca asādhāraṇe ca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena vibhajate,
tika-s0501t0:185_4: idaṃ sīlaṃ idaṃ jhānaṃ imassa lokuttarassa padaṭṭhāna”ntyādinā padaṭṭhānañca,
tika-s0501t0:185_8: “kāmarāgabyāpādā anāgāmiarahantānaṃ asādhāraṇā”tyādinā asādhāraṇe ca yena vibhajati,
tika-s0501t0:185_9: so vibhatti hāro nāmātiādinā vitthāretvā vibhajanākāro gahetabbo.
tika-s0501t0:186_0: Vibhattihāraniddeso niddiṭṭho, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo parivattanahāraniddeso”ti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t0:190_1: Tattha sutte bhāvite bhāvitabbe kusale anavajjadhamme niddiṭṭhe kathite,
tika-s0501t0:190_2: saṃvaṇṇite vā pahīne pahātabbe akusale sāvajjadhamme niddiṭṭhe kathite,
tika-s0501t0:190_3: saṃvaṇṇite vā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paṭipakkhe viparītadhamme yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena parivattati parivatteti,
tika-s0501t0:190_4: so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso “parivattano hāro nāmā”ti veditabboti atthayojanā.
tika-s0501t0:191_0: “Sammādiṭṭhissa purisapuggalassa micchādiṭṭhi nijjiṇṇā bhavatī”tiādinā ca “yassa vā pāṇātipātā paṭiviratassa
tika-s0501t0:191_2: kāmehi veramaṇī tesaṃ adhammo”tiādinā ca paṭipakkhe parivattanabhāvaṃ vibhaṅgavāre vakkhatīti na vitthāritā.
tika-s0501t0:192_0: Parivattanahāraniddeso niddiṭṭho, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo vevacanahāraniddeso”ti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t0:195_0: Yo jānāti suttavidū, vevacano nāma so hāro”ti. –
tika-s0501t0:196_1: Tattha ekadhammassa padatthassa sutte vuttāni tu vuttāni eva,
tika-s0501t0:196_2: bahūni tu bahūni eva vevacanāni yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena yo suttavidū jānāti,
tika-s0501t0:196_4: tassa suttaviduno so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso “vevacano nāma hāro”ti niddiṭṭhoti atthayojanā.
tika-s0501t0:197_1: saddā asamānatthā ca hontīti “yo suttavidū”ti vatvā “so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso”ti vuttanti.
tika-s0501t0:197_2: “Bhagavā”ti padassa ekasmiṃyeva atthe bhagavati “arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū
tika-s0501t0:197_3: anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavā,
tika-s0501t0:197_4: phalanipphattigato vesārajjappatto adhigatapaṭisambhido catuyogavippahīno agatigamanavītivatto uddhaṭasallo
tika-s0501t0:197_5: niruḷhavaṇo madditakaṇṭako nibbāpitapariyuṭṭhāno bandhanātīto ganthaviniveṭhano ajjhāsayavītivatto bhinnandhakāro
tika-s0501t0:197_6: cakkhumā lokadhammasamatikkanto anurodhavirodhavippayutto iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu dhammesu asaṅkhepagato bandhanātivatto
tika-s0501t0:197_7: ṭhapitasaṅgāmo abhikkantataro ukkādharo ālokakaro pajjotakaro tamonudo raṇañjaho aparimāṇavaṇṇo appameyyavaṇṇo
tika-s0501t0:197_8: asaṅkheyyavaṇṇo ābhaṅkaro pabhaṅkaro dhammobhāsapajjotakaro”ti evamādīni bahūni vevacanāni yojitāni.
tika-s0501t0:198_0: Vevacanahāraniddeso niddiṭṭho, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo paññattihāraniddeso”ti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t0:201_0: So ākāro ñeyyo, paññattī nāma so hāro”ti. –
tika-s0501t0:202_1: Tattha bhagavā ekaṃ khandhādidhammaṃ vividhāhi nikkhepappabhavapaññattādīhi paññattīhi yena paññāpetabbākārena deseti,
tika-s0501t0:202_3: so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso “paññatti hāro nāmā”ti ñeyyoti atthayojanā.
tika-s0501t0:204_0: Tattha “idaṃ dukkha”nti ayaṃ paññatti pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:205_9: atthi tattha saṅkhārānaṃ vuddhī”ti evamādi pabhavapaññatti dukkhassa ca samudayassa cāti.
tika-s0501t0:207_0: Paṇṇattihāraniddeso niddiṭṭho, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo otaraṇahāraniddeso”ti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t0:210_0: Etehi otarati yo, otaraṇo nāma so hāro”ti. –
tika-s0501t0:211_1: Tattha yo paṭiccasamuppādo ca ye indriyakhandhā ca yāni dhātuāyatanāni ca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena niddhāritāni,
tika-s0501t0:211_3: sutte āgatapadatthamukhena niddhāriyamānehi ca yo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso otarati ogāhati paṭiccasamuppādādike tattha vācakavasena,
tika-s0501t0:211_5: so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso otaraṇo hāro nāmāti atthayojanā.
tika-s0501t0:212_0: Tattha indriyakhandhāti indriyāni ca khandhā cāti indriyakhandhā.
tika-s0501t0:212_1: Dhātuāyatanāti dhātuyo ca āyatanāni ca dhātuāyatanā.
tika-s0501t0:215_0: Tāniyeva asekkhāni pañcindriyāni tīhi khandhehi saṅgahitāni sīlakkhandhena samādhikkhandhena paññākkhandhena,
tika-s0501t0:216_0: Tāniyeva asekkhāni pañcindriyāni saṅkhārapariyāpannāni ye saṅkhārā anāsavā,
tika-s0501t0:217_3: ayaṃ āyatanehi otaraṇāti evamādīhi vibhaṅge āgamissatīti.
tika-s0501t0:218_0: Otaraṇahāraniddeso niddiṭṭho, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo sodhanahāraniddeso”ti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t0:222_1: Tattha tissaṃ gāthāyaṃ āruḷhe pañhe ñātumicchite atthe bhagavatā vissajjanagāthāyaṃ vissajjitamhi yaṃ
tika-s0501t0:222_2: suttatthaṃ ārabbha adhikicca sā gāthā pucchitā pucchanatthāya ṭhapitā,
tika-s0501t0:222_3: tassa suttatthassa yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena suddhāsuddhaparikkhā vicāraṇā bhave,
tika-s0501t0:222_4: so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso sodhano hāro nāmāti atthayojanā.
tika-s0501t0:223_9: Evaṃ padādīnaṃ sodhitāsodhitabhāvavicāro hāro sodhano nāma.
tika-s0501t0:224_0: Sodhanahāraniddeso niddiṭṭho, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo adhiṭṭhānahāraniddeso”ti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t0:227_0: Te na vikappayitabbā, eso hāro adhiṭṭhāno”ti. –
tika-s0501t0:228_1: Tattha ye dukkhasaccādayo dhammā ekattatāya sāmaññenapi ca vemattatāya visesenapi niddiṭṭhā,
tika-s0501t0:228_2: yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena niddiṭṭhā dukkhasaccādayo dhammā na vikappayitabbā sāmaññavisesakappanāya vohārabhāvena anavaṭṭhānato,
tika-s0501t0:229_0: Tattha ekattatāyāti ekassa samānassa bhāvo ekattaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:229_7: Yathā hi “ajja sve”ti vuccamānā kālavisesā anavaṭṭhitā bhavanti,
tika-s0501t0:229_11: Tathā hi “idaṃ dukkha”nti vuccamānaṃ jātiādiṃ apekkhāya sāmaññaṃ samānampi saccāpekkhāya viseso hoti.
tika-s0501t0:229_18: “taṇhā ponobhavikā nandīrāgasahagatā”ti evamādi vemattatāti evamādi vitthāro vibhaṅge āgamissatīti.
tika-s0501t0:230_0: Adhiṭṭhānahāraniddeso niddiṭṭho, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo parikkhārahāraniddeso”ti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t0:234_1: Tattha avijjādikā ye paccayadhammā saṅkhārādikaṃ yaṃ phaladhammaṃ paccayā sahajātapaccayena paramparato paramparapaccayabhāvena janayanti,
tika-s0501t0:234_2: tassa saṅkhārādiphalassa paccayaṃ parikkhārabhūtaṃ purimuppannaṃ avijjādikaṃ asādhāraṇaṃ janakaṃ hetuṃ,
tika-s0501t0:234_3: ayonisomanasikārādikaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ paccayahetuñca avakaḍḍhayitvā suttato niddhāretvā yo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso parikkhārasaṃvaṇṇanābhāvena pavatto,
tika-s0501t0:234_4: eso saṃvaṇṇanāviseso parikkhāro hāro nāmāti atthayojanā.
tika-s0501t0:235_0: Parikkhārahāraniddeso niddiṭṭho, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo samāropanahāraniddeso”ti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t0:237_0: “Ye dhammā yaṃmūlā, ye cekatthā pakāsitā muninā.
tika-s0501t0:239_1: Tattha ye sīlādayo dhammā yaṃmūlā yesaṃ samādhiādīnaṃ mūlā,
tika-s0501t0:239_2: te sīlādayo dhammā tesaṃ samādhiādīnaṃ padaṭṭhānabhāvena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena samāropayitabbā,
tika-s0501t0:239_3: ye ca rāgavirāgacetovimuttisekkhaphalakāmadhātusamatikkamanādisaddā anāgāmiphalatthatāya ekatthā samānatthāti buddhamuninā pakāsitā,
tika-s0501t0:239_6: eso saṃvaṇṇanāviseso samāropano hāro nāmāti atthayojanā.
tika-s0501t0:240_1: bhāvanāpāripūrī ca pahātabbassa pahānena hotīti bhāvanāsamāropanapahānasamāropanāpi dassitāti catubbidho samāropano padaṭṭhānasamāropano,
tika-s0501t0:241_25: Kāye kāyānupassino viharato cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti,
tika-s0501t0:241_26: catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu bhāviyamānesu cattāro sammappadhānā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti,
tika-s0501t0:241_27: catūsu sammappadhānesu bhāviyamānesu cattāro iddhipādā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchantīti evamādi bhāvanāsamāropano.
tika-s0501t0:241_28: Kāye kāyānupassī viharanto asubhe “subha”nti vipallāsaṃ pajahati,
tika-s0501t0:241_39: vedanāsūti evamādi pahānasamāropanoti evamādi samāropano hāro niyuttoti.
tika-s0501t0:245_4: Atha vā evaṃ uddesakkameneva hāre niddisitvā idāni naye niddisituṃ “taṇhañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:245_5: Tattha yo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso sutte āgataṃ taṇhañca avijjañca atthato niddhāraṇavasena gahitaṃ taṇhañca avijjañca saṃkilesapakkhaṃ neti,
tika-s0501t0:245_7: sutte āgatāya vipassanāya atthato niddhāraṇavasena vā gahitena samathena,
tika-s0501t0:245_10: ayaṃ saṃvaṇṇanāviseso so nandiyāvaṭṭo nayo nāmāti atthayojanā.
tika-s0501t0:246_5: Tassa pana atthanayassa yā saṃvaṇṇanā ugghaṭitaññuādīnaṃ vasena taṇhādimukhena nayabhūmiracanā pavattā,
tika-s0501t0:246_6: tassa saṃvaṇṇanāva nayavohāro katoti vitthārato hārasampāte āgamissati.
tika-s0501t0:247_0: Nandiyāvaṭṭanayaniddeso niddiṭṭho, amhehi ca ñāto, “katamo tipukkhalanayaniddeso”ti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t0:249_0: “Yo akusale samūlehi, neti kusale ca kusalamūlehi.
tika-s0501t0:250_0: Bhūtaṃ tathaṃ avitathaṃ, tipukkhalaṃ taṃ nayaṃ āhū”ti. –
tika-s0501t0:251_1: Tattha yo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso akusale samūlehi attano akusalassa tīhi lobhādīhi mūlehi saṃkilesapakkhaṃ neti,
tika-s0501t0:251_2: kusale ca kusalamūlehi tīhi alobhādīhi vodānapakkhaṃ neti,
tika-s0501t0:251_9: Kusalākusalānaṃ sabhāvato vijjamānattā bhūtā paramatthasaccattā tathā,
tika-s0501t0:251_11: kusalassa ca aniṭṭhavipākatābhāvato vipāke sati avisaṃvādakattā avitathā bhavanti,
tika-s0501t0:252_1: kusalamūlehi ca kusalāni nayanto ayaṃ nayo bhūtaṃ tathaṃ avitathaṃ neti cattāri saccāni niddhāretvā yojeti.
tika-s0501t0:252_8: tathāni avitathāni anaññathānī”ti saṃ. ni. 5.1090; paṭi. ma. 2.8).
tika-s0501t0:252_9: Akusalādisuttatthassa catusaccayojanamukhena nayanalakkhaṇaṃ taṃ saṃvaṇṇanāvisesaṃ tipukkhalaṃ nayanti āhūti atthayojanā.
tika-s0501t0:253_0: Tattha tīhi hetūhi pukkhalo sobhanoti tipukkhalo akusalādiko atthanayo saṃvaṇṇanāvisesoti ṭhānūpacārato tipukkhalanayo nāmāti.
tika-s0501t0:258_1: Tattha yo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso sutte vuttehi vipallāsehi kilese saṃkilesapakkhaṃ neti,
tika-s0501t0:258_2: sutte vuttehi indriyehi saddhamme vodānapakkhaṃ neti,
tika-s0501t0:258_4: atthanayakusalā eva vā sīhavikkīḷitaṃ nayanti āhūti atthayojanā.
tika-s0501t0:262_0: “Veyyākaraṇesu hi ye, kusalākusalā tahiṃ tahiṃ vuttā.
tika-s0501t0:263_0: Manasā volokayate, taṃ khu disālocanaṃ āhū”ti. –
tika-s0501t0:264_2: so pana na therassa pāṭhoti daṭṭhabbo bhinnalakkhaṇattā.
tika-s0501t0:264_3: Tattha tahiṃ tahiṃ veyyākaraṇesu ye kusalākusalā nayassa disābhūtā dhammā vuttā,
tika-s0501t0:264_4: te kusalākusale nayassa disābhūtadhamme abahi abbhantaraṃ citte eva yaṃ olokanaṃ karoti,
tika-s0501t0:264_5: taṃ olokanaṃ khu olokanaṃ eva disālocananti āhūti atthayojanā.
tika-s0501t0:265_0: Tattha veyyākaraṇesūti tassa tassa atthanayassa yojanatthaṃ katesu suttassa atthavissajjanesu.
tika-s0501t0:265_4: Olokayateti te kusalādidhamme citteneva “ayaṃ paṭhamā disā,
tika-s0501t0:265_5: ayaṃ dutiyā disā”tiādinā tassa tassa nayassa disābhāvena upaparikkhati,
tika-s0501t0:265_8: tena disālocananayo koci atthaviseso na hotīti dassetīti.
tika-s0501t0:266_4: Tattha taṃtaṃnayadisābhūte sabbe kusalākusale disālocanena oloketvā ukkhipiya suttato uddharitvā yaṃ samāneti yaṃ samānayanaṃ karoti,
tika-s0501t0:266_5: ayaṃ samānayanasaṅkhāto nayo aṅkuso nayo nāmāti atthayojanā.
tika-s0501t0:267_0: Ettha ca aṅkuso nāma hatthīnaṃ icchitaṭṭhānaṃ ānayanakāraṇabhūto vajirādimayo tikkhaggo ujuvaṅkabhūto dabbasambhāraviseso,
tika-s0501t0:267_1: ayampi nayo aṅkuso viyāti atthena aṅkuso.
tika-s0501t0:267_2: Etena hi nayena icchitaṃ suttatthaṃ nayatīti.
tika-s0501t0:267_3: Mukhyato pana aṅke vijjhanaṭṭhāne uddhaṭo asati anto pavisatīti aṅkuso.
tika-s0501t0:267_5: Ayampi nayo kocipi atthaviseso na hotīti.
tika-s0501t0:268_0: Soḷasa hāraniddesā ceva pañca nayaniddesā ca ācariyena niddiṭṭhā.
tika-s0501t0:271_0: Saṅkhipiya aṅkusena hi, nayehi tihi niddise sutta”nti. –
tika-s0501t0:272_2: naye ca niddisitvā idāni nesaṃ yojanakkamaṃ dassento ‘soḷasa hārā paṭhama’ntiādimāhā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:272_3: Tattha soḷasa hārā byañjanapariyeṭṭhibhāvato saṃvaṇṇetabbasutte saṃvaṇṇanābhāvena paṭhamaṃ yojetabbā,
tika-s0501t0:272_6: Hārasaṃvaṇṇanānukkamena saṃvaṇṇetabbaṃ paṭhamaṃ saṃvaṇṇetvā pacchā disālocanena oloketvā aṅkusanayena netvā tīhi atthanayehi niddiseti adhippāyo.
tika-s0501t0:276_1: atthapadānañca vasena “dvādasa padāni sutta”nti saṅgahavāre vuttaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:282_0: Etehi chahi padehi, attho kammañca niddiṭṭha”nti. –
tika-s0501t0:284_5: Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “apariyosite pade vaṇṇo akkharaṃ pariyāyavasena akkharaṇato asañcaraṇato”ti.
tika-s0501t0:284_6: Apariyosite padeti ca vibhatyantabhāvaṃ appatte dviticatukkharavantesu padesu ekadvitikkharamatteyeva akkharaṃ nāma,
tika-s0501t0:284_9: Padaṃ pana pavesanato atthavasena pariyāyaṃ sañcarantaṃ viya hoti,
tika-s0501t0:285_2: Tattha dabbapadhānaṃ “phasso vedanā citta”nti evamādikaṃ nāmapadaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:285_5: Kiriyāpadhānaṃ “phusati vedayati vijānātī”ti evamādikaṃ ākhyātapadaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:285_12: Vacanattho pana nāmapadaākhyātapadadvayaṃ upagantvā tassa padadvayassa atthaṃ sajjantīti upasaggāti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0501t0:285_14: itī”ti evamādikaṃ nipātapadaṃ assapi saṃvaṇṇanāyapi icchitattā,
tika-s0501t0:285_16: Akkharehi suyyamānehi suṇantānaṃ visesavidhānassa katattā padapariyosāne padatthasampaṭipatti hoti.
tika-s0501t0:285_21: akkharehi ca padehi ca ugghaṭetī”ti ca.
tika-s0501t0:286_1: Vibhajanā ca uttānīkammañca paññatti ca vibhajanuttānīkammapaññattīti samāhāre ayaṃ dvandasamāso.
tika-s0501t0:286_4: so atthākāro vivaraṇavibhajanāti dvīhi atthapadehi niddisito.
tika-s0501t0:286_7: Niruttiniddesasaṅkhātehi byañjanapadehi pakāsiyamāno yo atthākāro atthi,
tika-s0501t0:286_9: Etehi saṅkāsanādīhi chahi atthapadehi attho suttattho gahito,
tika-s0501t0:286_11: Yena suttatthena ugghaṭitaññuno cittasantānassa sambodhanakiriyāsaṅkhātassa ugghaṭanakammassa nibbatti bhave,
tika-s0501t0:286_13: Yena suttatthena vipañcitaññuno cittasantānassa bodhanakiriyāsaṅkhātassa vipañcanakammassa nibbatti,
tika-s0501t0:286_15: Yena suttatthena neyyassa cittasantānassa pabodhanakiriyāsaṅkhātassa nayakammassa nibbatti,
tika-s0501t0:286_17: Tenāha aṭṭhakathācariyo “suttatthena hi desanāya pavattiyamānena ugghaṭitaññuādiveneyyānaṃ cittasantānassa pabodhanakiriyānibbatti,
tika-s0501t0:287_0: “Yathāvuttehi tīhi atthanayehi ceva chahi atthapadehi ca ayuttopi attho kiṃ koci atthi,
tika-s0501t0:287_1: udāhu sabbo attho yutto evā”ti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t0:289_0: “Tīṇi ca nayā anūnā, atthassa ca chappadāni gaṇitāni.
tika-s0501t0:291_3: Gaṇitā anūnā tayo atthassa nayā ca gaṇitāni anūnāni cha atthassa padāni ca niddiṭṭhāni,
tika-s0501t0:291_4: niddiṭṭhehi ca atthapadehi bhagavato vacanassa sabbo attho samāyuttova ayutto koci attho natthīti yojanā kātabbā.
tika-s0501t0:292_2: te hārādayo sampiṇḍetvā nettippakaraṇassa padatthe sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ gaṇanavasena paricchinditvā dassento “atthassā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0501t0:292_3: Tattha atthassa samūhassa avayavabhūtāni navabhedāni atthapadāni suttabyañjanassa atthassa pariyeṭṭhisaṅkhātāya
tika-s0501t0:292_5: atthapadabyañjanapadabhūtaṃ ubhayaṃ saṅkhepayato sampiṇḍayato tettiṃsā tettiṃsavidhā ettikā tettiṃsavidhāva nettīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:293_4: dve disālocananayaaṅkusanayā cāti evaṃ tettiṃsavidhā ca netti nāma,
tika-s0501t0:293_5: ito vinimutto añño koci nettipadattho natthīti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0501t0:294_0: “Evaṃ tettiṃsapadatthāya nettiyā hāranayānaṃ katamo desanāhāravicayahāro”tiādi desanākkameneva siddho,
tika-s0501t0:294_1: evaṃ siddhe satipi “soḷasa hārā paṭhama”nti ārambho “sabbepime hārā ceva nayā ca iminā dassitakkameneva
tika-s0501t0:295_0: Niddhāraṇena vināpi pakatiyā sabbasaṃvaṇṇetabbasuttesu anarūpāti suviññeyyattā,
tika-s0501t0:295_1: saṃvaṇṇanāvisesānaṃ vicayahārādīnaṃ nissayabhāvato ca paṭhamaṃ desanāhāro dassito.
tika-s0501t0:296_0: Padapucchāvissajjanāpucchāpadānugītīhi saddhiṃ desanāhārapadatthānaṃ assādādīnaṃ pavicayabhāvato desanāhārānantaraṃ vicayo hāro.
tika-s0501t0:297_0: Vicayahārena pavicitānaṃ atthānaṃ yuttāyuttivicāraṇabhāvato vicayahārānantaraṃ yutti hāro.
tika-s0501t0:298_0: Padaṭṭhānahārassa yuttāyuttānaṃyeva atthānaṃ upapattianurūpaṃ kāraṇaparamparāya niddhāraṇattā yuttihārānantaraṃ padaṭṭhānahāro.
tika-s0501t0:299_0: Yuttāyuttānaṃ kāraṇaparamparāya pariggahitasabhāvānaṃyeva ca dhammānaṃ avuttānampi samānalakkhaṇatāya
tika-s0501t0:300_0: Lakkhaṇahārena atthato suttantarato niddhāritānampi dhammānaṃ nibbacanādīni vattabbāni,
tika-s0501t0:300_1: na sutte sarūpato āgatadhammānaṃyevāti dassanatthaṃ lakkhaṇahārānantaraṃ catubyūho hāro.
tika-s0501t0:301_0: Catubyūhena hārena vuttehi nibbacanādhippāyanidānehi saddhiṃ sutte padatthānaṃ suttantarasaṃsandanasaṅkhāte
tika-s0501t0:301_1: pubbāparavicāre dassite tesaṃ suttapadatthānaṃ sabhāgavisabhāgadhammantarāvaṭṭanaṃ sukhena sakkā dassetunti
tika-s0501t0:301_5: ananuyogassa mūlaṃ pamādoti suttantare dassito pamādo āvaṭṭitoti.
tika-s0501t0:302_0: Āvaṭṭena hārena sabhāgavisabhāgadhammāvaṭṭanena payojite sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇavasena saṃkilesavodānadhammānaṃ
tika-s0501t0:302_1: padaṭṭhānato ceva bhūmito ca vibhāgo sakkā sukhena yojetunti āvaṭṭahārānantaraṃ vibhatti hāro.
tika-s0501t0:303_0: Vibhattihārena saṃkilesavodānadhammānaṃ vibhāge kate saṃvaṇṇetabbasutte āgatā dhammā akasirena paṭipakkhato
tika-s0501t0:303_2: Vibhattihārena hi “sammādiṭṭhissa purisapuggalassa micchādiṭṭhi nijjiṇṇā hotī”ti paṭivibhattasabhāve
tika-s0501t0:304_0: Parivattanahārena paṭipakkhato parivattitāpi dhammā pariyāyavacanehi bodhetabbā,
tika-s0501t0:304_1: na saṃvaṇṇetabbasutte āgatadhammāyevāti dassanatthaṃ parivattanahārānantaraṃ vevacanahāro.
tika-s0501t0:305_0: Vevacanahārena pariyāyato pakāsitānaṃ dhammānaṃ pabhedato paññattivasena vibhajanaṃ sukhena sakkā ñātunti vevacanahārānantaraṃ paññatti hāro.
tika-s0501t0:306_1: āgatadhammānaṃ paṭiccasamuppādādimukhena avataraṇaṃ sakkā dassetunti paññattihārānantaraṃ otaraṇo hāro.
tika-s0501t0:307_0: Otaraṇena hārena dhātāyatanādīsu otāritānaṃ saṃvaṇṇetabbasutte padatthānaṃ pucchārambhasodhanaṃ sakkā
tika-s0501t0:308_0: Sodhanena hārena saṃvaṇṇetabbasutte padapadatthesu visodhitesu tattha tattha ekattatāya vā vemattatāya
tika-s0501t0:308_1: vā labbhamānasāmaññavisesabhāvo sukaro hotīti dassetuṃ sodhanahārānantaraṃ adhiṭṭhāno hāro.
tika-s0501t0:309_0: Sāmaññavisesabhūtesu sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇesu dhammesu adhiṭṭhānena hārena paveditesu parikkhārasaṅkhātassa
tika-s0501t0:309_1: sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇarūpassa paccayaheturāsissa pabhedo suviññeyyoti adhiṭṭhānahārānantaraṃ parikkhāro hāro.
tika-s0501t0:310_1: sādhāraṇe ca kāraṇe parikkhārena hārena dassite tassa attano phalesu kāraṇākāro,
tika-s0501t0:310_3: bhāvetabbapahātabbadhammānaṃ bhāvanāpahānāni ca niddhāretvā vuccamānāni sammā saṃvaṇṇetabbasuttassa atthaṃ
tika-s0501t0:310_4: tathattāvabodhāya saṃvattantīti parikkhārahārānantaraṃ samāropano hāro dassito hoti.
tika-s0501t0:311_8: Tasmā tipukkhalānantaraṃ sīhavikkīḷitanayo dassitoti tiṇṇaṃ atthanayānaṃ dassanānukkamo veditabbo.
tika-s0501t0:311_9: Atthanayānaṃ disābhūtāya bhūmiyā āloketvā tesaṃ tassā disāya bhūmiyā samānayanaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t0:311_10: Na hi sakkā anoloketvā samānetunti disālocananayaṃ dassetvā aṅkusanayo dassito.
tika-s0501t0:311_11: Potthakāruḷhāvachekā sabbāsu disāsu hatthigamanaṭṭhānaṃ oloketvā aṅkusena icchitaṭṭhānaṃ samānayanti.
tika-s0501t0:311_15: Evameva paṇḍitā suttatthaṃ vaṇṇentā manasāva oloketvāva nayā netabbāti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0501t0:312_0: Samuṭṭhānasaṃvaṇṇanā adhippāyasaṃvaṇṇanā padatthasaṃvaṇṇanā vidhianuvādasaṃvaṇṇanā nigamanasaṃvaṇṇanāti vā,
tika-s0501t0:312_1: payojanasaṃvaṇṇanā piṇḍatthasaṃvaṇṇanā anusandhisaṃvaṇṇanā codanāsaṃvaṇṇanā parihārasaṃvaṇṇanāti vā,
tika-s0501t0:312_3: tathā ekanāḷikākathā caturassakathā nisinnavattikākathāti vā āgatā.
tika-s0501t0:314_0: Pāḷiṃ vatvā ekekapadassa atthakathanasaṅkhātā saṃvaṇṇanā ekanāḷikākathā nāma.
tika-s0501t0:315_0: Paṭipakkhaṃ dassetvā paṭipakkhassa upamaṃ dassetvā sapakkhaṃ dassetvā sapakkhassa upamaṃ dassetvā kathanasaṅkhātā saṃvaṇṇanā caturassakathā nāma.
tika-s0501t0:316_0: Visabhāgadhammavaseneva pariyosānaṃ gantvā puna sabhāgadhammavaseneva pariyosānagamanasaṅkhātā saṃvaṇṇanā nisinnavattikākathā nāma.
tika-s0501t0:317_0: Tā sabbā saṃvaṇṇanāyopi desanāhārādīsu nettisaṃvaṇṇanāsu antogadhāyeva.
tika-s0501t0:317_4: Hetuphalabhūmiupanisāsabhāgavisabhāgalakkhaṇanayādayo pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vitthārato vuttāti na vitthārayissāmīti.
tika-s0501t0:322_1: Evaṃ hārādayo sarūpato ācariyena uddesato uddiṭṭhā,
tika-s0501t0:322_4: atha kasmā puna “tattha katamo desanāhāro”tiādiko āraddhoti ce?
tika-s0501t0:322_6: Veneyyā hi atitikkhapañño nātitikkhapañño mandapaññoti tividhā honti.
tika-s0501t0:322_9: idāni mandapaññassānurūpaṃ hārādayo vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “tattha katamo desanāhāro”tiādiko vibhaṅgavāro āraddho.
tika-s0501t0:322_10: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “evaṃ hārādayosukhaggahaṇatthaṃ gāthābandhavasena sarūpato niddisitvā idāni tesu hāre
tika-s0501t0:322_11: tāva paṭiniddesavasena vibhajituṃ ‘tattha katamo desanāhāro’tiādi āraddha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:323_3: sā ayaṃ gāthā niddesavasena desanāhāro nāma,
tika-s0501t0:323_4: tassa “assādādīnavatā”tiādi niddesassa idāni mayā vuccamāno “ayaṃ desanāhāro kiṃ desayatī”tiādiko vitthārasaṃvaṇṇanāviseso
tika-s0501t0:323_6: “Ayaṃ desanāhāro kiṃ desayatī”ti pucchitabbattā pucchaṃ ṭhapetvā “imaṃ desayatī”ti niyametvā dassetuṃ “ayaṃ desanāhāro kiṃ desayati?
tika-s0501t0:323_8: Tattha ayaṃ desanāhāro kiṃ desayatīti ce?
tika-s0501t0:324_0: Ettha ca “ayaṃ desanāhāro”ti saddo pubbāparāpekkhoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0501t0:324_1: “‘Assādādīnavatā’tiādigāthāyaṃ dassitā ime assādādayo kattha saṃvaṇṇetabbe pāḷidhamme āgatā”ti pucchitabbattā “dhammaṃ vo,
tika-s0501t0:324_4: “‘Assādādīnavatā’tiādigāthāyaṃ dassitā ime assādādayo kattha saṃvaṇṇetabbe pāḷidhamme āgatā”ti pucchitabbattā “dhammaṃ vo,
tika-s0501t0:324_6: desessāmi ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ
tika-s0501t0:324_7: brahmacariyaṃ pakāsessāmī”ti paṭiññātabbe pāḷidhamme saṃvaṇṇetabbe ye assādādayo āgatā,
tika-s0501t0:325_3: tasmā idha mayā na vutto. Vo-
tika-s0501t0:325_8: saṃsāre bhayaṃ ikkhanti paccavekkhantīti vā bhikkhū.
tika-s0501t0:325_10: kimatthāyāti attano mukhābhimukhaṃ katvā dhammassavane atiussāhane niyojetuṃ ālapatīti veditabbo.
tika-s0501t0:326_0: Dhammaṃ desessāmīti nāhaṃ issaratāya tumhe aññaṃ kiñci kāreyyāmi,
tika-s0501t0:326_2: desento ca na aññesaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā sutamayañāṇānusārena desessāmi,
tika-s0501t0:326_3: anāvaraṇañāṇena sabbañeyyadhammesu paccakkhakāritāya idāni mayāyeva pavattiyamānaṃ dhammaṃ ahaṃ desessāmīti paṭijānāti.
tika-s0501t0:326_7: Ādikalyāṇādayo cettha atthakalyāṇādivasena vuttāti daṭṭhabbā. Tenāha –
tika-s0501t0:327_2: ṭhānūpacārato atthassa ñātabbassa ārammaṇapaccayasatti attho, iti-
tika-s0501t0:327_7: saha atthena yo dhammo vattatīti so dhammo sāttho,
tika-s0501t0:327_14: pamādalekhādirahitattā ca avayavo sampanno taṃsamūhattā dhammo sampannabyañjano nāma,
tika-s0501t0:327_26: brahmānaṃ vā seṭṭhānaṃ ariyānaṃ cariyaṃ brahmacariyaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:328_3: pakāsessāmī”ti paṭiññātabbe pāḷidhamme āgate assādādayo desanāhāro desayati saṃvaṇṇeti vitthāretīti ācariyena sāmaññavaseneva vuttaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:328_4: tasmā desanāhāro idha pāḷiyaṃ āgataṃ imaṃ assādaṃ desayati,
tika-s0501t0:328_5: idha pāḷiyaṃ āgataṃ imaṃ ādīnavaṃ desayatītiādi viseso na viññātabbo,
tika-s0501t0:328_6: “kathaṃ viññātabbo”ti pucchitabbattā “idha pāḷiyaṃ āgato ayaṃ assādo,
tika-s0501t0:328_7: idha pāḷiyaṃ āgato ayaṃ ādīnavo”ti visesaṃ niyametvā upalakkhaṇanayena dassetuṃ “tattha katamo assādo?
tika-s0501t0:328_9: Tattha tatthāti tassaṃ “assādādīnavatā”tiādigāthāyaṃ niddiṭṭhesu visayavisayibhedesu assādesu katamo
tika-s0501t0:328_10: assādo tattha tesu pāḷidhammesu kattha pāḷiyaṃ āgatoti pucchitvā –
tika-s0501t0:330_0: Addhā pītimano hoti, laddhā macco yadicchatī”ti. –
tika-s0501t0:331_0: Idha pāḷigāthāyaṃ yo visayabhūto assādo āgato,
tika-s0501t0:331_1: so ayaṃ assādetabbo assādo desanāhārassa visayoti.
tika-s0501t0:332_1: pakāsito ca sāsanadhammo yesaṃ assādādīnaṃ dassanavasena pavatto,
tika-s0501t0:332_2: te assādādayo desanāhārassa visayabhūtā yattha yattha pāṭhe savisesaṃ vuttā,
tika-s0501t0:332_3: tato tato niddhāretvā udāharaṇavasena idhānetvā dassetuṃ ‘tattha katamo assādo’tiādi āraddha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:333_5: Tassa pītiyā yuttaṃ mano etassāti pītimano.
tika-s0501t0:333_7: Kāmaṃ kāmitabbaṃ vatthu kāmayamānassa tassa sattassa etaṃ kāmitabbaṃ vatthu sace samijjhati,
tika-s0501t0:333_8: evaṃ sati so satto addhā pītimano hoti.
tika-s0501t0:333_10: taṃ vatthuṃ so macco laddhā addhā pītimano hotīti gāthāyattho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0501t0:334_1: pītimano hotī”ti ettakameva avatvā “laddhā macco yadicchatī”ti vuttattā lobhanīyaṃ vatthuṃyeva laddhā pītimano na hoti,
tika-s0501t0:334_2: atha kho patthetabbaṃ pūjetabbanti sabbaṃ laddhā macco pītimano ca hotīti atirekattho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0501t0:335_0: Visayabhūto assādetabbo assādo idha pāḷiyaṃ gāthāyaṃ āgatoti ācariyena vibhatto,
tika-s0501t0:335_2: “dukkhadomanassādibhedesu ādīnavesu katamo ādīnavo kattha pāḷidhamme āgato”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamo ādīnavo?
tika-s0501t0:335_4: Tattha tatthāti tassaṃ “assādādīnavatā”tiādigāthāyaṃ niddiṭṭhesu dukkhadomanassādīsu ādīnavesu katamo
tika-s0501t0:335_5: ādīnavo tattha tesu pāḷidhammesu kattha pāḷiyaṃ āgatoti pucchitvā –
tika-s0501t0:338_0: Idha pāḷigāthāyaṃ yo domanassasaṅkhāto ādīnavo āgato,
tika-s0501t0:338_1: so ayaṃ domanassasaṅkhāto ādīnavo desanāhārassa visayoti.
tika-s0501t0:339_3: Chando jāto yassa so chandajāto, tassa.
tika-s0501t0:339_7: Kāmaṃ kāmayānassa chandajātassa jantuno ye kāmā labhitabbā,
tika-s0501t0:339_8: te kāmā kenaci antarāyena yadā parihāyanti,
tika-s0501t0:340_0: Domanassabhūto ādīnavo idha pāḷiyaṃ āgatoti ācariyena vibhatto,
tika-s0501t0:340_2: “magganibbānavasena duvidhesu nissaraṇesu katamaṃ nissaraṇaṃ kattha pāḷiyaṃ āgata”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ nissaraṇaṃ?
tika-s0501t0:340_4: Tattha tatthāti tassaṃ “assādādīnavatā”tiādigāthāyaṃ niddiṭṭhesu magganibbānavasena duvidhesu nissaraṇesu
tika-s0501t0:340_5: katamaṃ nissaraṇaṃ tattha tesu pāḷidhammesu kattha pāḷidhamme āgatanti pucchitvā –
tika-s0501t0:343_0: Idha pāḷigāthāyaṃ yaṃ samativattanakaraṇaṃ maggasaṅkhātaṃ nissaraṇaṃ āgataṃ,
tika-s0501t0:343_1: taṃ idaṃ maggasaṅkhātaṃ samativattanakaraṇaṃ nissaraṇaṃ desanāhārassa visayanti.
tika-s0501t0:344_0: Gāthāyaṃ yoti jhānalābhī vā ariyo vā.
tika-s0501t0:344_2: Tesu pavattachandarāgassa vikkhambhanena vā samucchindanena vā parivajjeti.
tika-s0501t0:344_4: Sappassa siro siraṃ cakkhumā puriso disvā padā pādena parivajjeti iva,
tika-s0501t0:344_6: Sato satisampanno so puggalo loke rūpādīsu visattikaṃ imaṃ taṇhaṃ yena maggena samativattati saṃ suṭṭhu atikkamitvā vattati,
tika-s0501t0:344_7: idaṃ maggasaṅkhātaṃ samativattanakaraṇaṃ ekadesaṃ nissaraṇaṃ nāmāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:345_0: Ekadeso visayasaṅkhāto assādo idha pāḷiyaṃ āgatoti ācariyena vibhatto,
tika-s0501t0:345_2: “ekadeso visayisaṅkhāto assādo kattha pāḷiyaṃ āgato”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamo assādo?
tika-s0501t0:345_10: idāni visayisaṅkhātaṃ assādaṃ vibhajituṃ “tattha katamo assādo?
tika-s0501t0:345_12: Tattha tatthāti tassaṃ “assādādīnavatā”tiādigāthāyaṃ niddiṭṭhesu visayavisayibhedesu assādesu katamo
tika-s0501t0:345_13: assādo tattha tesu pāḷidhammesu kattha pāḷiyaṃ āgatoti pucchitvā –
tika-s0501t0:347_0: Thiyo bandhū puthū kāme, yo naro anugijjhatī”ti. –
tika-s0501t0:348_0: Idha pāḷigāthāyaṃ yo anugijjhanasaṅkhāto assādo āgato,
tika-s0501t0:348_1: so ayaṃ anugijjhanasaṅkhāto visayiassādo desanāhārassa visayoti.
tika-s0501t0:349_0: Gāthāyaṃ khettanti khipīyanti bījāni ettha ṭhāneti khettaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:349_4: tassa cittuppādassa upanissayapaccayabhūtassa kedārassa viruḷhāpanasatti phalūpacārattho, iti-
tika-s0501t0:349_6: tassā sattiyā patiṭṭhaṃ kedārasaṅkhātaṃ ṭhānaṃ ta-
tika-s0501t0:349_8: Esa nayo tīsu piṭakesu evarūpesu ca vacanatthesu yathārahaṃ nīharitvā gahetabbo.
tika-s0501t0:350_0: Hinoti pavattati pītisomanassanti hi, kiṃ taṃ?
tika-s0501t0:350_2: rāti pavatteti jātarūpanti raṃ, kiṃ taṃ?
tika-s0501t0:350_9: pavattamānaṃ pītisomanassaṃ pavattetvā jane visesena tosetīti attho gahetabbo. Vā-
tika-s0501t0:350_17: sāmikānaṃ dātabbaṃ paṭhamaṃ datvā pacchā asanti bhakkhantīti attho.
tika-s0501t0:350_18: Sāmikehi vā dinnaṃ asanti bhakkhantīti dāsā,
tika-s0501t0:350_19: dukkhena kasirena asanti pavattantīti vā dāsā,.
tika-s0501t0:350_21: puraṃ hitaṃ vā isanti gavesantīti purisā.
tika-s0501t0:350_22: Buddhapaccekabuddhacakkavattibhāvaṃ pureti kammanti puraṃ, kiṃ taṃ?
tika-s0501t0:350_27: Purisā hi mātūnaṃ pituṭṭhāne ṭhitā”ti ime vacanatthā vuttappakārā yuttāyeva atthasambhavato.
tika-s0501t0:350_33: Ṭhanti patiṭṭhahanti ettha mātugāme puttadhītāti thiyo.
tika-s0501t0:351_0: Ekadeso domanassasaṅkhāto ādīnavo idha pāḷigāthāyaṃ āgatoti ācariyena vibhatto,
tika-s0501t0:351_2: “dukkhasaṅkhāto ādīnavo kattha pāḷiyaṃ āgato”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamo ādīnavo?
tika-s0501t0:351_5: Abalā naṃ balīyantī”tiādi kasmā evaṃ āraddhaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:351_7: Tassa ce kāmayānassā”tiādinā ādīnavo vibhattoti? Saccaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:351_9: tasmiṃ bahuvidhe ādīnave ekadeso domanassasaṅkhāto ādīnavo pubbe vibhatto,
tika-s0501t0:351_10: idāni dukkhasaṅkhātaṃ ādīnavaṃ vibhajituṃ “tattha katamo ādīnavo?
tika-s0501t0:351_12: Tattha tatthāti tassaṃ “assādādīnavatā”tiādigāthāyaṃ niddiṭṭhesu dukkhadomanassādīsu ādīnavesu katamo
tika-s0501t0:351_13: ādīnavo tattha tesu pāḷidhammesu kattha pāḷidhamme āgatoti pucchitvā –
tika-s0501t0:354_0: Idha pāḷigāthāyaṃ yo dukkhasaṅkhāto ekadeso ādīnavo āgato,
tika-s0501t0:354_1: so ayaṃ dukkhasaṅkhāto ekadeso ādīnavo desanāhārassa visayoti.
tika-s0501t0:355_0: Gāthāyaṃ natthi balaṃ etesaṃ kilesānanti abalā.
tika-s0501t0:355_4: saddhābalādivirahato vā abalaṃ taṃ naraṃ balīyanti abhibhavanti.
tika-s0501t0:355_5: Kiñcāpi kilesā kusalehi pahātabbattā abalā honti,
tika-s0501t0:355_6: tathāpi kāmamanugijjhantaṃ saddhābalādivirahitaṃ abhibhavituṃ samatthā bhavanti.
tika-s0501t0:355_8: kāmaṃ rakkhantañca enaṃ naraṃ pari samantato paripīḷetvā ayanti pavattantīti parissayā,
tika-s0501t0:355_10: Tato tehi parissayehi abhibhūtaṃ naṃ naraṃ jātiādidukkhaṃ anveti anugacchati.
tika-s0501t0:356_0: Ekadesaṃ maggasaṅkhātaṃ nissaraṇaṃ idha pāḷigāthāyaṃ āgatanti ācariyena vibhattaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:356_2: “nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ ekadesaṃ nissaraṇaṃ kattha pāḷidhamme āgata”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ nissaraṇaṃ?
tika-s0501t0:356_5: Tasmā jantu sadā sato”tiādi kasmā evaṃ āraddhaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:356_7: Yo kāme parivajjetī”tiādinā nissaraṇaṃ vibhattanti? Saccaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:356_9: tattha duvidhe nissaraṇe maggasaṅkhātaṃ nissaraṇaṃ pubbe vibhattaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:356_10: idāni nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ nissaraṇaṃ vibhajituṃ “tattha katamaṃ nissaraṇaṃ?
tika-s0501t0:356_12: Tattha tatthāti tassaṃ “assādādīnavatā”tiādigāthāyaṃ niddiṭṭhesu magganibbānesu nissaraṇesu ekadesaṃ
tika-s0501t0:356_13: nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ nissaraṇaṃ tattha tesu pāḷidhammesu kattha pāḷidhamme āgatanti pucchitvā –
tika-s0501t0:358_0: Te pahāya tare oghaṃ, nāvaṃ sitvāva pāragū”ti. –
tika-s0501t0:359_0: Idha pāḷigāthāyaṃ yaṃ nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ nissaraṇaṃ āgataṃ, idaṃ nissaraṇaṃ desanāhārassa visayanti.
tika-s0501t0:360_0: Gāthāyaṃ tasmāti yasmā kāmagiddhaṃ naraṃ dukkhaṃ anveti,
tika-s0501t0:360_1: tasmā jantu sadā sabbakāle pubbarattāpararatte jāgariyānuyogena sato satisampanno hutvā kāmāni kilesakāme
tika-s0501t0:360_2: vikkhambhanavasena vā samucchedavasena vā parivajjaye parijaheyya.
tika-s0501t0:360_3: Te kāme ariyamaggena pahāya catubbidhaṃ oghaṃ tareyya tarituṃ sakkuṇeyya.
tika-s0501t0:360_5: Nāvāsāmiko nāvaṃ yaṃ pavisantaṃ udakaṃ sitvā bahi siñcitvā lahukāya nāvāya appakasirena taritvā pāragū pāraṃ gacchati iva,
tika-s0501t0:360_6: evaṃ attani pavattaṃ kilesūdakaṃ siñcitvā ariyamaggena nīharitvā lahukena attabhāvena anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā
tika-s0501t0:360_7: nibbānena pāraṃ nibbānaṃ santiṃ gaccheyyāti attho.
tika-s0501t0:361_0: Idaṃ nissaraṇaṃ idha pāḷidhamme āgatanti ācariyena vibhattaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:361_2: “katamaṃ phalaṃ kattha pāḷidhamme āgata”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ phalaṃ?
tika-s0501t0:361_4: Tattha tatthāti tassaṃ “assādādīnavatā”tiādigāthāyaṃ niddiṭṭhesu rakkhananipphādanamaccutaraṇādīsu phalesu
tika-s0501t0:361_5: katamaṃ phalaṃ tattha tesu pāḷidhammesu kattha pāḷidhamme āgatanti pucchitvā –
tika-s0501t0:362_0: “Dhammo have rakkhati dhammacāriṃ, chattaṃ mahantaṃ yatha vassakāle;
tika-s0501t0:363_0: Esānisaṃso dhamme suciṇṇe, na duggatiṃ gacchati dhammacārī”ti. –
tika-s0501t0:364_0: Idha pāḷigāthāyaṃ yaṃ anatthehi dhammassa rakkhanaphalaṃ āgataṃ,
tika-s0501t0:364_1: rakkhāvahanassa abbhudayassa yañca nipphādanaṃ phalaṃ āgataṃ,
tika-s0501t0:365_0: Gāthāyaṃ dhammoti yena puggalena yo dānādippabhedo puññadhammo nibbattito,
tika-s0501t0:365_2: Dhammacāriṃ dhammanibbattakaṃ taṃ puggalaṃ anatthehi rakkhati. Kimiva?
tika-s0501t0:365_3: Vassakāle deve vassante sati mahantaṃ kusalena dhāretabbaṃ chattaṃ dhārentaṃ kusalaṃ taṃ janaṃ vassatemanato rakkhati yathā,
tika-s0501t0:365_4: evaṃ rakkhitabbo dhammopi attasammāpaṇidhānena appamatto hutvā suṭṭhu dhammaṃ rakkhantaṃyeva rakkhati,
tika-s0501t0:365_6: Eso ānisaṃso suciṇṇe suciṇṇassa dhamme dhammassa ānisaṃsoti attho.
tika-s0501t0:366_0: Ekadesaṃ phalaṃ idha pāḷidhamme āgatanti ācariyena vibhattaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:366_2: “katamo upāyo kattha pāḷiyaṃ āgato”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamo upāyo?
tika-s0501t0:366_4: Tattha tatthāti tassaṃ “assādādīnavatā”tiādigāthāyaṃ niddiṭṭhesu vipassanāpubbaṅgamanibbidādīsu upāyesu
tika-s0501t0:366_5: katamo upāyo tattha tesu pāḷidhammesu kattha pāḷidhamme āgatoti pucchitvā –
tika-s0501t0:369_0: Idha pāḷigāthāsu yo vipassanāpubbaṅgamanibbidāñāṇasaṅkhāto visuddhiyā adhigamahetubhāvato maggo āgato,
tika-s0501t0:370_0: Gāthāsu sabbe niravasesā kammacittotuāhārehi saṅkharitā saṅkhatasaṅkhārā hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccā iti yadā paññāya passati,
tika-s0501t0:370_2: eso vipassanāpubbaṅgamo nibbindanañāṇasaṅkhāto dhammo visuddhiyā maggoti.
tika-s0501t0:370_3: “Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”tiādīsu saṅkhārānaṃ saṅkhatadhammabhāvo paccayākāravibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttova,
tika-s0501t0:370_4: taṃ vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathaṃ anoloketvā ekacce ācariyā “vipassanāñāṇārammaṇattā tebhūmakadhammāyevā”ti vadanti,
tika-s0501t0:371_0: Ekadeso upāyo idha pāḷidhamme āgatoti ācariyena vibhatto,
tika-s0501t0:371_2: “katamā āṇatti kattha pāḷidhamme āgatā”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamā āṇatti?
tika-s0501t0:371_5: katamāṇatti tattha tesu pāḷidhammesu kattha pāḷidhamme āgatāti pucchitvā –
tika-s0501t0:375_0: Gāthāyaṃ cakkhumā puriso vijjamāne parakkame āvahitaṃ sarīraṃ āvahantova hutvā visamāni bhūmippadesāni vā visame hatthiādayo vā parivajjeti iva,
tika-s0501t0:375_1: evaṃ jīvalokasmiṃ paṇḍito pāpāni lāmakāni duccaritāni parivajjeti.
tika-s0501t0:375_2: Āṇatti nāma āṇārahassa dhammarājassa bhagavato āṇā,
tika-s0501t0:377_0: Samādiyatha sīlāni, taṃ vo atthāya hehitī”ti. –
tika-s0501t0:379_7: visuṃ visuṃ pana suttesu āgatā phalūpāyāṇattiyo vibhattā,
tika-s0501t0:379_8: idāni ekato āgatā phalūpāyāṇattiyo vibhajituṃ “suññato lokaṃ avekkhassū”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:380_0: Tattha suññato lokaṃ avekkhassūti sabbampi saṅkhāralokaṃ attato suññoti avasavattitāsallakkhaṇavasena
tika-s0501t0:380_1: vā tucchabhāvasamanupassanavasena vā passāti idaṃ bhagavato vacanaṃ vidhānabhāvato āṇatti nāma.
tika-s0501t0:381_0: “Sadā sato”ti puggalavasena vuttāya satiyā suññatādassanassa sampajānahetubhāvato satiyeva upāyo,
tika-s0501t0:382_0: Attānudiṭṭhiṃ ūhaccāti ettha attānudiṭṭhi nāma “rūpaṃ attā,
tika-s0501t0:382_4: Maggena ūhacca samucchinditvā evaṃ vuttavidhinā maccutaro maccuno visayātikkanto siyā bhaveyya.
tika-s0501t0:382_7: idaṃ bhagavato desanāya phalaṃ desanāhārassa visayanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0501t0:385_0: Ekagāthāyaṃ puna ekato vibhajanato phalādīsu ekato dassitesu sabbattha suttesu vā sabbattha gāthāsu vā
tika-s0501t0:385_1: phalādayo dassetabbā assādādayo viya katthaci niddhāretvāti viseso vijānitabbo.
tika-s0501t0:386_1: Desanāhārassa visayabhūtā assādādayo “idha pāḷidhamme ayaṃ assādo āgato,
tika-s0501t0:386_2: idha pāḷidhamme ayaṃ ādīnavo āgato”tiādinā visesato nidassanavasena sarūpato ācariyena vibhattā,
tika-s0501t0:386_3: te assādādayo tiṇṇaṃ ugghaṭitaññuādīnaṃ puggalānaṃ sāmaññato bhagavā kiṃ nu kho deseti,
tika-s0501t0:386_4: udāhu ekassa puggalassa yathālābhaṃ kiṃ nu desetīti anuyogassa sambhavato imassa puggalassa imaṃ deseti,
tika-s0501t0:386_5: imassa puggalassa imaṃ desetīti puggalabhedena assādādayo vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “tattha bhagavā ugghaṭitaññussā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:386_8: ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca ime dve vipañcitaññussa puggalassa bhagavā deseti,
tika-s0501t0:386_9: assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca ime tayo neyyassa puggalassa bhagavā desetīti yojanattho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0501t0:387_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “evaṃ assādādayo udāharaṇavasena sarūpato dassetvā idāni tattha puggalavibhāgena desanāvibhāgaṃ
tika-s0501t0:388_1: ṭhapīyate vā sappabhedo vitthāro atthoti ugghaṭito,
tika-s0501t0:388_4: uddesamatteneva sappabhedaṃ savitthāraṃ paṭivijjhitabbaṃ atthaṃ paṭivijjhatīti attho.
tika-s0501t0:388_5: Yo puggalo uddeseneva uddiṭṭhamatteneva atthaṃ ñatvā atthasiddhippatto hoti,
tika-s0501t0:389_2: Yo puggalo niddesena niddiṭṭhamattameva atthaṃ ñatvā atthasiddhippatto,
tika-s0501t0:390_1: Yo puggalo paṭiniddesena vā paṭilomena vā vibhattaṃ eva atthaṃ ñatvā atthasiddhippatto,
tika-s0501t0:390_4: ādīnavadesanāya ceva nissaraṇadesanāya ca vipañcitaññussa paṭivedhābhisamayo siddho hoti,
tika-s0501t0:390_5: assādadesanāya ca ādīnavadesanāya ca nissaraṇadesanāya ca neyyassa paṭivedhābhisamayo siddho hotīti adhippāyo idha gahetabbo.
tika-s0501t0:391_6: assādādīnavanissaraṇāni cāti sattasu paṭṭhānanayesu tatiyachaṭṭhasattamāva gahitā,
tika-s0501t0:391_11: ariyamagguppādanañca yathāvuttehi eva tīhi padaṭṭhānanayehi sijjhatīti itare nayā idha na vuttā.
tika-s0501t0:402_3: yehi samannāgatassa mahāpurisassa dveyeva gatiyo bhavanti…pe…
tika-s0501t0:402_4: vivaṭacchadoti sabbaṃ lakkhaṇasuttaṃ ayaṃ assādo ca nissaraṇañca.
tika-s0501t0:409_0: “Tattha katamo assādo ca ādīnavo ca nissaraṇañca?
tika-s0501t0:410_0: ‘Kāmā hi citrā madhurā manoramā, virūparūpena mathenti cittaṃ;
tika-s0501t0:411_0: Tasmā ahaṃ pabbajitomhi rāja, apaṇṇakaṃ sāmaññameva seyyo’ti. –
tika-s0501t0:412_0: Ayaṃ assādo ca ādīnavo ca nissaraṇañcā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:412_1: tasmā tepi nayā idha niddhāretvā veditabbā.
tika-s0501t0:416_0: Mākattha pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, āvi vā yadi vā raho’ti. –
tika-s0501t0:420_0: Yodhetha māraṃ paññāvudhena, jitañca rakkhe anivesano siyā’ti. –
tika-s0501t0:421_0: Ayaṃ upāyo ca āṇatti cā”ti vuttaṃ, tasmā evaṃ phalādīnaṃ dukkhavasenāpi udāharaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:422_0: “Ugghaṭitaññuādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ imassa puggalassa imaṃ deseti,
tika-s0501t0:422_1: imassa puggalassa imaṃ desetī”ti yehi puggalehi assādādayo yathārahaṃ ācariyena vibhattā,
tika-s0501t0:422_4: tāhi bhinnā puggalā ca kittikāti vicāraṇāya sambhavato tā paṭipadā,
tika-s0501t0:422_5: te ca puggalā ettakāti gaṇanato dassetuṃ “tattha catasso paṭipadā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:423_3: te ca puggalā cattāroti yojanā kātabbā.
tika-s0501t0:424_0: Paṭipadābhiññāhi kato vibhāgopi paṭipadāhi kato vibhāgo nāma hoti avinābhāvatoti manasi katvā “catasso
tika-s0501t0:424_5: Pathavīkasiṇādīsu sabbapaṭhamaṃ “pathavī pathavī”tiādinā pavattamanasikārato paṭṭhāya yāva jhānassa upacāraṃ uppajjati,
tika-s0501t0:424_8: tāva pavattā paññā “abhiññā”ti vuccati heṭṭhimapaññāto adhigatapaññābhāvato.
tika-s0501t0:425_0: Sā ca paṭipadā kassaci dukkhā kicchā hoti nīvaraṇādipaccanīkadhammasamudācāraggahaṇatāya,
tika-s0501t0:425_2: abhiññāpi kassaci dandhā asīghappavatti hoti avisadañāṇatāya,
tika-s0501t0:426_1: Yo rūpārūpamukhena vipassanaṃ abhinivisanto cattāri mahābhūtāni pariggahetvā upādārūpaṃ pariggaṇhāti,
tika-s0501t0:426_3: rūpārūpaṃ pana pariggaṇhanto dukkhena kasirena kilamanto pariggahaetauṃ sakkoti,
tika-s0501t0:426_5: Pariggahitarūpārūpassa vipassanāparivāse maggapātubhāvadandhatāya dandhābhiññā nāma hoti.
tika-s0501t0:426_7: Vipassanāvasena pana bhinnāyeva paṭipadābhiññāyo idha daṭṭhabbā abhisamayādhikārattā,
tika-s0501t0:426_8: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “evaṃ yesaṃ puggalānaṃ vasena desanāvibhāgo dassito,
tika-s0501t0:426_9: te puggale paṭipadāvibhāgena vibhajitvā dassetuṃ ‘catasso paṭipadā’tiādi vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:427_0: Catūhi paṭipadābhiññāhi cattāro puggalā sabbeva aniyamato vaṭṭadukkhato kiṃ nu kho niyyanti,
tika-s0501t0:427_2: imāya paṭipadābhiññāya ayaṃ puggalo niyyātī”ti niyamato ca niyyātīti vicāraṇāya sambhavato “ayaṃ puggalo
