tika-s0501t0:1029_3: katamo māno akusalo”ti pucchitabbattā “yaṃ mānaṃ nissāya mānaṃ pajahati,
tika-s0501t0:1029_8: kusaloti yaṃ mānaṃ nissāya upanissāya pahānaṃ pavattitaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1029_9: tena pahānena santāne uppajjanārahaṃ mānaṃ pajahati,
tika-s0501t0:1029_12: akusaloti yo pana māno parahiṃsanādivasena pavattamāno hutvā attano ca parassa ca dukkhaṃ nibbattayati,
tika-s0501t0:1030_0: “Saṃsārāpacayagāminīsu tāsu taṇhāsu katamā apacayagāminī taṇhā kusalā”ti pucchitabbattā “kusalā”ti vuttāya
tika-s0501t0:1030_1: taṇhāya sarūpaṃ dassetuṃ “tattha yaṃ nekkhammasita”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1030_4: “Ariyā puggalā santaṃ āyatanaṃ yaṃ ariyaphaladhammaṃ sacchikatvā upasampajja viharanti,
tika-s0501t0:1030_5: taṃ āyatanaṃ ariyaphaladhammaṃ ahaṃ kudāssu sacchikatvā viharissa”nti patthayantassa tassa kulaputtassa tasmiṃ ariyaphale pihā uppajjati,
tika-s0501t0:1030_8: Ayaṃ ariyaphale pihāsaṅkhātā taṇhā kusalā anavajjā anavajjaariyaphaladhammaṃ uddissa pavattattāti vicayitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1031_2: Tadārammaṇā taṃ cetovimuttiṃ āgamma pavattā taṇhā kusalā anavajjā,
tika-s0501t0:1031_4: tadārammaṇā taṃ paññāvimuttiṃ āgamma pavattā taṇhā kusalā anavajjāti vicayitabbā.
tika-s0501t0:1035_2: katamo so pavicayo”ti pucchitabbattā “tassā ko pavicayo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1035_3: Tassā paññāvimuttiyā ko pavicayoti ce puccheyya “aṭṭha maggaṅgāni –
tika-s0501t0:1035_4: sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhī”ti pavicayo veditabbo.
tika-s0501t0:1035_5: “So pavicayo kattha daṭṭhabbo”ti pucchitabbattā “so katthā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1035_6: So paññāvimuttiyā pavicayo kattha kasmiṃ dhamme daṭṭhabboti pucchati.
tika-s0501t0:1035_7: Catutthe jhāne pāramitāya ukkaṃsagatāya catutthajjhānabhāvanāya so pavicayo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0501t0:1036_0: “Catutthe jhāne pāramitāyā”ti vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ “catutthe hi jhāne”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1036_1: Yo so catutthajjhānalābhī puggalo catutthe jhāne parisuddhaṃ pariyodātaṃ anaṅgaṇaṃ vigatūpakkilesaṃ mudu kammaniyaṃ ṭhitaṃ āneñjappattaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1036_3: so catutthajjhānalābhī puggalo tattha catutthe jhāne aṭṭhavidhaṃ vijjācaraṇaṃ adhigacchati.
tika-s0501t0:1036_6: dve ca visese vā adhigacchatīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1036_8: lokiyābhiññā ceva arahattamaggapaññā cāti cha abhiññā.
tika-s0501t0:1036_9: Manomayiddhi ceva vipassanāñāṇañcāti dve ca visesā honti.
tika-s0501t0:1037_1: kuto āneñjappatta”nti pucchitabbattā “taṃ cittaṃ yato parisuddha”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1037_9: tato parisuddhādīsu ṭhitabhāvato āneñjappattaṃ hotītipi yojanā yuttā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ yugaḷato āgatattā.
tika-s0501t0:1037_11: Saddhāya hi pariggahitaṃ cittaṃ paṭipakkhe assaddhiye na iñjati na calati,
tika-s0501t0:1037_12: vīriyena pariggahitaṃ cittaṃ paṭipakkhe kosajje na iñjati,
tika-s0501t0:1037_13: satiyā pariggahitaṃ cittaṃ paṭipakkhe pamāde na iñjati,
tika-s0501t0:1037_14: samādhinā pariggahitaṃ cittaṃ paṭipakkhe uddhacce na iñjati,
tika-s0501t0:1037_15: paññāya pariggahitaṃ cittaṃ paṭipakkhāya avijjāya na iñjati,
tika-s0501t0:1037_17: Iti imehi chahi dhammehi pariggahitaṃ catutthajjhānacittaṃ āneñjappattaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1037_18: Evaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatattā catutthajjhānacittaṃ channaṃ abhiññāñāṇānañca manomayiddhivipassanāñāṇānañca adhigamūpāyo hoti,
tika-s0501t0:1037_19: tasmā so paññāvimuttiparicayo catutthajjhāne daṭṭhabboyevāti saṅkhepattho.
tika-s0501t0:1037_20: Vitthārato pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tattha upekkhāsatipārisuddhibhāvenā”tiādinā vā “aparo nayo”tiādinā vā vuttoyevāti amhehi na vutto.
tika-s0501t0:1038_4: te rāgādiaṅgaṇādayo katamāya pakkhā”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha aṅgaṇā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1038_5: Tatthāti tesu rāgādiaṅgaṇādīsu aṅgaṇā ca rāgādiaṅgaṇā ca upakkilesā abhijjhādiupakkilesā ca santi,
tika-s0501t0:1038_8: Yā iñjanā phandanā yā ca cittassa aṭṭhiti anavaṭṭhānaṃ atthi,
tika-s0501t0:1038_9: ayaṃ iñjanā aṭṭhiti diṭṭhipakkho iñjanāya ca aṭṭhitiyā ca micchābhinivesahetubhāvatoti pavicayo kātabbo.
tika-s0501t0:1039_0: “Kiṃ pana catutthajjhānacittaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatattāyeva channaṃ abhiññāñāṇānañca manomayiddhivipassanāñāṇānañca
tika-s0501t0:1039_3: dukkhindriyaṃ domanassindriyaṃ sukhindriyaṃ somanassindriyaṃ iti cattārindriyāni catutthajjhāne nirujjhanti,
tika-s0501t0:1039_5: tasmāpi catutthajjhānacittaṃ vuttappakārānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ ñāṇānaṃ adhigamūpāyo hoti,
tika-s0501t0:1039_7: kathaṃ catutthajjhānamattalābhino ciṇṇavasībhāvo siyā”ti vattabbattā so catutthajjhānalābhī catutthajjhāneyeva
tika-s0501t0:1039_8: aṭṭhatvā arūpasamāpattiyopi evaṃ katvā nibbatteti bhāveti,
tika-s0501t0:1039_9: tasmā ciṇṇavasībhāvo hotīti dassetuṃ “so uparimaṃ samāpatti”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1040_0: So rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānalābhī yogāvacaro rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānasamāpattito uparimaṃ ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiṃ santato santatarato manasi karoti.
tika-s0501t0:1040_1: Yathāvuttaṃ uparimaṃ samāpattiṃ santato manasi karoto tassa catutthajjhānalābhino yogāvacarassa catutthajjhāne
tika-s0501t0:1040_2: saññā saññāpadhānā samāpatti oḷārikā viya hutvā saṇṭhahati,
tika-s0501t0:1040_3: paṭighasaññā ca ukkaṇṭhā anabhirati hutvā saṇṭhahati,
tika-s0501t0:1040_4: so yathāvuttena vidhinā manasi karonto yogāvacaro sabbaso niravasesato rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1040_5: atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā “ākāsaṃ ananta”nti manasi katvā pavattamānaṃ ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiṃ
tika-s0501t0:1040_9: Evaṃ rūpāvacarajjhāne ādīnavadassī hutvā tā rūpasaññānānattasaññāyo ārammaṇe samatikkamati,
tika-s0501t0:1040_10: assa yogāvacarassa paṭighasaññā ca abbhatthaṃ gacchati.
tika-s0501t0:1040_12: santavuttinā arūpāvacarasamādhinā samāhitassa yogāvacarassa obhāso rūpāvacarajjhānobhāso antaradhāyati.
tika-s0501t0:1040_13: Rūpānaṃ kasiṇarūpānaṃ jhānacakkhunā dassanañca antaradhāyatīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1041_1: samāhitassa obhāso ca rūpānaṃ dassanañca antaradhāyati,
tika-s0501t0:1041_5: so duvidhopi samādhi anabhijjhābyāpādavīriyārambhehi tīhi upakārakaṅgehi ca passaddhisatīhi dvīhi parikkhāraṅgehi
tika-s0501t0:1041_6: ca avikkhittena ekena sabhāvaṅgena ca chahi aṅgehi samannāgatoti paccavekkhitabbo punappunaṃ cintetabbo
tika-s0501t0:1041_8: “Kathaṃ kattha paccavekkhitabbo”ti pucchitabbattā “anabhijjhāsahagataṃ me mānasaṃ sabbaloke”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1042_1: “Paññāvimuttī”ti vuttassa arahattaphalassa samādhissa samathavipassanāsaṅkhātā pubbabhāgapaṭipadā samādhimukhena ācariyena vibhattā,
tika-s0501t0:1042_2: “tāya paṭipadāya labhitabbo arahattaphalasamādhi kittakena veditabbo”ti pucchitabbattā “so samādhi pañcavidhena veditabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1043_0: “Kathaṃ pañcavidhañāṇadassanaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ bhavatī”ti vattabbattā “ayaṃ samādhī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1043_1: Ayaṃ arahattaphalasamādhi appitappitakkhaṇe phalasamāpattisukhattā paccuppannasukho hoti,
tika-s0501t0:1043_2: iti paccavekkhantassa assa arahato paccattameva ñāṇadassanaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ bhavati.
tika-s0501t0:1043_3: Ayaṃ arahattaphalasamādhi āyatiṃ samāpajjitabbassa arahattaphalasamādhissa upanissayapaccayattā āyatiṃ sukhavipāko hoti,
tika-s0501t0:1043_8: Ayaṃ arahattaphalasamādhi akāpurisehi sammāsambuddhapaccekabuddhasāvakabuddhehi sevitabbattā akāpurisasevito hoti,
tika-s0501t0:1043_10: Ayaṃ arahattaphalasamādhi aṅgasantakilesadarathasantattā santo ceva divasampi samāpajjantassa atittikaraṇato
tika-s0501t0:1043_11: paṇīto ca paṭippassaddhakilesena arahatā puggalena laddhattā paṭippassaddhiladdho ca arahattamaggasamādhisaṅkhātena
tika-s0501t0:1043_12: ekodibhāvena adhigatattā ekodibhāvādhigato ca sasaṅkhārena sapayogena adhigatattā,
tika-s0501t0:1043_16: iti paccavekkhantassa assa arahato paccattameva ñāṇadassanaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ bhavatīti pañcavidhena ñāṇadassanena
tika-s0501t0:1044_1: kittakā vipassanā”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha yo ca samādhi paccuppannasukho”tiādi vuttaṃ. Samatho,
tika-s0501t0:1044_5: “tassa arahattaphalasamādhissa pubbabhāgapaṭipadāyaṃ vutto samādhi kittakena veditabbo”ti pucchitabbattā “so samādhi pañcavidhena veditabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1044_16: kittakā vipassanā”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha yo ca pītipharaṇo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1045_4: Imehi dasahi ārammaṇehi kasiṇehipi samādhi vicinitvā veditabboti.
tika-s0501t0:1045_7: Kasiṇanti ca kasiṇamaṇḍalampi parikammampi paṭibhāganimittampi tasmiṃ paṭibhāganimitte uppannajjhānampi vuccati,
tika-s0501t0:1046_1: udāhu aññopi yojetabbo”ti vattabbattā satipaṭṭhānādipubbabhāgapaṭipadābhedena anekabhedabhinno niravaseso
tika-s0501t0:1046_2: ariyamaggopi vicayitvā yojetabboti dassetuṃ “evaṃ sabbo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1046_3: Tattha evanti mayā vuttanayena vuttanayānusārena sabbo niravaseso satipaṭṭhānādipubbabhāgapaṭipadābhedena anekabhedabhinno ariyo maggo yojetabbo. Kathaṃ?
tika-s0501t0:1046_4: Yena yena anabhijjhādiākārena paccuppannasukhatādiākārena samādhi mayā vutto,
tika-s0501t0:1046_5: tena tena anabhijjhādiākārena paccuppannasukhatādiākārena yo yo ariyamaggo samathena yojetuṃ sambhavati,
tika-s0501t0:1046_6: so so ariyamaggo samathena vicayitvā yojayitabbo.
tika-s0501t0:1046_7: Yo yo ariyamaggo vipassanāya yojetuṃ sambhavati,
tika-s0501t0:1046_8: so so ariyamaggo vipassanāya yojayitvā yojayitabboti attho gahetabbo.
tika-s0501t0:1047_1: te samathādhiṭṭhānā vipassanādhammā katamehi dhammehi saṅgahitā”ti pucchitabbattā “te tīhi dhammehi saṅgahitā
tika-s0501t0:1047_3: te samathādhiṭṭhānā vipassanādhammā “aniccatāya paññāya dukkhatāya paññāya anattatāya paññāyā”ti tīhi anupassanādhammehi saṅgahitā gaṇhitāti attho.
tika-s0501t0:1047_4: Aniccatādinā sahacaraṇato anupassanāpaññāpi “aniccatā dukkhatā anattatā”ti vuccati.
tika-s0501t0:1048_0: “Yo yogī puggalo samathādhiṭṭhānaṃ vipassanaṃ bhāvayamāno hoti,
tika-s0501t0:1048_1: so yogī puggalo kiṃ bhāvayatī”ti pucchitabbattā “so samathavipassanaṃ bhāvayamāno”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1049_0: Samathavipassanādīni bhāvayamāno puggalo rāgacarito dosacarito mohacaritoti tividho,
tika-s0501t0:1049_1: “tattha katamo puggalo katamena katamena vimokkhamukhena niyyāti,
tika-s0501t0:1049_11: katamaṃ katamaṃ vijaṭento niyyātī”ti pucchitabbattā “rāgacarito puggalo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1049_12: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “idāni yesaṃ puggalānaṃ yattha sikkhantānaṃ visesato niyyānamukhāni,
tika-s0501t0:1049_14: tehi saddhiṃ tāni dassetuṃ ‘rāgacarito’tiādi vutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1050_0: “Kasmā tīṇi vimokkhamukhāni bhāvayanto tayo khandhe bhāvayatī”ti vattabbattā “tattha suññatavimokkhamukha”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1050_5: Iti tīhi vimokkhamukhehi tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ saṅgahitattā tīṇi vimokkhamukhāni bhāvayanto so yogī puggalo
tika-s0501t0:1050_6: tayo khandhe bhāvayatiyevāti paññāpadhānādibhāvo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto.
tika-s0501t0:1050_7: Tayo khandhe bhāvayanto ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvayati.
tika-s0501t0:1050_8: “Kasmā bhāvayatī”ti vattabbattā kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “tattha yā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1051_2: “kathaṃ samathavipassanābhāvo jānitabbo”ti vattabbattā tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ samathavipassanābhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “tattha sīlakkhandho cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1051_4: tassa yogino puggalassa bhavaṅgāni katamaṃ bhāvanaṃ gacchantī”ti pucchitabbattā “yo samathavipassanaṃ bhāveti,
tika-s0501t0:1051_6: Kāyo ca cittañca dve bhavaṅgāni upapattibhavassa aṅgāni bhāvanaṃ vaḍḍhanaṃ gacchanti.
tika-s0501t0:1051_7: Sīlañca samādhi ca dve padāni dve pādā bhavanirodhagāminī paṭipadā bhāvanaṃ vaḍḍhanaṃ gacchanti.
tika-s0501t0:1052_6: sammāvāyāmo ca dve dhammā bhāvanaṃ gacchanti kāyasamācārasīlattā.
tika-s0501t0:1052_7: Sīle vācāsaṃvaraājīvasaṃvaravasena pavatte sīle bhāviyamāne sati sammāvācā ca sammāājīvo ca dve dhammā bhāvanaṃ gacchanti vācādisaṃvarasīlattā.
tika-s0501t0:1052_8: Citte cittasaṃvaravasena pavatte citte bhāviyamāne sati sammāsati ca sammāsamādhi ca dve dhammā bhāvanaṃ gacchanti cittasaṃvarasīlattā.
tika-s0501t0:1052_9: Paññāya bhāviyamānāya sati sammādiṭṭhi ca sammāsaṅkappo ca dve dhammā bhāvanaṃ gacchanti samānattā,
tika-s0501t0:1052_11: Sammāsaṅkappena hi punappunaṃ saṅkappantassa paññā vaḍḍhatīti.
tika-s0501t0:1053_0: “Sammākammanto ca sammāvāyāmo ca dve dhammā kāyavaseneva vibhattā vicetabbā kiṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1053_1: udāhu cittavasena vibhattā vicetabbā ki”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha yo ca sammākammanto”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1053_3: taṃsahito yo ca sammāvāyāmo siyā kāyiko,
tika-s0501t0:1053_5: taṃsahito yo ca sammāvāyāmo siyā cetasiko,
tika-s0501t0:1053_6: tattha tesu kāyikacetasikabhūtesu sammākammantasammāvāyāmesu yo sammākammantasammāvāyāmo kāyasaṅgaho,
tika-s0501t0:1053_8: kāyasaṃvare vā bhāvite sati bhāvanaṃ gacchati.
tika-s0501t0:1053_10: so sammākammantasammāvāyāmo citte cittasaṃvare bhāvite sati bhāvanaṃ gacchatīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1054_0: “Samathavipassanaṃ bhāvayanto so yogī puggalo kittakaṃ adhigamaṃ gacchatī”ti vicayitabbattā “so samathavipassanaṃ bhāvayanto”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1054_3: “Kena katamo adhigamo hotī”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha samathenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1055_1: “Arakkhitena cittenā”tiādisuttattho veneyyānaṃ arahattaphalavimuttimukhena ācariyena vicayito vibhatto,
tika-s0501t0:1055_3: “desakassa dasabalasamannāgatassa dasa balāni kathaṃ vicayitabbānī”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha yo desayati,
tika-s0501t0:1056_0: “Iti mahāthero ‘tasmā rakkhitacittassā’ti gāthāya vasena arahattaphalavimuttimukhena vicayahārasampātaṃ niddisanto,
tika-s0501t0:1056_1: desanākusalatāya anekehi suttappadesehi tassā pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya bhāvanāvisesānaṃ bhāvanānisaṃsānañca
tika-s0501t0:1056_3: idāni dasannaṃ tathāgatabalānampi vasena taṃ dassetuṃ ‘tattha yo desayatī’tiādimāhā”ti –
tika-s0501t0:1057_1: Tattha tatthāti tesu samathavipassanaṃ bhāvayantesu sāsitabbasāsakesu.
tika-s0501t0:1057_2: Dasabalasamannāgato yo desako satthā “arakkhitena cittenā”tiādidhammaṃ deseti,
tika-s0501t0:1057_4: tassa desakassa satthuno dasa balāni vicayitabbānīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1058_1: Tesu dasasu tathāgatabalesu ṭhānāṭṭhānañāṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ nāma,
tika-s0501t0:1058_2: “taṃ balaṃ kathaṃ vicayitabba”nti pucchitabbattā “so tathā ovadito”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1058_5: “Etaṃ ṭhānaṃ na vijjatī”ti jānanaṃ aṭṭhānañāṇaṃ nāma,
tika-s0501t0:1058_6: “etaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti jānanaṃ ṭhānañāṇaṃ nāmāti ṭhānāṭṭhānānaṃ jānanañāṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ vicayitabbanti adhippāyo veditabbo. (1)
tika-s0501t0:1059_1: Ṭhānāṭṭhānañāṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ ācariyena vicayitaṃ vibhattaṃ amhehi ca ñātaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1059_2: “kathaṃ sabbatthagāminipaṭipadāñāṇaṃ dutiyatathāgatabalaṃ vicayitabba”nti pucchitabbattā “iti ṭhānāṭṭhānatā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1059_4: ayaṃ paṭipadā imasmiṃ bhave gāminī”ti sabbattha gāminiyā paṭipadāya jānanañāṇaṃ sabbatthagāminipaṭipadāñāṇaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1059_5: nāmāti sabbatthagāminipaṭipadāñāṇaṃ dutiyaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ vicayitabbanti adhippāyo. (2)
tika-s0501t0:1060_3: “kathaṃ anekadhātunānādhātuñāṇaṃ tatiyaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ vicayitabba”nti pucchitabbattā “iti sabbatthagāminī paṭipadā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1060_4: “Ayaṃ dhātu ca ayaṃ dhātu ca anekadhātu nāma,
tika-s0501t0:1060_5: ayaṃ dhātu ca ayaṃ dhātu ca nānādhātu nāmā”ti anekadhātunānādhātūnaṃ jānanañāṇaṃ anekadhātunānādhātuñāṇaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1061_1: Anekadhātunānādhātuñāṇaṃ tatiyaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ ācariyena vicayitaṃ vibhattaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1061_3: “kathaṃ sattānaṃ nānādhimuttikatāñāṇaṃ catutthaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ vicayitabba”nti pucchitabbattā “iti anekadhātunānādhātukassa lokassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1061_5: ime sattā evaṃ adhimuttā”ti sattānaṃ adhimuccanānaṃ jānanañāṇaṃ sattānaṃ nānādhimuttikatāñāṇaṃ nāmāti
tika-s0501t0:1062_0: Sattānaṃ nānādhimuttikatāñāṇaṃ catutthaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ ācariyena vibhattaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1062_2: “kathaṃ vipākavemattatāñāṇaṃ pañcamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ vicayitabba”nti pucchitabbattā “iti te yathādhimuttā cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1062_6: imassa sukkakammassa ayaṃ vipāko”ti evamādīhi vipākānaṃ nānattajānanañāṇaṃ vipākavemattatāñāṇaṃ nāmāti
tika-s0501t0:1063_3: “kathaṃ jhānānaṃ saṃkilesavodānavuṭṭhānañāṇaṃ chaṭṭhaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ vicayitabba”nti pucchitabbattā “iti tathā samādinnāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1063_4: “Evaṃ samādinnānaṃ kammānaṃ jhānānaṃ vimokkhānaṃ samādhīnaṃ samāpattīnaṃ ayaṃ saṃkileso,
tika-s0501t0:1063_9: evaṃ vuṭṭhahatī”ti jhānānaṃ saṃkilesavodānavuṭṭhānānaṃ anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ jhānānaṃ saṃkilesavodānavuṭṭhānañāṇaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1063_10: nāmāti jhānānaṃ saṃkilesavodānavuṭṭhānañāṇaṃ chaṭṭhaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ vicayitabbanti. (5)
tika-s0501t0:1064_1: Jhānānaṃ saṃkilesañāṇaṃ chaṭṭhaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ ācariyena vicayitaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1064_2: “kathaṃ indriyaparopariyattavemattatāñāṇaṃ sattamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ vicayitabba”nti pucchitabbattā “iti tasseva samādhissā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1064_4: evaṃ akampiyaṭṭhena balānī”ti jānanena saha “ayaṃ mudindriyo,
tika-s0501t0:1065_3: kathaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ navamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ vicayitabba”nti pucchitabbattā “iti tattha yaṃ anekavihita”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1065_5: vā sākārassa sauddesassa anekavihitapubbenivāsassa taṃtaṃbhavassa asesato jānanañāṇaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1066_1: jānanañāṇaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ nāmāti dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ navamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ vicayitabbanti. (8- 9)
tika-s0501t0:1067_1: “kathaṃ sabbāsavakkhayañāṇaṃ dasamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ vicayitabba”nti pucchitabbattā “iti tattha ya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1067_3: idaṃ kilesamāranihanaṃ ñāṇaṃ sabbāsavakkhayañāṇaṃ nāmāti sabbāsavakkhayañāṇaṃ dasamaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ vicayitabbanti ayaṃ saṅkhepattho.
tika-s0501t0:1067_4: Vitthārato pana pāḷito ca aṭṭhakathāto ca yatipotānampi pākaṭo bhaveyyāti maññitvā na dassito.(10)
tika-s0501t0:1068_0: “Ettakova vicayahārasampāto paripuṇṇo”ti vattabbattā “niyutto vicayo hārasampāto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1068_2: te te suttappadesatthā yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena vicayahārasampātena vicayitabbā,
tika-s0501t0:1068_3: so so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto vicayahārasampāto niyutto yathārahaṃ nīharitvā yujjitabboti attho gahetabboti.
tika-s0501t0:1073_1: Yena yena vicayahārasampātena suttappadesatthā ācariyena vicayitabbā,
tika-s0501t0:1073_6: “evaṃ nānānayehi vicayahārasampātaṃ vitthāretvā idāni yuttihārasampātādīni dassetuṃ ‘tattha katamo yuttihārasampāto’tiādi āraddha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1073_7: Tatthāti tesu desanāhārasampātādīsu soḷasasu hārasampātesu katamo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso yuttihārasampāto nāmāti pucchati,
tika-s0501t0:1073_8: pucchitvā yasmiṃ suttappadese vuttānaṃ atthānaṃ yuttibhāvo vicāretabbo,
tika-s0501t0:1077_1: Tassaṃ gāthāyaṃ tasmā arakkhitacittassa māravasānugatattā satisaṃvaraindriyasaṃvarādivasena bhikkhu rakkhitacitto assa bhaveyya,
tika-s0501t0:1077_2: tasmā kāmavitakkādimicchāsaṅkappagocarassa māravasānugatattā nekkhammasaṅkappādivasena bhikkhu sammāsaṅkappagocaro assa bhaveyya,
tika-s0501t0:1077_3: tasmā micchādiṭṭhihatacittassa māravasānugatattā yonisomanasikārena bhikkhu udayabbayaṃ ñatvāna sammādiṭṭhipurekkhāro assa bhaveyya,
tika-s0501t0:1077_4: tasmā thinamiddhena hatacittassa māravasānugatattā vīriyavasena bhikkhu thinamiddhābhibhū assa bhaveyya,
tika-s0501t0:1077_5: tādiso bhikkhu sabbā duggatiyo jahe jahissatīti attho veditabbo.
tika-s0501t0:1078_0: “Tassaṃ gāthāyaṃ kathaṃ yuttibhāvo vicāretabbo”ti vattabbattā “tasmā rakkhitacittassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1078_1: Rakkhitacittassa sammāsaṅkappagocaro bhavissatīti attho yujjati eva,
tika-s0501t0:1078_3: Micchāsaṅkappānampi jahitattā sammādiṭṭhipurekkhāro hutvā viharanto udayabbayaṃ paṭivijjhissatīti attho
tika-s0501t0:1078_5: Udayabbayaṃ paṭivijjhanto sabbā duggatiyo jahissatīti attho yujjati udayabbayānupassanānukkamena ariyamaggasambhavato.
tika-s0501t0:1078_6: Sabbā duggatiyo jahanto sabbāni duggativinipātabhayāni samatikkamissatīti attho yujjati sabbesaṃ duggativinipātabhayānaṃ anuppajjanato.
tika-s0501t0:1079_1: Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena yuttihārasampātena suttappadesatthānaṃ yuttibhāvo vicāretabbo,
tika-s0501t0:1079_2: so so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto yuttihārasampāto niyutto yathārahaṃ niddhāretvā yujjitabboti attho gahetabboti.
tika-s0501t0:1084_1: Yena yena yuttihārasampātena suttappadesatthānaṃ yuttibhāvo ācariyena vibhāvito,
tika-s0501t0:1084_4: “katamo padaṭṭhānahārasampāto”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamo padaṭṭhāno hārasampāto”ti pucchati.
tika-s0501t0:1085_0: Pucchitvā yasmiṃ suttappadese vuttāni padaṭṭhānāni nīharitāni,
tika-s0501t0:1085_4: “Katame gāthātthā katamesaṃ dhammānaṃ padaṭṭhānānī”ti pucchitabbattā “tasmā rakkhitacittassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1085_5: “Tasmā rakkhitacittassā”ti suttappadesassa atthabhūtā indriyesu guttadvāratā tiṇṇaṃ sucaritānaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ nāma sucaritapāripūriyā āsannakāraṇattā.
tika-s0501t0:1085_6: “Sammāsaṅkappagocaro”ti suttappadesassa atthabhūtā nekkhammasaṅkappādayo sammāsaṅkappā samathassa padaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1085_9: ca vipassanāya padaṭṭhānaṃ nāma aniccānupassanādīnaṃ visesakāraṇattā.
tika-s0501t0:1085_10: “Ñatvāna udayabbaya”nti suttappadesassa atthabhūtā udayabbayānupassanāpaññā dassanabhūmiyā padaṭṭhānaṃ nāma paṭhamamaggādhigamassa āsannakāraṇattā.
tika-s0501t0:1085_11: “Thinamiddhābhibhū bhikkhū”ti suttappadesassa atthabhūtaṃ thinamiddhābhibhavanaṃ vīriyassa padaṭṭhānaṃ nāma āsannakāraṇattā.
tika-s0501t0:1085_12: “Sabbā duggatiyo jahe”ti suttappadesassa atthabhūtā pahātabbajahanabhāvanāya ariyamaggabhāvanāya padaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1086_0: “Ettakova padaṭṭhānahārasampāto paripuṇṇo”ti vattabbattā “niyutto padaṭṭhāno hārasampāto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1086_1: Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena padaṭṭhānahārasampātabhūtena suttappadesatthāni padaṭṭhānāni nīharitāni,
tika-s0501t0:1086_2: so so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto padaṭṭhānahārasampāto niyutto yathārahaṃ niddhāretvā yujjitabboti attho gahetabboti.
tika-s0501t0:1091_1: Yena yena padaṭṭhānahārasampātena suttappadesatthāni padaṭṭhānāni ācariyena niddhāritāni,
tika-s0501t0:1091_4: “katamo lakkhaṇahārasampāto”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamo lakkhaṇo hārasampāto”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1091_5: Tattha tesu desanāhārasampātādīsu soḷasasu hārasampātesu katamo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso lakkhaṇahārasampāto nāmāti pucchati.
tika-s0501t0:1092_0: “Katamehi suttatthehi samānalakkhaṇā katame dhammā gahitā”ti pucchitabbattā “tasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1092_2: sammāsaṅkappagocaro”ti suttappadesena vuttaṃ idaṃ rakkhaṇaṃ satindriyaṃ gahitaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1092_3: satindriye gahite saddhādipañcindriyāni gahitāni bhavanti indriyaṭṭhena samānalakkhaṇattā.
tika-s0501t0:1092_5: sammādiṭṭhiyā gahitāya ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo gahito bhavati.
tika-s0501t0:1092_8: Sammādiṭṭhihetuto sammāsaṅkappo hi yasmā pabhavati, tasmā,
tika-s0501t0:1092_9: sammāsaṅkappato sammāvācā hi yasmā pabhavati, tasmā,
tika-s0501t0:1092_10: sammāvācāto sammākammanto hi yasmā pabhavati, tasmā,
tika-s0501t0:1092_11: sammākammantato sammāājīvo hi yasmā pabhavati, tasmā,
tika-s0501t0:1092_12: sammāājīvato sammāvāyāmo hi yasmā pabhavati, tasmā,
tika-s0501t0:1092_14: sammāsatito sammāsamādhi hi yasmā pabhavati, tasmā,
tika-s0501t0:1092_15: sammāsamādhito sammāvimutti hi yasmā pabhavati, tasmā,
tika-s0501t0:1092_16: sammāvimuttito sammāvimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ hi yasmā pabhavati, tasmā,
tika-s0501t0:1093_0: “Ettakova lakkhaṇahārasampāto paripuṇṇo”ti vattabbattā “niyutto lakkhaṇo hārasampāto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1093_1: Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena lakkhaṇahārasampātena suttappadesatthā samānalakkhaṇena gahitā bhavanti,
tika-s0501t0:1093_2: so so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto lakkhaṇahārasampāto niyutto yathārahaṃ niddhāretvā yujjitabboti attho gahitoti.
tika-s0501t0:1098_1: Yena yena lakkhaṇahārasampātena suttappadesatthā samānalakkhaṇena gahitā,
tika-s0501t0:1098_3: “katamo catubyūhahārasampāto”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamo catubyūho hārasampāto”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1098_4: Tattha tesu desanāhārasampātādīsu soḷasasu hārasampātesu katamo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso catubyūhahārasampāto nāmāti pucchati.
tika-s0501t0:1099_0: “Katamasmiṃ sutte katame nirutyādhippāyanidānapubbāparānusandhayo niddhāritā”ti pucchitabbattā “tasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1099_1: “Tasmā rakkhitacittassā”ti suttappadese “rakkhīyate rakkhita”nti niruttiṃ “paripālīyatī”ti iminā pariyāyena dasseti,
tika-s0501t0:1099_21: Esā vuttappakārā paññatti nirutti nāmāti nīharitā.
tika-s0501t0:1100_0: Idha suttappadese bhagavato ko adhippāyoti ce puccheyya,
tika-s0501t0:1100_1: ye sappurisā sabbāhi duggatīhi parimuccitukāmā bhavissanti,
tika-s0501t0:1100_2: te sappurisā dhammacārino rakkhitacittā bhavissantīti ayaṃ adhippāyo.
tika-s0501t0:1101_1: kokāliko sāriputtamoggallānesu theresu cittaṃ arakkhitvā padosayitvā mahāpadumaniraye yasmā upapanno,
tika-s0501t0:1101_2: yasmā bhagavā ca satiārakkhena samannāgato sabbā duggatiyo jahati,
tika-s0501t0:1101_3: tasmā ca sabbā duggatiyo jahitukāmo bhikkhu sappuriso rakkhitacitto assa bhaveyyāti nidānaṃ nīharitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1102_1: suttamhi “satiyā cittaṃ rakkhitabba”nti yaṃ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1102_3: sabbā duggatiyo jahe”ti suttappadeso anusandhi saṃsandati sametīti pubbaparānusandhi niddhāritabboti.
tika-s0501t0:1103_0: “Ettakova catubyūhahārasampāto paripuṇṇo”ti vattabbattā “niyutto catubyūho hārasampāto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1103_1: Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena catubyūhahārasampātena nirutyādhippāyanidānapubbāparānusandhi niddhāritabbo,
tika-s0501t0:1103_2: so so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto catubyūhahārasampāto niyutto yathārahaṃ niddhāretvā yujjitabboti attho gahetabboti.
tika-s0501t0:1108_3: “katamo āvaṭṭahārasampāto”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamo āvaṭṭo hārasampāto”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1108_4: Tattha katamo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso āvaṭṭahārasampāto nāmāti pucchati.
tika-s0501t0:1109_2: avihiṃsāsaṅkappasaṅkhātasammāsaṅkappabahulo mettādivasena adhigatāya cittekaggatāya cittaṃ ṭhapento saṃkilesato rakkhitacitto nāma hoti,
tika-s0501t0:1109_4: sammāsaṅkappagocaro”ti iminā rakkhitacitte vutte sati yā ekaggatā āvaṭṭetabbā,
tika-s0501t0:1109_6: “Sammādiṭṭhipurekkhāro”ti iminā sammādiṭṭhipurekkhāre vutte sati yā paññā āvaṭṭetabbā,
tika-s0501t0:1109_8: “Ñatvāna udayabbaya”nti iminā udayabbayañāṇasamannāgate vutte sati yā dukkhaparijānanā āvaṭṭetabbā,
tika-s0501t0:1109_10: “Thinamiddhābhibhū bhikkhū”ti iminā puggalādhiṭṭhānena yaṃ thinamiddhābhibhavanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1109_12: “Sammā duggatiyo jahe”ti iminā yo sabbaduggatijahanasaṅkhāto anuppādo vutto,
tika-s0501t0:1109_17: samathavipassanāhi maggasaccaṃ āvaṭṭetabbanti imāni cattāri saccāni āvaṭṭetabbānīti.
tika-s0501t0:1110_0: “Ettakova āvaṭṭo hārasampāto paripuṇṇo”ti vattabbattā “niyutto āvaṭṭo hārasampāto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1110_1: Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena āvaṭṭahārasampātena samathādayo āvaṭṭetabbā,
tika-s0501t0:1110_2: so so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto āvaṭṭahārasampāto niyutto yathārahaṃ niddhāretvā yujjitabboti attho gahetabboti.
tika-s0501t0:1115_4: Tattha katamo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso vibhattihārasampāto nāmāti pucchati.
tika-s0501t0:1116_0: “Katame suttatthā kattha vibhattā”ti pucchitabbattā “tasmā rakkhitacittassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1116_3: tissaṃ gāthāyaṃ vutto kusalapakkho dhammo kusalapakkhena dhammena satisaṃvaro dhammo niddisitabbo vibhajitabbo,
tika-s0501t0:1117_2: manodvārasaṃvaro”ti chabbidhena kusalapakkhena dhammena niddisitabbo vibhajitabbo.
tika-s0501t0:1117_3: “Sammāsaṅkappo”ti padena vutto kusalapakkho sammāsaṅkappo dhammo “nekkhammasaṅkappo abyāpāda-
tika-s0501t0:1117_4: saṅkappo avihiṃsāsaṅkappo”ti tividhena kusalapakkhena dhammena vibhajitabbo.
tika-s0501t0:1117_12: idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu ñāṇa”nti aṭṭhavidhena kusalapakkhena dhammena vibhajitabbā.
tika-s0501t0:1117_13: “Ñatvāna udayabbaya”nti padena vuttaṃ kusalapakkhaudayabbayañāṇaṃ dhammajātaṃ paññāsavidhena udayabbayañāṇena kusalapakkhena vibhajitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1119_5: “Micchādiṭṭhihatenā”ti padena gahito micchāsaṅkappo “kāmavitakko byāpādavitakko vihiṃsāvitakko”ti tividhena vibhajitabbo.
tika-s0501t0:1119_6: “Micchādiṭṭhī”ti padena vuttā micchādiṭṭhi “dukkhe aññāṇaṃ…pe…idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu aññāṇa”nti aṭṭhavidhena vibhajitabbā,
tika-s0501t0:1120_1: Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena vibhattihārasampātena suttappadesatthā vibhattā,
tika-s0501t0:1120_2: so so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto vibhattihārasampāto niyuttoti yathāraha niddhāretvā yujjitabboti attho gahetabboti.
tika-s0501t0:1125_3: “katamo parivattanahārasampāto”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamo parivattano hārasampāto”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1126_4: tāya samathavipassanāya bhāvitāya akusalānaṃ nirodho phalaṃ payojanaṃ hoti,
tika-s0501t0:1126_8: Paṭipakkhena pana samathavipassanāya abhāvitāya akusalānaṃ anirodho,
tika-s0501t0:1127_0: “Ettakova parivattanahārasampāto paripuṇṇo”ti vattabbattā “niyutto parivattano hārasampāto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1127_1: Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena parivattanahārasampātena suttappadesatthā parivattetabbā,
tika-s0501t0:1127_2: so so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto parivattanahārasampāto niyutto yathārahaṃ nīharitvā yujjitabboti attho gahetabboti.
tika-s0501t0:1132_3: “katamo vevacano hārasampāto”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamo vevacano hārasampāto”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1133_1: suttapadānaṃ vā katamāni vevacanānī”ti pucchitabbattā “tasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1133_9: “Sammāsaṅkappagocaro”ti ettha sammāsaṅkappassa “nekkhammasaṅkappo abyāpādasaṅkappo avihiṃsāsaṅkappo”ti yaṃ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1133_12: “Sammādiṭṭhipurekkhāro”ti ettha sammādiṭṭhipadassa “sammādiṭṭhi nāma paññāsatthaṃ paññākhaggo paññāratanaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1133_17: cittassa akallatā akammaññatā onāho pariyonāho antosaṅkoco”ti yaṃ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1133_19: “Kāyassa akallatā akammaññatā kāyālasiyaṃ soppaṃ supanā suppitatta”nti yaṃ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1133_23: “Duggati apāyo vinipāto vaṭṭadukkhaṃ saṃsāro”tiādikaṃ yaṃ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1134_0: “Ettakova vevacanahārasampāto paripuṇṇo”ti vattabbattā “niyutto vevacano hārasampāto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1134_1: Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena vevacanahārasampātena vevacanāni nīharitāni,
tika-s0501t0:1134_2: so so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto vevacanahārasampāto niyutto yathāsambhavaṃ nīharitvā yujjitabboti attho gahitoti.
tika-s0501t0:1140_0: “Katamā suttappadesabhūtā paññatti katamesaṃ dhammānaṃ paññattī”ti pucchitabbattā “tasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1140_1: “Tasmā rakkhitacittassā”ti paññatti satiyā padaṭṭhānassa rakkhitabbassa cittassa paññāpanato satiyā padaṭṭhānapaññatti nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1140_2: Satiyā hi rakkhitabbaṃ cittaṃ satiyā padaṭṭhānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1140_4: “adhiṭṭhahitvā rakkhantiyā satiyā rakkhiyamānaṃ cittaṃ tassā adhiṭṭhānaṃ viya hotī”ti.
tika-s0501t0:1140_5: “Sammāsaṅkappagocaro”ti paññatti samathassa bhāvanāya paññāpanato samathassa bhāvanāpaññatti nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1140_7: ñatvāna udayabbaya”nti paññatti dassanabhūmiyā nikkhepassa paññāpanato nikkhepapaññatti nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1140_8: “Thinamiddhābhibhū bhikkhū”ti samudayassa anavasesappahānassa paññāpanato anavasesappahānapaññatti nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1140_9: “Sabbā duggatiyo jahe”ti paññatti maggassa ariyamaggassa bhāvanāya paññāpanato bhāvanāpaññatti nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1141_1: Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena paññattihārasampātena paññattippabhedā niddhāritā,
tika-s0501t0:1141_2: so so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto paññattihārasampāto niyutto yathārahaṃ niddhāretvā yujjitabboti attho gahetabboti.
tika-s0501t0:1146_3: “katamo otaraṇo hārasampāto”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamo otaraṇo hārasampāto”tiādimāha.
tika-s0501t0:1147_0: “Tattha tissaṃ gāthāyaṃ katamāni indriyāni niddhāretvā katamehi niddhāritehi dhammehi otaratī”ti pucchitabbattā “tasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1147_4: sammādiṭṭhiyā gahitāya pañcindriyāni saddhādipañcindriyāni gahitāni bhavanti.
tika-s0501t0:1148_0: Tāniyeva saddhādipañcindriyāni vijjāya upakārattā vā padaṭṭhānattā vā vijjā bhavanti,
tika-s0501t0:1148_1: vijjuppādā tādisāya vijjāya uppādā uppādahetuto avijjānirodho sambhavati,
tika-s0501t0:1148_4: Ayaṃ otaraṇā paṭiccasamuppādena pañcindriyānaṃ otaraṇā nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1149_0: Tāniyeva pañcindriyāni sīlakkhandhena samādhikkhandhena paññākkhandhena tīhi khandhehi saṅgahitāni bhavanti saddhāvīriyehi sīlasambhavato,
tika-s0501t0:1149_2: Ayaṃ otaraṇā khandhehi pañcindriyānaṃ otaraṇā nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1150_3: te anāsavā saṅkhārā dhammadhātusaṅgahitā bhavanti dhammadhātuyā antogadhattā.
tika-s0501t0:1150_4: Ayaṃ otaraṇā dhātūhi pañcindriyānaṃ otaraṇā nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1151_3: Ayaṃ otaraṇā āyatanehi dhammadhātuyā otaraṇā nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1152_0: “Ettakova otaraṇo hārasampāto paripuṇṇo”ti vattabbattā “niyutto otaraṇo hārasampāto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1152_1: Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena otaraṇahārasampātena suttappadesatthā otaritabbā,
tika-s0501t0:1152_2: so so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto otaraṇo hārasampāto niyutto yathārahaṃ niddhāretvā yujjitabboti attho gahetabboti.
tika-s0501t0:1156_0: Ito paṭṭhāya “tattha katamo”tiādianusandhyattho ca pariyosāne “niyutto”tiādianusandhyattho ca vuttanayānusāreneva viññātabbo.
tika-s0501t0:1156_1: Katthaci katthaci pāṭhe apākaṭaṃyeva yathābalaṃ kathayissāma.
tika-s0501t0:1158_4: Yattha pañhe pana ārambho attho na suddho aparipuṇṇo koci vissajjetabbo avasiṭṭho,
tika-s0501t0:1158_5: so pañho tāva vissajjito na bhavati.
tika-s0501t0:1160_4: so sammāsaṅkappo vipassanāya parikkhāroti vibhajitvā yojetabbo.
tika-s0501t0:1162_2: taṃ rakkhitacittaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sucaritānaṃ kammānaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1162_3: Sammādiṭṭhiyā bhāvitāya ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvito bhavati ekato bhāvitabbattā,
tika-s0501t0:1163_0: “Desanāhārasampātādiko hārasampāto yena soḷasappabhedabhāvena suttappadesatthe niddhāretvā yujjito,
tika-s0501t0:1163_1: soḷasappabhedabhāvo kena amhehi saddahitabbo”ti vattabbattā “tenāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1164_1: Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena desanāhārasampātena suttappadesatthā niddhāritā,
tika-s0501t0:1164_2: so so saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūto desanāhārasampātādihārasampāto niyutto yathārahaṃ niddhāretvā yujjitabboti attho gahetabbo,
tika-s0501t0:1167_0: Paṇḍitehi pana aṭṭhakathāṭīkānusārena gambhīrattho vitthārato vibhajitvā gahetabboti.
tika-s0501t0:1169_1: Yena yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesabhūtena desanāhārasampātādinā hārasampātena ekasuttappadesatthā niddhāretvā vibhattā,
tika-s0501t0:1169_5: ekasuttavasena ca hāravicāraṃ dassetvā idāni nayavicāraṃ dassetuṃ ‘tattha katamaṃ nayasamuṭṭhāna’ntiādi āraddha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1169_6: “Tattha katamo nandiyāvaṭṭanayo”tiādiṃ anārabhitvā “tattha katamaṃ nayasamuṭṭhāna”ntiādiārambhane kāraṇaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttameva.
tika-s0501t0:1169_7: Tattha tatthāti tesu hārādīsu yo atthanayo saṃvaṇṇanānayena niddiṭṭho,
tika-s0501t0:1169_8: tasseva atthanayassa samuṭṭhānaṃ bhūmiṃ pucchati “katamaṃ nayasamuṭṭhāna”nti.
tika-s0501t0:1170_1: tathāpi atthanayasaṃvaṇṇanānayānaṃ visesassa pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ puna kathayissāma.
tika-s0501t0:1170_2: Taṇhāavijjāhi saṃkilesapakkhassa suttatthassa catusaccayojanamukhena nayanalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso
tika-s0501t0:1170_3: ceva samathavipassanāhi vodānapakkhassa suttatthassa catusaccayojanamukhena nayanalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso
tika-s0501t0:1170_5: Tīhi akusalamūlehi lobhādīhi saṃkilesapakkhassa suttatthassa catusaccayojanamukhena nayanalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso
tika-s0501t0:1170_6: ceva tīhi kusalamūlehi alobhādīhi vodānapakkhassa suttatthassa catusaccayojanamukhena nayanalakkhaṇo
tika-s0501t0:1170_8: Catūhi subhasaññādīhi vipallāsehi sakalasaṃkilesapakkhassa suttatthassa catusaccayojanamukhena nayanalakkhaṇo
tika-s0501t0:1170_9: saṃvaṇṇanāviseso ceva catūhi asubhasaññādīhi avipallāsehi satipaṭṭhānehi,
tika-s0501t0:1170_10: saddhindriyehi vā vodānapakkhassa suttatthassa catusaccayojanamukhena nayanalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso
tika-s0501t0:1170_11: ca sīhavikkīḷito nayo nāmāti vuttā nayā saṃvaṇṇanānayā nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1171_0: Nayā pana nānāsuttato niddhāritehi taṇhāavijjādīhi mūlapadehi catusaccayojanāya nayato anubujjhiyamāno dukkhādiattho.
tika-s0501t0:1171_1: So hi maggañāṇaṃ nayati sampāpetīti “nayo”ti vutto,
tika-s0501t0:1171_4: Tasmā catusaccayojanāya nayaggāhato nīyati anupucchīyatīti nayo, ko so?
tika-s0501t0:1171_9: So hi maggañāṇaṃ nayati sampāpetīti nayo”ti.
tika-s0501t0:1171_10: Samuṭṭhahanti nayā etenāti samuṭṭhānaṃ, kiṃ taṃ?
tika-s0501t0:1171_14: Atha vā avijjātaṇhādīhi catusaccayojanā samuṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1171_18: Evaṃ atthe gayhamāne sati saṃvaṇṇanānayāpi gahitā honti,
tika-s0501t0:1172_0: “Katamaṃ nandiyāvaṭṭanayasamuṭṭhāna”nti pucchitabbattā paṭhamaṃ nandiyāvaṭṭanayasamuṭṭhānaṃ dassetuṃ “pubbā koṭi na paññāyatī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1172_1: Nandiyāvaṭṭanayasamuṭṭhānabhūtāya avijjāya ca taṇhāya ca pubbā koṭi “asukassa buddhassa bhagavato uppajjanakāle uppannā,
tika-s0501t0:1172_2: asukassa cakkavattino uppajjanakāle uppannā”ti na paññāyati koṭiyā abhāvatoti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1172_4: katamā saṃyojana”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha avijjā nīvaraṇaṃ taṇhā saṃyojana”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1172_10: taṇhāsaṃyojanā sattā kathaṃ vicaranti kathaṃ vuccantī”ti pucchitabbattā “avijjānīvaraṇā sattā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1172_12: Avijjāya saṃyuttā viya pavattā avijjāya abhinivisavatthūsu saṃyuttā viya pavattā sattā avijjāpakkhena
tika-s0501t0:1172_13: vipallāsena niccādiabhinivesavatthubhūte rūpādiārammaṇe vicaranti vividhā caranti pavattanti,
tika-s0501t0:1172_17: taṇhāya vā ārammaṇabhūte vatthukāme saṃyuttā viya pavattā sattā taṇhāpakkhena aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritena
tika-s0501t0:1173_1: taṇhācaritā sattā kaṃ paṭipattiṃ anuyuttā viharantī”ti pucchitabbattā “diṭṭhicaritā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1173_2: Diṭṭhicaritā sattā ito sāsanato bahiddhā pabbajitā hontāpi “sukhena adhigantabbaṃ sukhaṃ natthi,
tika-s0501t0:1173_3: dukkhena adhigantabbaṃ sukhaṃ pana atthī”ti manasi karontā attakilamathānuyogaṃ pañcātapādipaṭipattiṃ anuyuttā viharanti.
tika-s0501t0:1173_4: Taṇhācaritā sattā ito sāsanato bahiddhā pabbajitā hontāpi “kāme paṭisevantā lokaṃ vaḍḍhāpentā bahuṃ puññaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1173_5: vaḍḍhāpentī”ti manasi karontā kāmesu kāmasukhallikānuyogaṃ paṭipattiṃ anuyuttā viharanti.
tika-s0501t0:1174_1: kasmā taṇhācaritā tathāvidhaṃ paṭipattiṃ anuyuttā viharantī”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha kiṃ kāraṇa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1174_5: Ito sāsanato bahiddhā yesaṃ puggalānaṃ saccavavatthānaṃ natthi,
tika-s0501t0:1174_7: samathavipassanākosallaṃ vā upasamasukhappatti vā kuto atthi,
tika-s0501t0:1174_8: te puggalā upasamasukhassa anabhiññā viparītacetā hutvā evaṃ āhaṃsu “sukhena adhigantabbaṃ sukhaṃ natthi,
tika-s0501t0:1174_10: Te evaṃsaññī evaṃdiṭṭhī dukkhena sukhaṃ patthayamānā hutvā attakilamathānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti.
tika-s0501t0:1174_11: Ito sāsanato bahiddhā yesaṃ puggalānaṃ saccavavatthānaṃ natthi,
tika-s0501t0:1174_13: samathavipassanākosallaṃ vā upasamasukhappatti vā kuto atthi,
tika-s0501t0:1174_14: te puggalā upasamasukhassa anabhiññā viparītacetā hutvā evamāhaṃsu “yo kāme paṭisevati,
tika-s0501t0:1174_18: Te evaṃsaññī evaṃdiṭṭhī kāmesu sukhasaññī hutvā kāmasukhallikānuyogaṃ anuyuttā ca viharantīti yojanā kātabbā.
tika-s0501t0:1175_0: “Tathā viharantā kiṃ vaḍḍhayantī”ti pucchitabbattā “te tadabhiññā santā rogameva vaḍḍhayantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1175_1: “Tathā vaḍḍhayantā rogādīnaṃ bhesajjaṃ samathavipassanaṃ vaḍḍhayanti ki”nti pucchitabbattā “te rogābhitunnā
tika-s0501t0:1175_2: gaṇḍapaṭipīḷitā sallānuviddhā nirayatiracchānayonipetāsuresu ummujjanimujjāni karontā ugghātanigghātaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1175_9: Attakilamathānuyogo ca kāmasukhallikānuyogo ca saṃkileso hoti,
tika-s0501t0:1176_0: “Katamo katamaṃ sacca”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha saṃkileso dukkha”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1176_1: Tatthāti tesu saṃkilesādīsu saṃkileso ekadesavasena dukkhaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1176_2: Tadabhisaṅgoti tasmiṃ saṃkilese abhisaṅgo viya pavatto lokiyadhammo niravasesavasena dukkhasaccaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1176_3: Atha vā tasmiṃ dukkhe abhisaṅgo viya pavattā taṇhā dukkhasamudayo samudayasaccaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1177_2: “kathaṃ diṭṭhicaritataṇhācaritānaṃ sakkāyadassane pavattibhedavasena cattāri saccāni niddhāritānī”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha diṭṭhicaritā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1177_3: Atha vā “diṭṭhicaritataṇhācaritānaṃ sakkāyadassane katamo pavattibhedo”ti pucchitabbattā imesaṃ sakkāyadassane
tika-s0501t0:1177_4: ayaṃ pavattibhedoti vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “tattha diṭṭhicaritā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1177_9: viññāṇaṃ “attā”ti attato upagacchanti diṭṭhicaritānaṃ attābhinivesassa balavabhāvato,
tika-s0501t0:1177_10: taṇhācaritā pana rūpaṃ vā “attā”ti rūpavantaṃ attānaṃ upagacchanti attani vā rūpaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1177_12: viññāṇasmiṃ vā “attā”ti attānaṃ upagacchanti taṇhācaritānaṃ attaniyābhinivesassa balavabhāvato.
tika-s0501t0:1177_13: Pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu ekekaṃ nissāya catubbidhattā vīsativatthukā ayaṃ micchādiṭṭhi “sakkāyadiṭṭhī”ti vuccati.
tika-s0501t0:1177_14: Evaṃ diṭṭhicaritataṇhācaritānaṃ sakkāyadassane pavattibhedo viññātabboti attho.
tika-s0501t0:1178_1: Tassā sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā pajahanavasena lokuttarā sammādiṭṭhi paṭipakkho,
tika-s0501t0:1178_2: tassā sammādiṭṭhiyā anvāyikā anuguṇabhāvena pavattanakā dhammā ca sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā pajahanavasena paṭipakkhā bhavanti.
tika-s0501t0:1178_6: Ayaṃ sammādiṭṭhiādiko ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo tassā sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā paṭipakkho hoti pahāyakattā.
tika-s0501t0:1178_7: “Te sammādiṭṭhiyādayo dhammā khandhato kittakā hontī”ti pucchitabbattā “te tayo khandhā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1178_9: katamo khandho vipassanā”ti pucchitabbattā “sīlakkhandho samādhikkhandho ca samatho,
tika-s0501t0:1178_12: katamo katamaṃ sacca”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha sakkāyo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1179_1: kathaṃ antadvayamajjhimapaṭipadā niddhāritā”ti vattabbattā “tattha ye rūpaṃ attato”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1179_2: Tatthāti tesu diṭṭhicaritataṇhācaritesu ye diṭṭhicaritā puggalā rūpaṃ “attā”ti attato upagacchanti…pe…
tika-s0501t0:1179_8: attā paraṃ maraṇā na hotī”ti abhinivisanato “ucchedavādino”ti vuccanti.
tika-s0501t0:1179_9: Ye taṇhācaritā puggalā rūpaṃ vā “attā”ti rūpavantaṃ attānaṃ upagacchanti…pe…
tika-s0501t0:1179_13: Ime taṇhācaritā puggalā “rūpādīhi attā añño aññattā attā nicco sassato”ti abhinivisanato “sassatavādino”ti vuccanti.
tika-s0501t0:1180_0: Tattha tesu ucchedavādīsassatavādīpuggalesu pavattā ucchedavādasassatavādā ubho antā antadvayapaṭipadā honti.
tika-s0501t0:1180_1: Ayaṃ antadvayapaṭipadā saṃsārapavattanassa hetubhāvato saṃsārapavatti hoti,
tika-s0501t0:1180_2: tassa antadvayassa paṭipajjanassa pajahanavasena majjhimapaṭipadāsaṅkhātova ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo paṭipakkho hoti pahāyakattā.
tika-s0501t0:1180_3: Ayaṃ maggo saṃsāranivattanassa hetubhāvato saṃsāranivatti hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1180_4: Tattha saṃsārapavattisaṃsāranivattīsu pavatti saṃsārapavatti dukkhaṃ dukkhasaccaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1180_5: tadabhisaṅgo tasmiṃ dukkhe abhisaṅgo taṇhā samudayo samudayasaccaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1180_7: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā maggasaccaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1181_2: Tattha ucchedasassataariyamaggesu ucchedasassatadassanaṃ samāsato saṅkhepato vīsativatthukā sakkāyadiṭṭhi.
tika-s0501t0:1181_4: sassatadassanaṃ ekekasmiṃ tidhā uppajjanato pannarasavidhanti vīsatividhaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1181_17: Tesaṃ ucchedasassatadassanānaṃ tecattālīsaṃ bodhipakkhiyadhammā paṭipakkho maggo.
tika-s0501t0:1181_19: “Aniccasaññā dukkhasaññā anattasaññā”ti tisso saññā ca “pahānasaññā virāgasaññā nirodhasaññā”ti tisso saññā cāti cha saññā ca “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā,
tika-s0501t0:1181_25: aṭṭha maggaṅgānī”ti tecattālīsaṃ bodhipakkhiyadhammā vipassanāvasena paṭipakkho maggo nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1182_2: Dasa kasiṇāyatanāni samathavasena paṭipakkho maggo nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1182_3: “Katamaṃ ñāṇaṃ katamassa dhammassa padālana”nti pucchitabbattā “dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1182_8: Aṭṭha samāpattiyo samāpajjitvā tejetvā tikkhaṃ vipassanāñāṇañca ariyamaggañāṇañcañāṇavajiraṃ nāma bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ ñāṇapadaṭṭhānattā.
tika-s0501t0:1182_18: Attano ādhāraṃ puggalaṃ dukkhādīsu aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu mohetīti moho.
tika-s0501t0:1182_19: Paṭhamaṃ jālaṃ jaṭaṃ lāyitvā jaṭāvasena lāti pavattatīti jālaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1182_25: sakaattabhāvādīsu ca saṃsibbanavasena pavattanato jālaṃ bhavataṇhā”ti.
tika-s0501t0:1182_26: “Avijjātaṇhāhi attakilamathānuyogādīnaṃ kilesapakkhānaṃ niddhāraṇaṃ kataṃ kathaṃ kena saddahitabba”nti
tika-s0501t0:1182_27: vattabbattā “tena vuccati ‘pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjāya ca bhavataṇhāya cā’ti” vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1183_2: sāsane diṭṭhicaritataṇhācaritānaṃ paṭipadādayo kathaṃ niddhāritabbā”ti vattabbattā “saṃkilesapakkhā suttatthā ācariyena dassitā,
tika-s0501t0:1183_3: vodānapakkhasuttatthā kathaṃ dassitabbā”ti vattabbattā vā “tattha diṭṭhicarito asmiṃ sāsane”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1183_5: Diṭṭhicarito puggalo asmiṃ sāsane pabbajito hutvā catūsu paccayesu sallekhānusantatavutti bhavati. Kasmā?
tika-s0501t0:1183_8: Taṇhācarito puggalo asmiṃ sāsane pabbajito hutvā sikkhānusantatavutti bhavati. Kasmā?
tika-s0501t0:1183_11: Diṭṭhicarito puggalo sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamanto hutvā dhammānusārī puggalo bhavati. Kasmā?
tika-s0501t0:1183_13: Taṇhācarito puggalo sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamanto hutvā saddhānusārī bhavati. Kasmā?
tika-s0501t0:1183_18: khippābhiññāya ca niyyāti sukhena kilesehi vikkhambhituṃ samatthattā.
tika-s0501t0:1183_22: khippābhiññāya ca niyyāti dukkhena kilesehi vikkhambhituṃ samatthattā.
tika-s0501t0:1184_0: “Tathā kasmā niyyātī”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1184_3: Tassa taṇhācaritassa kāmā sukhena apariccattā hi yasmā bhavanti,
tika-s0501t0:1184_4: tasmā kāmānaṃ sukhena apariccattattā tathā niyyāti.
tika-s0501t0:1184_5: So taṇhācarito kāmehi vatthukāmakilesakāmehi viveciyamāno dukkhena paṭinissarati,
tika-s0501t0:1184_7: Yo pana ayaṃ puggalo diṭṭhicarito hoti,
tika-s0501t0:1184_8: so ayaṃ diṭṭhicarito puggalo ādito ādimhiyeva kāmehi kilesakāmavatthukāmehi anatthiko bhavati.
tika-s0501t0:1184_9: So diṭṭhicarito tato tehi kāmehi viveciyamāno khippañca sukhena paṭinissarati,
tika-s0501t0:1185_1: diṭṭhicarito sukhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya niyyātīti ekekāya paṭipadāya bhavitabba”nti vattabbattā
tika-s0501t0:1185_2: “dukkhāpi paṭipadā duvidhā dandhābhiññā ca khippābhiññā ca,
tika-s0501t0:1185_3: sukhāpi paṭipadā duvidhā dandhābhiññā ca khippābhiññā cā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1185_4: “Evaṃ sati ekova dvīhi dvīhi paṭipadāhi niyyātīti āpajjatī”ti vattabbattā “sattāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1185_6: diṭṭhicaritā sattāpi duvidhā mudindriyāpi tikkhindriyāpīti yojanā kātabbā.
tika-s0501t0:1185_15: na niyyiṃsu niyyissantīti āpajjeyya vattamānavibhattiyā niddiṭṭhattā”ti vattabbattā “imā catasso”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1185_18: anāgatepi niyyissantīti attho gahetabbo yathā “pabbato tiṭṭhatī”ti.
tika-s0501t0:1186_3: Ayaṃ vuccati nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa bhūmīti taṇhāavijjānaṃ vasena saṃkilesapakkhe dvidisā catusaccayojanāpi
tika-s0501t0:1186_4: samathavipassanānaṃ vasena vodānapakkhe dvidisā catusaccayojanāpi dassitā.
tika-s0501t0:1186_5: Ayaṃ catubbidhā catusaccayojanā nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa samuṭṭhānaṃ bhūmi samuṭṭhānabhāvatoti.
tika-s0501t0:1186_6: “Tathāvidhāya catusaccayojanāya nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa samuṭṭhānabhūmibhāvo kena saddahitabbo”ti vattabbattā “tenāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1187_2: tassa nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa kattha katamā disā kittakena upaparikkhitabbā”ti vattabbattā “veyyākaraṇesu hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Hi-
tika-s0501t0:1187_4: Ye disābhūtā āhārādayo dhammā veyyākaraṇesu “kusalākusalā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1187_5: te disābhūtā āhārādayo dhammā duvidhena “ime akusalā dhammā saṃkilesadhammā,
tika-s0501t0:1187_6: ime kusalā vodānadhammā”ti duvidhena upaparikkhitabbā ālocitabbā.
tika-s0501t0:1187_7: “Katamena duvidhenā”ti pucchitabbattā “lokavaṭṭānusārī ca lokavivaṭṭānusārī cā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1187_11: “Saṃsārassa katamo hetū”ti pucchitabbattā “kammakilesā hetu saṃsārassā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1187_14: udāhu cetasikañca phaladānasamatthāsamatthampi kammaṃ ki”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha kamma”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1187_16: “Taṃ kammaṃ kathaṃ kena pakārena daṭṭhabba”nti ce vadeyya,
tika-s0501t0:1187_17: yathā yena upacayena kataṃ kammaṃ phaladānasamatthaṃ hoti,
tika-s0501t0:1187_19: “Te kilesā katamehi dhammehi niddisitabbā”ti ce puccheyya,
tika-s0501t0:1188_10: cattāri agatigamanānīti dasa vatthūnīti veditabbāni catunnaṃ kiccavasena ekattā.
tika-s0501t0:1188_11: Ettha ca kilesānaṃ paccayo vatthukāmopi kilesopi kilesavatthu hoti purimānaṃ purimānaṃ kilesānaṃ pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kilesānaṃ paccayabhāvato.
tika-s0501t0:1189_0: “Katamo katamo katamassa katamassa vatthū”ti pucchitabbattā “paṭhame āhāre”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1189_1: Ālambitabbe paṭhame kabaḷīkārāhāre paṭhamo “rūpaṃ subha”nti vipallāso ārammaṇakaraṇavasena pavattati.
tika-s0501t0:1189_2: Ālambitabbe dutiye phassāhāre dutiyo “phassapaccayā vedanā sukhā”ti vipallāso pavattati.
tika-s0501t0:1189_3: Ālambitabbe tatiye cittāhāre tatiyo “cittaṃ nicca”nti vipallāso pavattati,
tika-s0501t0:1189_4: ālambitabbe catutthe manosañcetanāhāre “dhammo attā”ti vipallāso ārammaṇakaraṇavasena pavattati.
tika-s0501t0:1189_5: Ālambitabbe paṭhame “rūpaṃ subha”nti vipallāso paṭhamaṃ kāmupādānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena pavattati.
tika-s0501t0:1189_6: Sesesupi yathārahaṃ nayānusārena yojetvā attho veditabbo.
tika-s0501t0:1190_1: “Tesu āhārādīsu katamo katamassa puggalassa upakkileso”ti vattabbattā “tattha yo cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1190_4: Taṇhācaritassa rūpavedanāsu tibbacchandarāgassa uppajjanato yo ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro,
tika-s0501t0:1190_6: ime kabaḷīkārāhāraphassāhārā taṇhācaritassa puggalassa upakkilesā bhavanti.
tika-s0501t0:1190_7: Diṭṭhicaritassa dhammacittesu balavaattaniccābhinivesassa uppajjanato yo ca manosañcetanāhāro,
tika-s0501t0:1190_9: ime manosañcetanāhāraviññāṇāhārā diṭṭhicaritassa puggalassa upakkilesā bhavanti.
tika-s0501t0:1190_10: “Tattha yo ca asubhe subha”ntiādīsupi vuttanayānusārena attho gahetabboti.
tika-s0501t0:1190_11: Purimānaṃ dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ taṇhāpadhānattā ceva taṇhāsabhāvattā ca,
tika-s0501t0:1190_12: pacchimānaṃ dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ diṭṭhipadhānattā ceva diṭṭhisabhāvattā cāti.
tika-s0501t0:1191_1: “Katamasmiṃ paṭhamādike āhāre katamo paṭhamādiko vipallāso pavattatī”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha kabaḷīkāre
tika-s0501t0:1191_2: āhāre”tiādinā nāmavasena niyametvā pubbe vuttatthameva dasseti.
tika-s0501t0:1191_3: “Katamasmiṃ vipallāse ṭhito katamaṃ upādiyatī”ti pucchitabbattā “paṭhame vipallāse ṭhito”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1191_4: Paṭhame vipallāse ṭhito puggalo kāme yena upādānena upādiyati,
tika-s0501t0:1193_1: “Āhārādīsu katame katamā disā”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha imā catasso disā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1193_2: Tattha tesu āhāracatukkādīsu dasasu catukkesu paṭhamo paṭhamo kabaḷīkārāhārādiko paṭhamā disā,
tika-s0501t0:1193_5: catuttho catuttho manosañcetanāhārādiko catutthā disāti veditabbā.
tika-s0501t0:1194_0: “Tāsu catūsu disāsu tesu kabaḷīkārāhārādīsu dhammesu katame dhammā katamassa upakkilesā”ti pucchitabbattā
tika-s0501t0:1194_1: ime āhārādayo dhammā imassa puggalassa upakkilesāti vibhattāti dassetuṃ “tattha yo ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro…pe…
tika-s0501t0:1194_4: “kabaḷīkārāhāro āhārotiādi āhārādīsu ye yassa puggalassa upakkilesā,
tika-s0501t0:1194_9: “Byañjanameva nāna”nti etena ca saddatthassa nānattaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0501t0:1195_0: “Kabaḷīkārāhārādīsu katame āhārādayo katamena vimokkhamukhena pariññaṃ pahānaṃ gacchantī”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha yo ca kabaḷīkāro”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1196_1: Sabbeti sabbe āhārādayo dhammā lokavaṭṭānusārino bhavanti.
tika-s0501t0:1197_1: Saṃkilesapakkhe disābhūtā āhāracatukkādayo dasa catukkā dhammā ācariyena niddhāretvā dassitā,
tika-s0501t0:1197_3: “vodānapakkhe katame disābhūtā dhammā”ti pucchitabbattā vodānapakkhe disābhūte dhamme dassetuṃ “catasso paṭipadā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1197_4: Cattāro vihārāti dibbavihārā brahmavihārā ariyavihārā āneñjavihārāti cattāro vihārā.
tika-s0501t0:1197_8: catasso arūpasamāpattiyo āneñjavihārā cattāro acchariyā abbhutā dhammāti mānapahānaṃ ālayasamugghāto
tika-s0501t0:1197_10: Cattāri adhiṭṭhānānīti saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ cāgādhiṭṭhānaṃ paññādhiṭṭhānaṃ upasamādhiṭṭhānanti cattāri adhiṭṭhānāni.
tika-s0501t0:1197_11: Catasso samādhibhāvanāti chandasamādhibhāvanā vīriyasamādhibhāvanā cittasamādhibhāvanā vīmaṃsāsamādhibhāvanāti catasso samādhibhāvanā.
tika-s0501t0:1197_12: Cattāro sukhabhāgiyāti indriyasaṃvaro tapo bojjhaṅgo sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggoti cattāro sukhabhāgiyā.
tika-s0501t0:1198_0: “Catūsu catūsu paṭipadādīsu katamo paṭipadādiko paṭhamo satipaṭṭhānādiko bhavatī”ti pucchitabbattā “paṭhamā
tika-s0501t0:1198_4: tasmā ‘paṭhamā paṭipadā paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhāna’ntiādiyojanā kātabbā”ti vattabbattā “paṭhamā paṭipadā bhāvitā
tika-s0501t0:1198_7: Atha vā “bhāvitā bahulīkatā katame paṭipadādayo katame satipaṭṭhānādike pūrentī”ti pucchitabbattā “paṭhamā
tika-s0501t0:1198_8: paṭipadā bhāvitā bahulīkatā paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ pūretī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1199_1: “Tesu dasasu paṭipadācatukkādīsu katame dhammā katamā disā,
tika-s0501t0:1199_2: katame dhammā katamā disā”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha imā catasso disā paṭhamā paṭipadā,
tika-s0501t0:1199_5: Imā mayā vuccamānā paṭhamā paṭipadādayo disā catasso disā bhavanti.
tika-s0501t0:1200_0: “Tesu catūsu disābhūtesu paṭipadācatukkādīsu katamo disābhūto attho katamassa puggalassa bhesajja”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha paṭhamā paṭipadā…pe…
tika-s0501t0:1201_0: “Tesu dasasu paṭipadādicatukkesu dhammesu katamo katamo katamaṃ katamaṃ vimokkhamukha”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha dukkhā ca paṭipadā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1201_1: Attho pana ṭīkāyaṃ vitthārena vutto pākaṭo.
tika-s0501t0:1201_2: Saṃkilesapakkhe disābhūtā āhāracatukkādayo dasa catukkā samatikkamitabbapahātabbabhāvena niddhāritā,
tika-s0501t0:1201_3: vodānapakkhe pana disābhūtā paṭipadācatukkādayo dasa catukkā samatikkamapahāyakabhāvena niddhāritā.
tika-s0501t0:1202_0: “Tesaṃ āhāracatukkādīnaṃ dasannaṃ catukkānaṃ samatikkamanapahānasaṅkhātaṃ yaṃ vikkīḷitañca tesaṃ paṭipadācatukkādīnaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1202_1: dasannaṃ catukkānaṃ bhāvanāsaṅkhātaṃ yaṃ vikkīḷitañca sacchikiriyāsaṅkhātaṃ yaṃ vikkīḷitañca atthi,
tika-s0501t0:1202_2: taṃ tividhaṃ vikkīḷitaṃ katamesaṃ puggalānaṃ vikkīḷitaṃ bhavatī”ti pucchitabbattā “tesaṃ vikkīḷita”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1202_3: Atha vā “yathāvuttappakārehi vimokkhamukhehi ye buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakā vimucciṃsu,
tika-s0501t0:1202_7: udāhu sabbesaṃ buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakānaṃ vikkīḷitaṃ bhavati ki”nti vicāraṇāya sambhavato “tesaṃ vikkīḷita”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1202_10: Yaṃ āhāracatukkādīnaṃ dasannaṃ catukkānaṃ saparasantāne samatikkamanapahānañca yā paṭipadācatukkādīnaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1202_13: idaṃ sabbaṃ vikkīḷitaṃ nāma bhavatīti attho.
tika-s0501t0:1203_0: “Sabbesaṃ āhāracatukkādīnaṃ dasannaṃ catukkānaṃ sabbe paṭipadācatukkādayo dasa catukkā paṭipakkhā honti kiṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1203_1: udāhu yathākkamaṃ catukkānaṃ catukkā paṭipakkhā honti ki”nti vicāraṇāya sambhavato yathākkamaṃ catukkānaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1203_2: catukkā paṭipakkhā honti pahātabbapahāyakabhāvenāti dassento “cattāro āhārā tesaṃ paṭipakkho catasso
tika-s0501t0:1203_6: taṃ nesaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvaṃ dassento ‘cattāro āhārā tesaṃ paṭipakkho catasso paṭipadā’tiādimāhā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1203_7: Tattha saṃkilesapakkhe cattāro ye āhārā niddhāritā,
tika-s0501t0:1203_8: tesaṃ catunnaṃ āhārānaṃ vodānapakkhe yā catasso paṭipadā niddhāritā,
tika-s0501t0:1203_9: tā catasso paṭipadā paṭipakkho āhārānaṃ pahātabbattā,
tika-s0501t0:1203_11: Satipi āhārānaṃ appahātabbabhāve vipassanārammaṇattā āhārapaṭibaddhachandarāgappahānavasena pahātabbabhāvo vuttoti evamādiyojanā kātabbā.
tika-s0501t0:1204_0: Sīhāti sīhasadisā buddhā ca sīhasadisā paccekabuddhā ca sīhasadisā sāvakā cāti sīhasadisā visuṃ visuṃ yojetabbā.
tika-s0501t0:1204_4: rāgo ca doso ca moho ca rāgadosamohā,
tika-s0501t0:1204_9: tesaṃ sīhānaṃ sāvakānaṃ bhāvanā vodānapakkhe bhāvitabbānaṃ bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ bhāvanā vaḍḍhanā ca,
tika-s0501t0:1204_10: sacchikiriyā vodānapakkheyeva sacchikātabbānaṃ phalanibbānānaṃ sacchikiriyā ca,
tika-s0501t0:1204_11: byantīkiriyā saṃkilesapakkhe pahātabbānaṃ pahānasaṅkhātā byantīkiriyā ca vikkīḷitaṃ nāma bhavati.
tika-s0501t0:1205_0: Indriyādhiṭṭhānanti saddhindriyādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ pavattanaṃ bhāvanā,
tika-s0501t0:1205_4: Indriyāni saddhindriyādīni saddhammagocaro saddhammassa vodānapakkhassa gocaro pavattanahetūti adhippetāni.
tika-s0501t0:1205_5: Vipariyāsā vipallāsā kilesagocaro saṃkilesapakkhassa gocaro pavattihetūti adhippetā.
tika-s0501t0:1206_0: “Cattāro āhārātiādinā saṃkilesapakkhe āhāracatukkādīnaṃ dasannaṃ catukkānaṃ taṇhācaritādīnaṃ catunnaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1206_1: puggalānaṃ upakkilesavibhāvanāmukhena yā niddhāraṇā ācariyena katā,
tika-s0501t0:1206_2: ‘catasso paṭipadā’tiādinā ca vodānapakkhe paṭipadācatukkādīnaṃ dasannaṃ catukkānaṃ taṇhācaritādīnaṃ catunnaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1206_3: puggalānaṃ vodānavibhāvanāmukhena yā niddhāraṇā ācariyena katā,
tika-s0501t0:1206_4: sā ayaṃ niddhāraṇā katamassa nayassa samuṭṭhānaṃ bhūmīti vuccatī”ti pucchitabbattā “ayaṃ vuccati sīhavikkīḷitassa nayassa bhūmī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1206_5: Tattha ayanti yā ayaṃ vuttanayena dvippakārā niddhāraṇā katā,
tika-s0501t0:1206_6: sā ayaṃ dvippakārā niddhāraṇā sīhavikkīḷitassa nayassa bhūmi pavattiṭṭhānaṃ samuṭṭhānanti nayasamuṭṭhānakosallehi
tika-s0501t0:1207_0: “Vuttappakārāya niddhāritāya nayassa bhūmibhāvo kasmā viññāyatī”ti vattabbattā “tenāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1207_2: kusalāti cā”ti yaṃ vacanaṃ ācariyo āha,
tika-s0501t0:1208_2: “katamā tipukkhalanayabhūmī”ti pucchitabbattā tipukkhalanayabhūmiṃ vibhāvetukāmo “tattha ye dukkhāya paṭipadāyā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0501t0:1208_5: kasmā pana “tattha ye dukkhāya paṭipadāyā”tiādivacanaṃ vattabbanti? Saccaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1208_7: tasmā ugghaṭitaññuādipuggalattayaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “tattha ye dukkhāya paṭipadāyā”tiādivacanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1208_8: Evamapi “tattha yo sukhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya niyyāti,
tika-s0501t0:1208_10: kasmā pana “tattha ye dukkhāya paṭipadāyā”tiādivacanaṃ vattabbanti? Saccaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1208_11: ugghaṭitaññuādipuggalattayaṃ pana sīhavikkīḷitanayato tipukkhalanayassa niggacchanato nikkhamanato sīhavikkīḷitanayabhūmivibhāvanāyaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1208_13: sīhavikkīḷitanayabhūmivibhāvanāyaṃ paṭipadāvibhāgato vibhāvitaṃ puggalacatukkaṃ paṭhamaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “tattha ye dukkhāya paṭipadāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1208_16: Yeti ye dandhaudattā diṭṭhicaritapuggalā yathākkamaṃ sukhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya ca sukhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya ca niyyanti,
tika-s0501t0:1208_17: iti niyyakā dve puggalā ca niddhāritā.
tika-s0501t0:1208_18: “Tesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ katamo saṃkileso”ti pucchitabbattā “tesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ ayaṃ saṃkileso”ti
tika-s0501t0:1208_19: vissajjetuṃ “tesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ ayaṃ saṃkileso”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1208_22: iti ayaṃ dasavidho āhāracatukkādicatukko tesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ saṃkileso hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1208_23: Tesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ saṃkileso ācariyena niddhārito,
tika-s0501t0:1208_24: “katamaṃ vodāna”nti pucchitabbattā “tesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ idaṃ vodāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1208_27: iti idaṃ dasavidhaṃ paṭipadācatukkādicatukkabhūtaṃ dhammajātaṃ tesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ vodānaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1209_3: katamo puggalo neyyo”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha ye”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1209_5: kasmā pana puna “tattha ye’tiādinā cattāro puggalā niddhāritā”ti ce vadeyya?
tika-s0501t0:1209_7: pacchā pana ugghaṭitaññuādīnaṃ avayavānaṃ samūhabhāvena niddhāritāti visesattho gahetabbo.
tika-s0501t0:1209_9: ime dve puggalāti ettha yojanattho heṭṭhā vuttasadisova.
tika-s0501t0:1209_13: Puna yoti udattova taṇhācarito ca mando diṭṭhicarito ca.
tika-s0501t0:1209_14: Sādhāraṇāyāti dukkhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya ca sukhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya ca.
tika-s0501t0:1210_1: tesu tīsu puggalesu katamassa katamassa katamaṃ katamaṃ bhagavā upadisatī”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha bhagavā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1210_3: kathaṃ desanābhedena puggalabhedo vibhāvito”ti vattabbattā desanābhedenapi puggalabhedaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “tattha bhagavā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1211_0: Visuṃ visuṃ paṭipadābhedena cattāro hutvā visuṃ ca sampiṇḍitā ca paṭipadābhedena ceva desanābhedena ca
tika-s0501t0:1211_1: tayo hontīti vibhāvetuṃ “tattha ye”tiādiṃ puna vatvā “iti kho cattāri hutvā tīṇi bhavantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1212_0: “Tesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ katamo saṃkileso”ti pucchitabbattā “tesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ ayaṃ saṃkileso”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1212_2: sīlavipatti diṭṭhivipatti ācāravipattī”ti niddhāritānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ iti ayaṃ samūho saṃkileso hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1212_4: kathaṃ vodānaṃ niddhāritabba”nti vattabbattā “tesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ idaṃ vodāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1212_6: tīṇi vimokkhamukhāni suññataṃ animittaṃ appaṇihita”nti niddhāritānaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ samūhabhūtaṃ iti idaṃ dhammajātaṃ vodānaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1213_0: “Vuttappakārena cattāro hutvā tayo puggalā bhavantīti ācariyena vibhāvitā,
tika-s0501t0:1213_1: tayo hutvā kittakā puggalā bhavantī”ti vattabbabhāvato “iti kho cattāri hutvā tīṇi bhavanti,
tika-s0501t0:1213_2: tīṇi hutvā dve bhavanti taṇhācarito ca diṭṭhicarito cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1213_3: Itīti heṭṭhā vuttappakārena cattāri cattāro hutvā tīṇi tayo bhavanti.
tika-s0501t0:1213_4: Tīṇi tayo hutvā taṇhācarito ca diṭṭhicarito cāti dve puggalā bhavanti.
tika-s0501t0:1214_0: “Tesaṃ dvinnaṃ puggalānaṃ katamo saṃkileso”ti vattabbabhāvato “tesaṃ dvinnaṃ puggalānaṃ ayaṃ saṃkileso”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1214_1: Tattha ayaṃ saṃkilesoti “taṇhā ca avijjā ca…pe…
tika-s0501t0:1214_2: sassatadiṭṭhi ca ucchedadiṭṭhi cā”ti niddhāritānaṃ akusaladhammānaṃ iti ayaṃ samūho saṃkileso hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1215_1: kathaṃ vodāna”nti vattabbabhāvato “tesaṃ dvinnaṃ puggalānaṃ idaṃ vodāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1215_4: anupādisesā ca nibbānadhātū”ti niddhāritānaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ samūhabhūtaṃ iti idaṃ dhammajātaṃ vodānaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1216_0: “Tīṇi akusalamūlānī”tiādinā saṃkilesapakkhe akusalamūlatikādīnaṃ dvinnaṃ dvādasannaṃ tikānaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1216_1: tiṇṇaṃ ugghaṭitaññuādipuggalānaṃ saṃkilesavibhāvanāmukhena yā niddhāraṇā katā,
tika-s0501t0:1216_2: “tīṇi kusalamūlānī”tiādinā vodānapakkhe kusalamūlatikādīnaṃ dvinnaṃ dvādasannaṃ tikānaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1216_3: tiṇṇaṃ ugghaṭitaññuādipuggalānaṃ vodānavibhāvanāmukhena yā niddhāraṇā katā,
tika-s0501t0:1216_5: aṅkusassa ca nayassa bhūmi samuṭṭhānaṃ pavattihetu nāmāti yojetvā “taṇhā ca avijjā cā”tiādinā saṃkilesapakkhe
tika-s0501t0:1216_7: dvinnaṃ taṇhācaritadiṭṭhicaritānaṃ puggalānaṃ vodānavibhāvanāmukhena yā niddhāraṇā katā,
tika-s0501t0:1216_8: “samatho ca vipassanā cā”tiādinā vodānapakkhe samathavipassanādukādīnaṃ ekūnavīsatidukānaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1216_9: dvinnaṃ taṇhācaritadiṭṭhicaritānaṃ puggalānaṃ vodānavibhāvanāmukhena yā niddhāraṇā katā,
tika-s0501t0:1216_10: ayaṃ vuttappakārā nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa bhūmītipi nīharitvā yojetabbā.
tika-s0501t0:1216_15: Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ante ‘taṇhā ca avijjā cā’tiādinā samathassa nayassa bhūmi dassitā.
tika-s0501t0:1217_0: “Kasmā pana ayaṃ vuttappakārāya niddhāraṇāya tipukkhalassa ca nayassa,
tika-s0501t0:1217_1: aṅkusassa ca nayassa bhūmibhāvo viññāyatī”ti vattabbabhāvato “tenāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1217_2: Tena yathāvuttassa niddhāraṇāya bhūmibhāvena ācariyo “yo akusale…pe…
tika-s0501t0:1218_2: Yena yena nayasamuṭṭhānena saṃkilesapakkhe vā akusalā dhammā niddhāritā,
tika-s0501t0:1218_4: taṃ taṃ nayasamuṭṭhānaṃ niyuttaṃ yathārahaṃ niddhāretvā yujjitabbanti attho gahetabbo.
tika-s0501t0:1219_3: cattāro puggalāti puggalā tikoṭṭhāsā bhavanti, catudisā, chadisā,
tika-s0501t0:1219_10: Cattāro puggalāti dukkhāpaṭipadādandhābhiññādibhedena bhinnā mudindriyo taṇhācarito puggalo,
tika-s0501t0:1219_13: tikkhindriyo diṭṭhicarito puggaloti cattāro puggalā bhavanti.
tika-s0501t0:1219_15: vodānapakkhe dve dve disāti catudisā bhavanti.
tika-s0501t0:1219_17: vodānapakkhe tisso tisso disāti chadisā bhavanti.
tika-s0501t0:1219_19: vodānapakkhe catasso catasso disāti aṭṭhadisā bhavanti.
tika-s0501t0:1219_22: Tayo ugghaṭitaññuvipañcitaññuneyyapuggale ca chadisā ca nissāya tipukkhalanayasamuṭṭhānaṃ bhavati.
tika-s0501t0:1219_24: puggale ca aṭṭhadisā ca nissāya sīhavikkīḷitanayasamuṭṭhānaṃ bhavati.
tika-s0501t0:1219_25: Ekekasmiṃ nayasamuṭṭhāne vibhajite disālocanaaṅkusanayasamuṭṭhānānipi vibhajitāni bhavanti.
tika-s0501t0:1220_1: “Taṇhā ca avijjā ca ahirikañca anottappañca assati ca asampajaññañca ayonisomanasikāro ca kosajjañca
tika-s0501t0:1220_2: dovacassañca ahaṃkāro ca mamaṃkāro ca assaddhā ca pamādo ca asaddhammassavanañca asaṃvaro ca abhijjhā
tika-s0501t0:1220_3: ca byāpādo ca nīvaraṇañca saṃyojanañca kodho ca upanāho ca makkho ca paḷāso ca issā ca maccherañca māyā
tika-s0501t0:1220_4: ca sāṭheyyañca sassatadiṭṭhi ca ucchedadiṭṭhi cā”ti dukadukavasena desito ayaṃ disābhūto akusaladhammasamūho
tika-s0501t0:1220_5: dvinnaṃ taṇhācaritadiṭṭhicaritānaṃ puggalānaṃ saṃkileso hotīti saṃkilesapakkhe saṃkilesasāmaññabhāvena
tika-s0501t0:1220_6: yojetvā “imesu pannarasasu dukadukavasena desitesu disābhūtesu akusaladhammesu katamo akusaladhammo katamassa
tika-s0501t0:1220_7: puggalassa disā”ti manasāva disādhammabhāvena oloketvā “ayaṃ ayaṃ paṭhamo paṭhamo akusaladhammo taṇhācaritassa
tika-s0501t0:1220_9: ayaṃ ayaṃ dutiyo dutiyo akusaladhammo diṭṭhicaritassa puggalassa saṃkilesapakkhe dutiyā disā nāmā”ti
tika-s0501t0:1220_10: visuṃ visuṃ yojetvā samudayasaccadukkhasaccāni yathārahaṃ nīharitvā vibhajitabbadhammasabhāvo ca yena
tika-s0501t0:1220_13: tassa olokanā ca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena dassitā,
tika-s0501t0:1220_15: tathā oloketvā disāvisesabhūtassa dhammavisesassa puggalānaṃ nayanañca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena nayati,
tika-s0501t0:1221_14: apaḷāso ca issāpahānañca macchariyappahānañca vijjā ca,
tika-s0501t0:1221_18: anupādisesā ca nibbānadhātū”ti tikadukavasena desitaṃ idaṃ disābhūtaṃ kusalasamūhadhammajātaṃ dvinnaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1221_19: taṇhācaritadiṭṭhicaritānaṃ puggalānaṃ vodānaṃ hotīti vodānapakkhe vodānasāmaññabhāvena yojetvā “imesu
tika-s0501t0:1221_20: ekūnavīsatiyā dukadukavasena vā desitesu disābhūtesu dhammesu katamo katamo kusaladhammo katamassa katamassa
tika-s0501t0:1221_21: puggalassa disā”ti manasāva disādhammabhāvena oloketvā “ayaṃ paṭhamo paṭhamo kusaladhammo taṇhācaritassa
tika-s0501t0:1221_23: ayaṃ dutiyo dutiyo kusaladhammo diṭṭhicaritassa puggalassa vodānapakkhe dutiyā disā nāmā”ti visuṃ visuṃ
tika-s0501t0:1221_24: yojetvā maggasaccanirodhasaccāni yathārahaṃ nīharitvā vibhajitabbadhammabhāvo ca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena dassito,
tika-s0501t0:1221_26: tassa olokanā ca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena dassitā,
tika-s0501t0:1221_28: tathā oloketvā disāvisesabhūtassa dhammavisesassa puggalānaṃ nayanañca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena nayati,
tika-s0501t0:1222_42: ācāravipattī”ti tikavasena desito ayaṃ disābhūto akusaladhammasamūho tiṇṇaṃ ugghaṭitaññuvipañcitaññuneyyapuggalānaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1222_43: saṃkileso hotīti saṃkilesapakkhe saṃkilesasāmaññabhāvena yojetvā “imesu dvādasasu tikatikavasena desitesu
tika-s0501t0:1222_44: disābhūtesu akusaladhammesu katamo katamo akusalo dhammo katamassa katamassa puggalassa disā”ti manasāva
tika-s0501t0:1222_45: disādhammabhāvena oloketvā “ayaṃ ayaṃ paṭhamo paṭhamo akusaladhammo ugghaṭitaññupuggalassa saṃkilesapakkhe
tika-s0501t0:1222_47: Ayaṃ ayaṃ dutiyo dutiyo akusaladhammo vipañcitaññupuggalassa saṃkilesapakkhe dutiyā disā nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1222_48: Ayaṃ ayaṃ tatiyo tatiyo akusaladhammo neyyassa puggalassa saṃkilesapakkhe tatiyā disā nāmā”ti visuṃ visuṃ
tika-s0501t0:1222_49: yojetvā samudayasaccadukkhasaccāni yathārahaṃ nīharitvā vibhajitabbadhammasabhāvo ca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena dassito.
tika-s0501t0:1222_51: Tassa olokanā ca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena dassitā,
tika-s0501t0:1222_52: so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso ca disālocananayasamuṭṭhānaṃ bhavati tathā oloketvā disāvisesabhūtassa dhammavisesassa
tika-s0501t0:1223_46: appaṇihita”nti tikatikavasena desitaṃ idaṃ disābhūtaṃ kusalasamūhadhammajātaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ugghaṭitaññuvipañcitaññuneyyapuggalānaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1223_47: vodānaṃ hotīti vodānapakkhe vodānasāmaññabhāvena yojetvā “imesu dvīsu dvādasasu tikatikavasena desitesu

tika-s0501t0:1223_49: disādhammabhāvena oloketvā “ayaṃ ayaṃ paṭhamo paṭhamo kusaladhammo ugghaṭitaññupuggalassa vodānapakkhe
tika-s0501t0:1223_51: Ayaṃ ayaṃ dutiyo dutiyo kusalo dhammo vipañcitaññupuggalassa vodānapakkhe dutiyā disā nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1223_52: Ayaṃ ayaṃ tatiyo tatiyo kusaladhammo neyyapuggalassa vodānapakkhe tatiyā disā nāmā”ti visuṃ visuṃ disābhāvena
tika-s0501t0:1223_53: yojetvā maggasaccanirodhasaccāni yathārahaṃ nīharitvā vibhajitabbadhammasabhāvo ca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena dassito.
tika-s0501t0:1223_55: Tassa olokanā ca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena dassitā,
tika-s0501t0:1223_57: Tathā oloketvā disāvisesabhūtassa dhammassa puggalānaṃ nayanañca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena nayati,
tika-s0501t0:1224_10: cattāri agatigamanānī”ti catukkacatukkavasena desito ayaṃ disābhūto catukko catukko akusaladhammo “dukkhāya
tika-s0501t0:1224_11: paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya niyyakassa mudindriyassa taṇhācaritassa ca dukkhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya
tika-s0501t0:1224_12: niyyakassa tikkhindriyassa taṇhācaritassa ca sukhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya niyyakassa mudindriyassa
tika-s0501t0:1224_13: diṭṭhicaritassa ca sukhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya niyyakassa tikkhindriyassa diṭṭhicaritassa cā”ti
tika-s0501t0:1224_14: catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ saṃkilesoti saṃkilesapakkhe saṃkilesasāmaññabhāvena yojetvā “imesu catukkacatukkavasena
tika-s0501t0:1224_15: desitesu dasasu catukkesu dhammesu katamo katamo akusaladhammo katamassa katamassa puggalassa disā”ti
tika-s0501t0:1224_16: manasāva saṃkilesapakkhe disādhammabhāvena oloketvā “ayaṃ ayaṃ paṭhamo paṭhamo akusaladhammo dukkhāya
tika-s0501t0:1224_17: paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya niyyakassa mudindriyassa taṇhācaritassa puggalassa paṭhamā disā nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1224_18: Ayaṃ ayaṃ dutiyo dutiyo akusaladhammo dukkhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya niyyakassa tikkhindriyassa taṇhācaritassa puggalassa dutiyā disā nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1224_19: Ayaṃ ayaṃ tatiyo tatiyo akusaladhammo sukhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya niyyakassa mudindriyassa diṭṭhicaritassa puggalassa tatiyā disā nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1224_20: Ayaṃ ayaṃ catuttho catuttho akusaladhammo sukhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya niyyakassa tikkhindriyassa
tika-s0501t0:1224_21: diṭṭhicaritassa puggalassa catutthā disā nāmā”ti visuṃ visuṃ disābhāvena yojetvā,
tika-s0501t0:1224_25: Tassa olokanā ca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena dassitā,
tika-s0501t0:1224_27: Tathā oloketvā disāvisesabhūtassa dhammassa puggalānaṃ nayanañca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena nayati,
tika-s0501t0:1225_9: catasso appamāṇā”ti catukkacatukkavasena desitaṃ idaṃ disābhūtaṃ kusalasamūhadhammajātaṃ “dukkhāya paṭipadāya
tika-s0501t0:1225_10: dandhābhiññāya niyyakassa mudindriyassa taṇhācaritassa ca dukkhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya niyyakassa
tika-s0501t0:1225_11: tikkhindriyassa taṇhācaritassa ca sukhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya niyyakassa mudindriyassa diṭṭhicaritassa
tika-s0501t0:1225_12: sa sukhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya niyyakassa tikkhindriyassa diṭṭhicaritassa cā”ti catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1225_13: vodānaṃ hotīti vodānapakkhe vodānasāmaññabhāvena yojetvā “imesu catukkacatukkavasena desitesu dasasu
tika-s0501t0:1225_14: catukkesu kusaladhammesu katamo katamo kusaladhammo katamassa katamassa puggalassa disā”ti manasāva disādhammabhāvena oloketvā,
tika-s0501t0:1225_15: “ayaṃ ayaṃ paṭhamo paṭhamo kusaladhammo dukkhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya niyyakassa mudindriyassa taṇhācaritassa puggalassa paṭhamā disā nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1225_16: Ayaṃ ayaṃ dutiyo dutiyo kusaladhammo dukkhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya niyyakassa tikkhindriyassa taṇhācaritassa puggalassa dutiyā disā nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1225_17: Ayaṃ ayaṃ tatiyo tatiyo kusaladhammo sukhāya paṭipadāya dandhābhiññāya niyyakassa mudindriyassa diṭṭhicaritassa puggalassa tatiyā disā nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1225_18: Ayaṃ ayaṃ catuttho catuttho kusaladhammo sukhāya paṭipadāya khippābhiññāya niyyakassa tikkhindriyassa
tika-s0501t0:1225_19: diṭṭhicaritassa puggalassa catutthā disā nāmā”ti visuṃ visuṃ disābhāvena yojetvā,
tika-s0501t0:1225_23: Tassa olokanā ca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena dassitā.
tika-s0501t0:1225_25: Tathā oloketvā disāvisesassa dhammassa puggalānaṃ nayanañca yena saṃvaṇṇanāvisesena nayati,
tika-s0501t0:1225_26: so saṃvaṇṇanāviseso ca aṅkusanayasamuṭṭhānaṃ bhavatīti nayakkamena saṅkhepato nayasamuṭṭhānaṃ bhavatīti viññātabbanti.
tika-s0501t0:1228_0: Paṇḍitehi pana aṭṭhakathāṭīkānusārena gambhīrattho vitthārato vibhajitvā gahetabboti.
tika-s0501t0:1230_1: “Tattha katamaṃ nayasamuṭṭhāna”ntiādinā ācariyena sabbathā nayasamuṭṭhānaṃ ṭhapitaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1230_4: kuhiṃ amhehi daṭṭhabbā”ti vattabbabhāvato “tattha aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā kuhiṃ daṭṭhabbā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1230_5: Tatthāti tesu soḷasahārapañcanayaaṭṭhārasamūlapadesu aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā kena padena ācariyena vibhattā,
tika-s0501t0:1230_8: tumhehi ca vitthārato sāsanapaṭṭhāne daṭṭhabbāti vissajjeti.
tika-s0501t0:1230_9: Vibhattāyeva hi aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā daṭṭhabbā bhavanti.
tika-s0501t0:1231_0: “Evaṃ sabbathā nayasamuṭṭhānaṃ vibhajitvā idāni sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ vibhajanto yasmā saṅgahavārādīsu mūlapadeheva
tika-s0501t0:1231_3: evaṃ paṭṭhānatopi mūlapadāni niddhāretabbānīti dassanatthaṃ ‘aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā kuhiṃ daṭṭhabbā?
tika-s0501t0:1232_1: Sāsanapaṭṭhāne aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā daṭṭhabbāti ācariyena vuttā,
tika-s0501t0:1232_2: “katamaṃ taṃ sāsanapaṭṭhāna”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1232_3: Tatthāti tesu aṭṭhārasamūlapadasāsanapaṭṭhānesu katamaṃ taṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānanti idāni mayā niddhāriyamānaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1232_4: bhagavatā desitaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyādisuttaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ nāmāti vissajjeti.
tika-s0501t0:1232_6: Paṭṭhānanti tassa pariyattisāsanassa saṃkilesabhāgiyatādīhi pakārehi ṭhānaṃ pavattanaṃ paṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1232_10: Atha vā sāsananti adhisīlaadhicittaadhipaññāsikkhattayaṃ sāsanaṃ nāma,
tika-s0501t0:1232_11: taṃ sikkhattayaṃ patiṭṭhahati etena saṃkilesādināti paṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1234_2: tesu saṃkilesādīsu saṃkileso kittako”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha saṃkileso tividho taṇhāsaṃkileso diṭṭhisaṃkileso duccaritasaṃkileso”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1234_4: “Tividhe tasmiṃ saṃkilese taṇhāsaṃkileso katamena kusalena visujjhatī”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha taṇhāsaṃkileso samathena visujjhatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1234_6: “So samatho khandhesu katamo khandho”ti pucchitabbattā “so samatho samādhikkhandho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1234_7: “Diṭṭhisaṃkileso kena visujjhatī”ti pucchitabbattā “diṭṭhisaṃkileso vipassanāya visujjhatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1234_8: “Sā vipassanā katamo khandho”ti vattabbattā “sā vipassanā paññākkhandho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1234_9: “Duccaritasaṃkileso kena visujjhatī”ti vattabbattā “duccaritasaṃkileso sucaritena visujjhatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1234_10: “Taṃ sucaritaṃ katamo khandho”ti vattabbattā “taṃ sucaritaṃ sīlakkhandho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1234_11: “Tasmiṃ sīle ṭhitassa puggalassa kiṃ bhavatī”ti vattabbattā “tassa sīle patiṭṭhitassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1234_12: Sīle sucaritasaṅkhāte sīlakkhandhe patiṭṭhitassa tassa sīlavantassa puggalassa bhavesu kāmabhavarūpārūpabhavesu āsatti bhavapatthanā yadi uppajjati,
tika-s0501t0:1234_14: Evaṃ sati assa sīle patiṭṭhitassa ayaṃ āsatti bhavapatthanā samathavipassanābhāvanāmayapuññakiriyavatthu ca bhavati, ca-
tika-s0501t0:1234_15: saddena dānamayasīlamayapuññakiriyavatthu ca bhavatīti attho saṅgahito.
tika-s0501t0:1235_1: tāni suttāni kittakānī”ti vattabbattā “imāni cattāri suttānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1235_16: bhāgiyananibbedhabhāgiyanaasekkhabhāgiyasuttāni katāni missitāni aṭṭha suttāni bhavantīti soḷasa suttāni bhavanti.
tika-s0501t0:1235_17: Tesu soḷasasuttesu cattāri ekakāni suttāni ca cattāri dukāni suttāni ca dve tikāni ca pāḷiyaṃ āgatāni,
tika-s0501t0:1235_18: dve dukāni suttāni ca dve tikāni ca dve catukkāni suttāni ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatāni.
tika-s0501t0:1236_1: evaṃ sati suttageyyādinavavidhaṃ sakalaṃ pariyattisāsanaṃ paṭṭhānanayena avibhattaṃ bhaveyyā”ti vattabbattā “imehi soḷasahi suttehī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1236_2: Paṭṭhānanayena vibhattehi soḷasahi imehi suttehi navavidhaṃ sakalaṃ pariyattisuttaṃ paṭṭhānanayena vibhattaṃyeva hutvā bhinnaṃ bhavati.
tika-s0501t0:1237_1: “Tesu soḷasasu saṃkilesabhāgiyādīsu suttesu katamaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ sutta”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ sutta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1237_2: Tatthāti tesu soḷasasu saṃkilesabhāgiyādīsu suttesu katamaṃ suttaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāmāti pucchati.
tika-s0501t0:1241_0: Idaṃ suttaṃ saṃkilesabhāge vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1241_1: Ye sattā kāmandhā kāmena andhā jālasañchannā taṇhāchadanena chāditā,
tika-s0501t0:1241_4: yathā taṃ kumināmukhe ye macchā gahitā,
tika-s0501t0:1241_8: evaṃ te satte jarāmaraṇaṃ anvetīti yojanā kātabbā.
tika-s0501t0:1241_9: Atha vā khīrapako vaccho mātaraṃ anveti iva,
tika-s0501t0:1241_10: kumināmukhe gahitā macchā jarāmaraṇaṃ anventi iva ca,
tika-s0501t0:1241_11: evaṃ ye sattā kāmandhā pamattabandhanāya bandhitabbā,
tika-s0501t0:1244_0: “Chandā dosā bhayā mohā, yo dhammaṃ ativattati;
tika-s0501t0:1247_1: Chandā chandahetunā dosā dosahetunā bhayā bhayahetunā mohā mohahetunā yo rājādiko yo vinayadharādiko
tika-s0501t0:1247_2: vā dhammaṃ sappurisadhammaṃ ativattati atikkamitvā vattati,
tika-s0501t0:1247_3: tassa rājādino vā tassa vinayadharādino vā yaso kitti ca parivāro ca bhogo ca nihīyati.
tika-s0501t0:1248_1: cakkaṃva vahato padanti idaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ sutta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1249_0: “Middhī yadā hoti mahagghaso ca, niddāyitā samparivattasāyī;
tika-s0501t0:1251_0: Idaṃ suttampi saṃkilesabhāge visaye vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1251_1: Nivāpapuṭṭho mahāvarāho gāmasūkaro niddāyitā supanasīlo samparivattasāyī hoti iva,
tika-s0501t0:1251_2: evaṃ yo mando satto yadā mahagghaso hoti,
tika-s0501t0:1251_3: so mando satto middhī thinamiddhābhibhūto hutvā niddāyitā muduphassasayane muduhatthehi parāmasito samparivattasāyī punappunaṃ gabbhaṃ upetīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1253_0: Evaṃ atidhonacārinaṃ, sāni kammāni nayanti duggati”nti. –
tika-s0501t0:1254_1: Ayasā ayato samuṭṭhitaṃ jātamalaṃ tatuṭṭhāya tato ayato uṭṭhahitvā tameva ayaṃ khādati iva,
tika-s0501t0:1254_2: evaṃ atidhonacārinaṃ atikkamitvā dhonacāripuggalaṃ sāni sayaṃ katāni akusalakammāni duggatiṃ nayantīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1255_0: “Coro yathā sandhimukhe gahīto, sakammunā haññati bajjhate ca;
tika-s0501t0:1256_0: Evaṃ ayaṃ pecca pajā parattha, sakammunā haññati bajjhate cā”ti. –
tika-s0501t0:1257_1: Sandhimukhe rājapurisādīhi gahito coro sakammunā attanā katena corakammena haññati ca bajjhate ca yathā,
tika-s0501t0:1257_2: evaṃ ayaṃ pāpakārinī pajā parattha paraloke pecca sakammunā sayaṃ katena akusalakammunā satthādīhi haññati ca addubandhanādīhi bajjhate cāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1259_0: Attano sukhamesāno, pecca so na labhate sukha”nti. –
tika-s0501t0:1260_1: Attano sukhaṃ esāno esamāno yo satto aññāni sukhakāmāni bhūtāni daṇḍena vihiṃsati,
tika-s0501t0:1260_2: so hiṃsako satto paraloke pecca sukhaṃ na labhatīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1262_0: Sabbā tā jimhaṃ gacchanti, nette jimhaṃ gate sati.
tika-s0501t0:1264_0: So ce adhammaṃ carati, pageva itarā pajā;
tika-s0501t0:1265_0: Sabbaṃ raṭṭhaṃ dukkhaṃ seti, rājā ce hoti adhammiko”ti. –
tika-s0501t0:1266_1: Nadiṃ taramānānaṃ gunnaṃ puṅgavo jimhaṃ ce gacchati,
tika-s0501t0:1266_2: evaṃ nette jimhaṃ gate sati sabbā tā gāviyo jimhaṃ gacchanti yathā,
tika-s0501t0:1266_5: evaṃ raññe adhammaṃ carante sati itarā pajā pageva paṭhamameva adhammaṃ carati.
tika-s0501t0:1266_7: evaṃ raññe adhammike sati sabbaṃ raṭṭhaṃ dukkhaṃ setīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1267_0: “Sukiccharūpā vatime manussā, karonti pāpaṃ upadhīsu rattā;
tika-s0501t0:1268_0: Gacchanti te bahujanasannivāsaṃ, nirayaṃ avīciṃ kaṭukaṃ bhayānaka”nti. –
tika-s0501t0:1269_1: Ye manussā upadhīsu kāmaguṇūpadhīsu rattā rāgābhibhūtā hutvā pāpaṃ akusalakammaṃ karonti,
tika-s0501t0:1269_2: ime pāpakammakarā manussā sukiccharūpā vata suṭṭhu kicchāpannarūpā vata bhavanti,
tika-s0501t0:1269_3: te pāpakammakarā manussā kaṭukaṃ bhayānakaṃ bahujanasannivāsaṃ nirayaṃ avīciṃ gacchantīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1270_0: “Phalaṃ ve kadaliṃ hanti, phalaṃ veḷuṃ phalaṃ naḷaṃ;
tika-s0501t0:1271_0: Sakkāro kāpurisaṃ hanti, gabbho assatariṃ yathā”ti. –
tika-s0501t0:1272_1: Phalaṃ kadaliyā phalaṃ kadaliṃ ve ekantena hanti yathā,
tika-s0501t0:1272_2: phalaṃ veḷuṃ ve ekantena hanti yathā,
tika-s0501t0:1272_3: phalaṃ naḷaṃ ve ekantena hanti yathā,
tika-s0501t0:1272_4: gabbho assatariṃ mātaraṃ ve ekantena hanti yathā,
tika-s0501t0:1272_5: evaṃ sakkāro kāpurisaṃ ve ekantena hantīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1275_1: Sukhette sundare khettepi khittaṃ pūtibījaṃ na ruhati iva,
