tika-s0501t0:1275_2: evaṃ yo bhikkhu lābhasakkāragāravo kodhaṃ kujjhanalakkhaṇaṃ kodhaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1275_3: makkhaṃ paraguṇasīlamakkhanalakkhaṇaṃ makkhañca garuṃ katvā carati,
tika-s0501t0:1275_4: so caranto bhikkhu saddhammasmiṃ na ruhatīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1276_2: ekaccaṃ puggalaṃ paduṭṭhacittaṃ evaṃ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi…pe…
tika-s0501t0:1276_3: iti me suta”nti idaṃ suttampi saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1276_5: loke vā ahaṃ ekaccaṃ puggalaṃ paduṭṭhacittaṃ mama cetasā tassa ceto cittaṃ paricca paricchinditvā buddhacakkhunā evaṃ pajānāmi.
tika-s0501t0:1276_8: yañca maggaṃ samāruḷho ayaṃ puggalo yathā yāya duppaṭipadāya yena dummaggena iriyati pavattati,
tika-s0501t0:1276_9: tāya duppaṭipadāya tena dummaggena imamhi imasmiṃ samaye duppaṭipajjanakāle ayaṃ duppaṭipannaṃ paṭipanno dummaggasamāruḷho puggalo ce kālaṃ kareyya,
tika-s0501t0:1276_10: evaṃ sati ābhataṃ vatthu nikkhittaṃ yathā,
tika-s0501t0:1276_13: Bhikkhave assa puggalassa cittaṃ paduṭṭhaṃ padositaṃ hi yasmā hoti,
tika-s0501t0:1276_16: loke vā cetopadosahetu ca pana ekacce sattā puggalā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ upapajjantīti pajānāmīti.
tika-s0501t0:1276_19: nirayaṃ so upapajjatī”ti gāthāvacanaṃ iti evaṃ vuccati.
tika-s0501t0:1277_1: loke vā paduṭṭhacittaṃ ekaccaṃ puggalaṃ ñatvāna bhikkhūnaṃ santike etamatthaṃ byākāsi.
tika-s0501t0:1277_2: Imamhi imasmiṃ samaye ayaṃ puggalo ce kālaṃ kayirātha,
tika-s0501t0:1277_3: evaṃ sati paduṭṭhacittasamaṅgī hi nirayasmiṃ upapajjeyya,
tika-s0501t0:1277_4: puggalassa cittaṃ padūsitaṃ hi yasmā hoti,
tika-s0501t0:1277_6: cetopadosahetu sattā duggatiṃ gacchanti ābhataṃ vatthuṃ nikkhipeyya yathā,
tika-s0501t0:1277_7: evamevaṃ tathāvidho duppañño so padosacitto puggalo kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā nirayaṃ upapajjatīti ayampi attho bhagavatā vutto,
tika-s0501t0:1279_0: Mākattha pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, āvi vā yadi vā raho.
tika-s0501t0:1280_0: “Sace ca pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, karissatha karotha vā;
tika-s0501t0:1281_0: Na vo dukkhā pamutyatthi, upeccapi palāyata”nti. –
tika-s0501t0:1282_3: vo tumhehi dukkhaṃ tathā aṭṭhavidhaṃ dukkhaṃ sace appiyaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1282_4: evaṃ sati āvi vā yadi raho vā pāpakaṃ kammaṃ mākattha mā akattha.
tika-s0501t0:1282_5: Sappurisā tumhe āvi vā yadi raho vā pāpakaṃ kammaṃ sace karissatha vā sace karotha vā,
tika-s0501t0:1282_6: evaṃ sati upeccapi sañciccāpi palāyataṃ palāyantānaṃ vo tumhākaṃ dukkhā aṭṭhavidhā dukkhato pamutti muccanaṃ natthevāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1284_0: Mameti bālā maññanti, taṃ kathaṃ nu bhavissati.
tika-s0501t0:1286_0: Matā saggaṃ na gacchanti, nanu ettāvatā hatā”ti. –
tika-s0501t0:1287_1: Ye bālā adhammena ca musāvādena ca dhanaṃ saviññāṇāviññāṇaṃ sabbaṃ labhitabbaṃ dhanaṃ laddhā ubhayaṃ dhanaṃ “mama dhana”nti maññanti,
tika-s0501t0:1287_2: tesaṃ bālānaṃ taṃ ubhayaṃ dhanaṃ kathaṃ kena nu pakārena bhavissati,
tika-s0501t0:1287_4: Antarāyā rājantarāyādayo antarāyā tesaṃ bālānaṃ bhavissanti.
tika-s0501t0:1287_6: assa adhammavohārādikassa taṃ sambhataṃ dhanaṃ vinassati.
tika-s0501t0:1287_7: Matā marantā te bālā saggaṃ sugatiṃ na gacchanti.
tika-s0501t0:1287_8: Sugati hi sobhanehi bhogehi aggoti “saggo”ti adhippetā.
tika-s0501t0:1287_9: Ettāvatā ettakena diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikānaṃ attahitānaṃ hāyanena te bālā hatā vinaṭṭhā bhavanti nanūti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1289_0: Kathaṃ vivaṭṭate dhammā, kathaṃ saggaṃ na gacchati”.
tika-s0501t0:1291_0: Lobhā vivaṭṭate dhammā, lobhā saggaṃ na gacchatī”ti. –
tika-s0501t0:1292_0: Idaṃ suttampi saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma. Yojanattho pākaṭo.
tika-s0501t0:1294_0: Karontā pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, yaṃ hoti kaṭukapphalaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1295_0: “Na taṃ kammaṃ kataṃ sādhu, yaṃ katvā anutappati;
tika-s0501t0:1297_1: Dummedhā nippaññā bālā amittena pāpakaṃ kammaṃ kataṃ iva,
tika-s0501t0:1297_2: evaṃ attanā kaṭukapphalaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ kataṃ hoti,
tika-s0501t0:1297_3: taṃ pāpakaṃ kataṃ kammaṃ karontā caranti.
tika-s0501t0:1297_4: Yaṃ kammaṃ katvā karonto pacchā anutappati,
tika-s0501t0:1297_6: Yassa kammassa vipākaṃ rodaṃ rudanto assumukho paṭisevati,
tika-s0501t0:1297_7: taṃ kataṃ kammaṃ na sādhūti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1298_1: avītarāgo”ti idaṃ suttampi saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1300_0: Appameyyaṃ pamāyinaṃ, nivutaṃ taṃ maññe akissava”nti. –
tika-s0501t0:1301_1: Idha sāsane appameyyaṃ appameyyaguṇaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ puggalaṃ “ayaṃ khīṇāsavo puggalo ettakasīlo ettakasamādhi
tika-s0501t0:1301_3: Appameyyaṃ khīṇāsavapuggalaṃ pamāyinaṃ pamāyantaṃ taṃ puthujjanaṃ ayaṃ nivutaṃ avakujjapaññaṃ akissavaṃ apaññanti maññe maññāmīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1303_0: Yāya chindati attānaṃ, bālo dubbhāsitaṃ bhaṇaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1304_0: “Na hi satthaṃ sunisitaṃ, visaṃ halāhalaṃ iva;
tika-s0501t0:1305_0: Evaṃ viraddhaṃ pāteti, vācā dubbhāsitā yathā”ti. –
tika-s0501t0:1306_1: Dubbhāsitaṃ ariyūpavādasaṅkhātaṃ pharusavācaṃ bhaṇaṃ bhaṇanto bālo duṭṭho puriso yāya kuṭhārīsadisiyā dubbhāsitavācāya attānaṃ chindati,
tika-s0501t0:1306_2: sā kuṭhārīsadisī dubbhāsitavācā jātassa purisassa mukhe jāyate jāyati,
tika-s0501t0:1306_4: evaṃ sunisitaṃ satthaṃ mukhe na jāyati,
tika-s0501t0:1306_5: yathā halāhalaṃ visaṃ mukhe na jāyati,
tika-s0501t0:1306_6: dubbhāsitā vācā apāyesu viraddhaṃ puggalaṃ pāteti yathā,
tika-s0501t0:1306_7: evaṃ sunisitaṃ satthaṃ apāyesu na pāteti,
tika-s0501t0:1306_8: halāhalaṃ visaṃ apāyesu na pātetīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1308_0: “Yo nindiyaṃ pasaṃsati, taṃ vā nindati yo pasaṃsiyo;
tika-s0501t0:1309_0: Vicināti mukhena so kaliṃ, kalinā tena sukhaṃ na vindati.
tika-s0501t0:1311_0: Sabbassāpi sahāpi attanā, ayameva mahantataro kali;
tika-s0501t0:1313_0: “Sataṃ sahassānaṃ nirabbudānaṃ, chattiṃsatī pañca ca abbudāni;
tika-s0501t0:1314_0: Yamariyagarahī nirayaṃ upeti, vācaṃ manañca paṇidhāya pāpaka”nti. –
tika-s0501t0:1315_1: Yo puggalo nindiyaṃ duccaraṃ dussīlaṃ puggalaṃ pasaṃsati,
tika-s0501t0:1315_2: so pasaṃsako puggalo mukhena kaliṃ vicināti upacināti,
tika-s0501t0:1315_4: Yo sucārī sīlavā puggalo pasaṃsiyo hoti,
tika-s0501t0:1315_5: taṃ vā sucāriṃ vā sīlavantaṃ puggalaṃ yo puggalo nindati,
tika-s0501t0:1315_6: so nindanto puggalo mukhena kaliṃ vicināti upacināti,
tika-s0501t0:1316_0: Attanā sahāpi sabbassa dhanassa vasenapi akkhesu yo dhanaparājayo bhavati,
tika-s0501t0:1316_1: ayaṃ kali ayaṃ dhanaparājayo appamatto hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1317_1: Vācañca manañca paṇidhāya ariyagarahī puggalo yaṃ kālaṃ pāpakaṃ nirayaṃ upeti,
tika-s0501t0:1317_2: so kālo “sataṃ sahassānaṃ nirabbudānañca chattiṃsa nirabbudāni ca pañca abbudāni ca yasmiṃ kāle gaṇīyantī”ti tena kālena samo hoti,
tika-s0501t0:1320_1: Yo puggalo lobhaguṇe anuyutto anu punappunaṃ yutto hoti,
tika-s0501t0:1320_2: so puggalo aññe puggale vacasā paribhāsati,
tika-s0501t0:1320_3: assaddho kadariyo avadaññū buddhānaṃ ovādaññū na hoti,
tika-s0501t0:1321_0: Mukhadugga mukhavisama vibhūta vigatabhūta anariya bhūnahu buddhivināsaka pāpaka dukkaṭakāri purisanta
tika-s0501t0:1321_1: purisalāmaka kali alakkhi avajātaputta tvaṃ nerayiko asi.
tika-s0501t0:1322_0: Ahitāya rajaṃ attani mā ākirasi mā pakkhipasi.
tika-s0501t0:1322_1: Kibbisakāri tvaṃ sante khīṇāsave puggale garahasi,
tika-s0501t0:1322_3: caritvā tvaṃ cirarattaṃ racanavirahitaṃ papataṃ narakaṃ nirayaṃ gacchasi kho ekaṃsenāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1323_2: “katamaṃ vāsanābhāgiyaṃ sutta”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ vāsanābhāgiyaṃ sutta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1323_3: Tatthāti tesu soḷasasu saṃkilesabhāgiyādīsu suttesu katamaṃ suttaṃ vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāmāti pucchati.
tika-s0501t0:1323_5: chāyāva anapāyinī”ti idaṃ vāsanābhāge puññabhāge visaye vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1324_2: apāpikā kālaṅkiriyā”ti idaṃ suttampi vāsanābhāge puññabhāge visaye vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1326_0: Attano sukhamesāno, pecca so labhate sukha”nti. –
tika-s0501t0:1327_0: Idaṃ suttampi vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma. Attho pākaṭo.
tika-s0501t0:1328_1: rājā ce hoti dhammiko”ti idaṃ suttampi vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1330_1: sattahi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto janapadacārikaṃ caranti.
tika-s0501t0:1330_9: avuṭṭhiādiupaddavūpasamanatthañcāti imehi sattahi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto janapadacārikaṃ carantīti janapadacaraṇakāraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1332_0: Deve ceva manusse ca, sesena parinibbuto”ti. –
tika-s0501t0:1333_0: Idaṃ suttampi vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma. Sahassaṃ kappakoṭiyoti sahassaṃ attabhāvato koṭiyo.
tika-s0501t0:1337_0: Tisso vijjā sacchikatā, tassā saññāya vāsanā”ti. –
tika-s0501t0:1338_0: Idaṃ suttampi vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma. Haritobhāseti haritaobhāse. Alabhiṃhanti ahaṃ alabhiṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1339_1: vipāko hoti acintiyo”ti idaṃ suttampi vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1339_2: Aggapuggalo anukampako taṇhānighātako muni sambuddho purebhattaṃ piṇḍāya piṇḍaṃ paṭiggaṇhituṃ kosalaṃ puraṃ pāvisi.
tika-s0501t0:1340_0: Yassa purisassa hatthe sabbapupphehi alaṅkato vaṭaṃsako pupphavaṭaṃsakova atthi,
tika-s0501t0:1340_1: so ayaṃ puriso rājamaggena kosalapuraṃ pavisantaṃ bhikkhusaṅghapurakkhataṃ devamānusapūjitaṃ sambuddhaṃ addasa,
tika-s0501t0:1341_0: Upasaṅkamitvā so ayaṃ pasanno hutvā surabhiṃ vaṇṇavantaṃ manoramaṃ taṃ vaṭaṃsakaṃ sambuddhassa sehi pāṇībhi upanāmesi.
tika-s0501t0:1342_0: Tato buddhassa lapanantarā lapanassa vadanassa antarā aggisikhā vaṇṇā sahassaraṃsi okkā pabhā nikkhami,
tika-s0501t0:1342_2: evaṃ ānanā sahassaraṃsi nikkhamitvā ādiccabandhuno sīse tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karitvāna parivaṭṭetvā muddhani antaradhāyatha.
tika-s0501t0:1343_0: Ānando acchariyaṃ abbhutaṃ lomahaṃsanaṃ idaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā cīvaraṃ ekaṃsaṃ karitvā etaṃ abravi –
tika-s0501t0:1344_0: Yassa bhagavato sabbadhammesu ñāṇaṃ sadā pavattati,
tika-s0501t0:1344_1: kaṅkhāvitaraṇo muni so bhagavā kaṅkhiṃ vematikaṃ ānandaṃ theraṃ etaṃ abravi. Ānanda,
tika-s0501t0:1344_3: so puriso caturāsītikappāni duggatiṃ na gamissati,
tika-s0501t0:1344_4: devesu devasobhaggaṃ dibbaṃ rajjaṃ pasāsitvā manujesu raṭṭhe sakalaraṭṭhe manujindo rājā bhavissati.
tika-s0501t0:1344_6: dhammataṃ sacchikatvā ca dhutarāgo vaṭaṃsako nāma paccekabuddho bhavissati.
tika-s0501t0:1345_0: Tathāgate vā sammāsambuddhe vā paccekasambuddhe vā tassa tathāgatassa sāvake vā citte pasannamhi dakkhiṇā appakā nāma natthi.
tika-s0501t0:1346_1: Buddhadhammā buddhaguṇā evaṃ ettakāti acintiyā bhavanti,
tika-s0501t0:1346_2: acintiye pasannānaṃ vipāko puññavipāko evaṃ ettakoti acintiyo hotīti etaṃ abravīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1347_3: ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā iti me suta”nti idaṃ suttampi vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1347_5: idha imasmiṃ sāsane ahaṃ ekaccaṃ puggalaṃ evaṃ mama cetasā ekaccassa puggalassa ceto cittaṃ paricca buddhacakkhunā evaṃ pajānāmi,
tika-s0501t0:1347_6: yathā yena pakārena ayaṃ puggalo yañca dānādipaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno,
tika-s0501t0:1347_7: yañca dassanādimaggaṃ samāruḷho hutvā taṃ paṭipadaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1347_9: imamhi imasmiñca samaye ayaṃ puggalo ce kālaṃ kareyya,
tika-s0501t0:1347_10: evaṃ sati ābhataṃ vatthuṃ nikkhipati yathā,
tika-s0501t0:1347_11: evaṃ tāya paṭipadāya tena maggena sagge attanikkhitto bhave.
tika-s0501t0:1347_14: assa puggalassa cittaṃ hi yasmā pasannaṃ pasāditaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1347_17: loke vā ekacce sattā puggalā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ cetopasādahetu kho pana
tika-s0501t0:1347_18: upapajjantīti evaṃ ahaṃ pajānāmīti bhagavā etamatthaṃ avoca.
tika-s0501t0:1347_19: Tattha tasmiṃ atthe saṅgahavasena pavattaṃ etaṃ “pasannacittaṃ ñatvāna…pe…
tika-s0501t0:1348_1: etādisaṃ katapuññā labhi”nti idaṃ suttampi vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1348_2: Nāri devadhītā suvaṇṇacchadanaṃ suvaṇṇālaṅkārehi chāditaṃ nāvaṃ āruyha tiṭṭhasi,
tika-s0501t0:1349_0: Devate kena kammena te tava tādiso vaṇṇo tādiso ānubhāvo tādisī juti bhavati,
tika-s0501t0:1349_1: devate te tava ye keci bhogā manasā icchitā bhavanti,
tika-s0501t0:1349_2: te bhogā ca kena kammena uppajjanti.
tika-s0501t0:1349_3: Devate me pucchitā tvaṃ saṃsa saṃsāhi idaṃ sabbaṃ kissa kammassa ca phalanti sakko pucchati.
tika-s0501t0:1350_0: Devarājena pucchitā sā devadhītā attamanā hutvā pañhaṃ puṭṭhā sakkassa byākāsi.
tika-s0501t0:1350_1: Devarājā addhānaṃ dīghamaggaṃ paṭipannā ahaṃ yasassino kassapassa bhagavato manoramaṃ thūpaṃ addassaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1350_4: Tasseva kammassa idaṃ sabbaṃ phalaṃ vipāko bhave.
tika-s0501t0:1350_5: Katapuññāhaṃ etādisaṃ phalaṃ alabhinti sakkassa byākāsi.
tika-s0501t0:1350_6: Iti me sutanti mahāmoggallāno vadatīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1351_2: Tattha yāya desanāya dānañca dānaphalañca dassitaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1351_6: Yāya desanāya saggā ca saggesu nibbattāpakañca kammaṃ dassitaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1351_8: Yāya desanāya dānasīlabhāvanādivasena dasavidhaṃ puññakammaṃ dassitaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1351_10: Yāya desanāya tādisassa puññakammassa vividho ayaṃ vipāko imassa puññassa vipākoti niyametvā dassito,
tika-s0501t0:1352_0: Dasabaladharānaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ uddissakatesu sarīradhātuṃ abbhantare ṭhapetvā paṃsūhi katesu thūpesu ye narā pasannā,
tika-s0501t0:1352_1: te narā tattha thūpe kāraṃ puññaṃ katvā saggesu uppajjitvā pamodantīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1353_1: Devaputtasarīravaṇṇā devaputtasarīrasadisavaṇṇā subhagasaṇṭhiti sobhaggayuttasaṇṭhānā sabbe janā udakena paṃsuṃ temetvā thūpaṃ vaḍḍhetha,
tika-s0501t0:1353_2: so ayaṃ thūpo kassa puggalassa thūpoti pucchati.
tika-s0501t0:1354_0: Sugatte sundaragatte devate tasmiṃ thūpe pasannā ime devamanujā kāraṃ puññaṃ karontā hutvā jarāmaraṇato pamuccare.
tika-s0501t0:1354_1: So ayaṃ thūpo mahesino dasabaladhammadhārino sugatassa thūpoti veditabboti āhāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1355_0: Yāhaṃ yā ahaṃ mahesino thūpaṃ cattāri uppalāni ca mālañca abhiropayiṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1355_1: tena mayā kataṃ taṃ puññaṃ uḷāraṃ vata āsi ahosi.
tika-s0501t0:1355_2: Tato kappato ajja kappā tiṃsaṃ dharanti satthuno thūpaṃ pūjetvā tattakāni duggatiṃ na jānāmi,
tika-s0501t0:1356_0: Ahaṃ bāttiṃsalakkhaṇadharassa bāttiṃsalakkhaṇadharena sampannassa vijitavijayassa lokanāthassa thūpaṃ apūjesiṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1356_1: pūjetvā satasahassaṃ kappe āyukappe pamudito āsiṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1356_3: tena puññena vinipātaṃ anāgantuna anāgantvā devasobhaggaṃ sampattiṃ ca devarajjāni ca tāni akāriṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1357_0: Adantadamakassa sāsane yaṃ cakkhu paññācakkhu paṇihitaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1357_2: taṃ sabbaṃ paññācakkhu vimuttacittaṃ me mayā laddhaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1357_3: ahaṃ vidhutalatāsaṅkhātataṇhā hutvā vimuttacittā phalavimuttacittasampannā amhīti avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1358_1: Vimuttacitte phalavimuttacittasampanne akhile pañcacetokhīlarahite anāsave araṇavihārimhi araṇavihārasīle
tika-s0501t0:1358_2: asaṅgamānase alaggamānase paccekabuddhasmiṃ sāmākapatthodanamattameva dakkhiṇaṃ adāsiṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1359_0: Tasmiṃ paccekabuddhe uttamaṃ dhammaṃ paccekabodhidhammaṃ okappayiṃ “so uttamo dhammo atthī”ti saddahiṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1359_1: Evaṃ ariyavihārena vihārīhi paccekabuddhehi me mama saṅgamo kato siyā bhave,
tika-s0501t0:1359_2: kudāsupi ca ahaṃ apekkhavā mā bhaveyyanti mānasaṃ tasmiñca dhamme paṇidhesiṃ “iminā paccekabuddhena laddhadhammaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1360_0: Tasseva paccekabuddhe katasseva kammassa vipākato ahaṃ dīghāyukesu amamesu “mama pariggaho”ti pariggahābhāvena
tika-s0501t0:1360_1: apariggahesu visesagāmīsu ahīnagāmīsu kurūsu uttarakurūsu pāṇīsu sattesu sahassakkhattuṃ upapajjatha
tika-s0501t0:1361_0: Tasseva kammassa vipākato vicitramālābharaṇānulepīsu yasassīsu parivāravantesu tidaso devo ahaṃ visiṭṭhakāyūpagato hutvā sahassakkhattuṃ upapajjatha.
tika-s0501t0:1362_0: Tasseva kammassa vipākato ahaṃ vimuttacitto akhīlo anāsavo hutvā hitāhitāsīhi kusalākusalavītivattehi antimadehadhāribhi imehi paccekabuddhehi,
tika-s0501t0:1362_1: buddhasāvakehi vā me mama samāgamo āsi.
tika-s0501t0:1363_1: taṃ samijjhate”ti imaṃ vacanaṃ tathāgato jino paccakkhaṃ katvā avaca kho,
tika-s0501t0:1363_2: yathā yathā yena yena pakārena me manasā vicintitaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1363_3: tathā tathā tena tena pakārena samiddhaṃ bhavati.
tika-s0501t0:1364_0: Ekatiṃsamhi kappamhi jino anejo anantadassī “sikhī”ti itināmako uppajji.
tika-s0501t0:1364_1: Tassāpi bhagavato rājā bhātā sikhiddhe ca sikhī itināmake buddhe ca tassa bhagavato dhamme ca abhippasanno
tika-s0501t0:1364_2: lokavināyakamhi parinibbute sati devātidevassa naruttamassa mahesino vipulaṃ mahantaṃ samantato gāvutikaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1365_0: Tasmiṃ thūpe baliṃ pūjābaliṃ abhihārī manusso jātisumanaṃ paggayha pahaṭṭho pūjesi.
tika-s0501t0:1365_1: Assa manussassa ekaṃ pupphaṃ vātena paharitaṃ hutvā patitaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1365_2: Ahaṃ taṃ patitaṃ ekaṃ pupphaṃ gahetvā tasseva pupphasāmikassa adāsiṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1366_0: So manusso pupphasāmiko abhippasannacitto hutvā maṃ “tvameva etaṃ ekaṃ pupphaṃ pūjā”ti adāsi.
tika-s0501t0:1366_3: Ahaṃ taṃ ekaṃ pupphaṃ gahetvā buddhaṃ buddhaguṇaṃ punappunaṃ anussaranto yasmiṃ kappe abhiropayiṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1366_4: tato kappato ajja kappā tiṃsaṃ ahesuṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1366_7: idaṃ phalaṃ thūpapūjāya phalanti avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1367_0: Brahmadattassa brahmadattanāmakassa rājino kapilaṃ nāma nagaraṃ suvibhattaṃ bhāgato suṭṭhu vibhattaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1368_0: Pañcālānaṃ tattha puruttame ahaṃ kummāsaṃ vikkiṇiṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1368_1: so ahaṃ yasassinaṃ upariṭṭhaṃ upasamīpe ṭhitaṃ ariṭṭhaṃ nāma sambuddhaṃ paccekabuddhaṃ addasiṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1368_2: disvā haṭṭho cittaṃ pasādetvā naruttamaṃ ariṭṭhaṃ me gehasmiṃ yaṃ dhuvabhattaṃ vijjatha vijji,
tika-s0501t0:1369_0: Yato ca yasmiṃ kāle ca kattiko yassaṃ pannarasīpuṇṇo,
tika-s0501t0:1369_2: tato ca tasmiṃ kāle ca ahaṃ navaṃ dussayugaṃ gayha ariṭṭhassa ariṭṭhanāmakassa paccekabuddhassa upanāmesiṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1370_0: Naruttamo anukampako kāruṇiko taṇhānighātako muni paccekabuddho pasannacittaṃ maṃ ñatvāna paṭiggaṇhi.
tika-s0501t0:1371_0: Ahaṃ kalyāṇaṃ buddhavaṇṇitaṃ kammaṃ karitvāna deve ca manusse ca sandhāvitvā tato cuto bārāṇasiyaṃ nagare
tika-s0501t0:1372_0: Tato ca tasmiṃ kāle viññutaṃ patto hutvā devaputtena codito ahaṃ pāsādā oruhitvāna sambuddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ gotamaṃ upasaṅkamiṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1373_0: So sambuddho bhagavā gotamo anukampāya me dhammaṃ adesesi.
tika-s0501t0:1373_1: Dukkhaṃ dukkhasaccañca dukkhasamuppādaṃ samudayasaccañca dukkhassa atikkamaṃ nirodhasaccañca ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1373_2: dukkhūpasamagāminaṃ maggaṃ maggasaccañca iti cattāri saccāni desitāni,
tika-s0501t0:1373_3: taduppādakaṃ dhammaṃ muni bhagavā gotamo adesayi.
tika-s0501t0:1374_0: Ahaṃ tassa bhagavato gotamassa vacanaṃ sutvā sāsane rato hutvā vihariṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1374_1: ahaṃ rattindivaṃ atandito hutvā samathaṃ paṭivijjhiṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1375_1: bahiddhā ca ye āsavā maggena samucchinnā āsuṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1375_2: sabbe te āsavā me mama vijjiṃsu,
tika-s0501t0:1376_1: ayaṃ samussayo jātimaraṇasaṃsāro carimo antimo āsi,
tika-s0501t0:1376_2: idāni imassa attabhāvassa anantaraṃ punabbhavo mama natthīti avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1376_3: Yaṃ nānāvidhaṃ vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ udāharaṇavasena niddhāritaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1376_4: idaṃ nānāvidhaṃ suttaṃ vāsanābhāge puññakoṭṭhāse visaye vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1377_2: “katamaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ sutta”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ sutta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1377_3: Tattha tesu soḷasasu saṃkilesabhāgiyādīsu suttesu katamaṃ suttaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāmāti pucchati.
tika-s0501t0:1378_0: Uddhaṃ brahmaloke adho kāmāvacare bhave sabbadhi sabbesu bhavesu vippamutto arahā “ayaṃ nāma dhammo ahaṃ asmī”ti anānupassī,
tika-s0501t0:1378_1: evaṃ vimutto arahā atiṇṇapubbaṃ oghaṃ apunabbhavāya udatāri uttiṇṇoti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1378_2: Idaṃ suttaṃ nibbedhabhāge sekkhadhamme visaye vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1379_1: sīlavato puggalassa “kinti me mama avippaṭisāro jāyeyya pavatteyyā”ti cetanā na karaṇīyā na kātabbā. Ānanda,
tika-s0501t0:1379_3: esā avippaṭisārassa jāyanā pavattanā dhammatā bhavati. Ānanda,
tika-s0501t0:1379_4: avippaṭisārinā puggalena “kinti me mama pāmojjaṃ jāyeyya pavatteyyā”ti cetanā na karaṇīyā, ānanda,
tika-s0501t0:1379_5: avippaṭisārino puggalassa pāmojjaṃ yaṃ jāyeyya pavatteyya,
tika-s0501t0:1380_0: Ātāpino kilesānaṃ ātāpena sammappadhānena samannāgatassa jhāyato jhāyantassa brāhmaṇassa bāhitapāpassa
tika-s0501t0:1380_1: khīṇāsavassa dhammā anulomapaccayākārapaṭivedhasādhakā bodhipakkhiyadhammā yadā yasmiṃ kāle have ekantena
tika-s0501t0:1380_3: Atha vā dhammā catuariyasaccadhammā pātubhavanti pakāsayanti abhisamayavasena pākaṭā honti.
tika-s0501t0:1380_4: Atha vā pātubhavanakāle assa ātāpino jhāyato brāhmaṇassa khīṇāsavassa sabbā kaṅkhā vapayanti apagacchanti nirujjhanti. Kasmā?
tika-s0501t0:1380_5: Sahetudhammaṃ avijjādikena hetunā saha pavattaṃ saṅkhārādikaṃ sukhena asammissaṃ dukkhakkhandhadhammaṃ yato yasmā pajānāti aññāsi paṭivijjhati,
tika-s0501t0:1380_6: tato tasmā vapayanti apagacchanti nirujjhantīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1381_0: Dutiyagāthāyaṃ pana paccayānaṃ khayaṃ khayasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ yato yasmā avedi aññāsi paṭivijjhi,
tika-s0501t0:1381_1: tato tasmā sabbāpi kaṅkhā vapayantīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1382_3: te tava akkodho akujjhanaṃ varaṃ uttamaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1382_5: tayā kodhamānamakkhavinayatthaṃ brahmacariyaṃ vussati nūti bhagavā avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1383_0: Āraññaṃ āraññakaṃ paṃsukūlikaṃ aññātuñchena aññātaanabhilakkhitagharapaṭipāṭiyā ṭhatvā uñchena piṇḍapātacaraṇavīriyena
tika-s0501t0:1383_1: laddhena missakabhojanena yāpentaṃ nandaṃ kadā kāle ahaṃ passeyyanti avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1384_1: kiṃsu katamaṃ chetvā vadhitvā vadhanto kodhapariḷāhena aparidayhamāno hutvā sukhaṃ seti sayati,
tika-s0501t0:1384_2: kiṃsu katamaṃ chetvā vadhitvā vadhanto kodhavināsena vinaṭṭhadomanasso hutvā na socati, gotama,
tika-s0501t0:1384_3: tvaṃ kissa ekadhammassa vadhaṃ vadhanaṃ rocesīti brāhmaṇo pucchati.
tika-s0501t0:1385_1: kodhaṃ kujjhanaṃ chetvā vadhitvā vadhanto kodhapariḷāhena aparidayhamāno hutvā sukhaṃ seti sayati,
tika-s0501t0:1385_2: kodhaṃ kujjhanaṃ chetvā vadhitvā vadhanto kodhavināsena vinaṭṭhadomanasso hutvā na socati,
tika-s0501t0:1385_3: visamūlassa visasadisassa dukkhassa mūlabhūtassa madhuraggassa madhurasaṅkhātassa sukhapariyosānassa
tika-s0501t0:1385_4: kodhassa kujjhanassa vadhaṃ vadhanaṃ ariyā buddhādayo puggalā pasaṃsanti.
tika-s0501t0:1385_5: Hi saccaṃ taṃ kodhaṃ kujjhanaṃ chetvā vadhitvā vadhanto kodhavināsena vinaṭṭhadomanasso hutvā seti sayatīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1385_6: Madhuraggassāti ca madhuraṃ cetasikasukhaṃ assādaaggaṃ pariyosānaṃ assa kodhassāti madhuraggoti samāso veditabbo.
tika-s0501t0:1385_7: Kujjhantassa hi akkositvā paribhāsitvā paharitvā pariyosāne cetasikasukhassādo uppajjatīti.
tika-s0501t0:1386_1: hananto dhīro uppatitaṃ kiṃsu katamaṃ hane haneyya.
tika-s0501t0:1386_2: Vinodento dhīro jātaṃ kiṃsu katamaṃ vinodaye vinodayeyya.
tika-s0501t0:1386_3: Pajahanto dhīro kiṃ ca katamaṃ pajahe pajaheyya.
tika-s0501t0:1386_4: Dhīrassa kissa dhammassa abhisamayo sukhoti devatā pucchati.
tika-s0501t0:1387_1: hananto dhīro uppatitaṃ kodhaṃ kujjhanaṃ hane haneyya.
tika-s0501t0:1387_2: Vinodento dhīro jātaṃ rāgaṃ vinodaye vinodayeyya.
tika-s0501t0:1387_4: Saccadhammassa abhisamayo sukhoti bhagavā avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1388_1: Bhagavā sattiyā omaṭṭho uparito yāva heṭṭhā viddho puriso sattippahānāya vīriyaṃ ārabhati viya,
tika-s0501t0:1388_2: agginā matthake ḍayhamāno ādittasiro puriso agginibbāpanatthāya vīriyaṃ ārabhati iva,
tika-s0501t0:1388_3: evaṃ kāmarāgena ḍayhamāno bhikkhu kāmarāgappahānāya kāmarāgavikkhambhanāya appamatto vāyamamāno sato
tika-s0501t0:1388_4: satisampanno hutvā paribbaje vihareyyāti devatā kathesi.
tika-s0501t0:1389_0: Bhagavā pana “samucchedappahānāya vīriyaṃ ārabhīyatī”ti dassetuṃ “sattiyā viya omaṭṭho”tiādimāha.
tika-s0501t0:1389_2: sattiyā omaṭṭho puriso sattippahānāya vīriyaṃ ārabhati viya,
tika-s0501t0:1389_3: agginā matthake ḍayhamāno ādittasiro puriso agginibbāpanatthāya vīriyaṃ ārabhati iva,
tika-s0501t0:1389_4: evaṃ sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā abhibhūto bhikkhu sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā pahānāya maggena samucchedappahānāya appamatto
tika-s0501t0:1389_5: vāyamamāno sato satisampanno hutvā paribbaje vihareyyāti bhagavā avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1390_0: Sabbe nicayā bhogā khayantā khayapariyosānā bhavanti,
tika-s0501t0:1390_1: sabbe samussayā dhammā patanantā patanapariyosānā bhavanti,
tika-s0501t0:1390_2: sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ maraṇamāgamma sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ jīvitaṃ addhuvaṃ bhavati,
tika-s0501t0:1390_3: iti etaṃ vuttappakāraṃ bhayaṃ bhayahetuṃ maraṇaṃ sammutimaraṇaṃ apekkhamāno paṇḍito sukhāvahāni diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikasukhāvahāni
tika-s0501t0:1391_3: sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ maraṇamāgamma sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ jīvitaṃ addhuvaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1391_4: iti etaṃ vuttappakāraṃ bhayaṃ bhayahetuṃ maraṇaṃ apekkhamāno santipekkho sabbasaṅkhārupasamaṃ nibbānaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1391_5: apekkhamāno paṇḍito lokāmisaṃ kāmaguṇaṃ pajahe pajaheyyāti bhagavā avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1392_0: Māvidha yesaṃ munīnaṃ cittaṃ jhānarataṃ jhāne rataṃ hoti,
tika-s0501t0:1392_1: te munayo sukhaṃ sayanti na socanti.
tika-s0501t0:1392_2: Paññavā maggapaññavā susamāhito āraddhavīriyo pahitatto nibbānaṃ pesitacitto puggalo duttaraṃ oghaṃ saṃsāroghaṃ tarati.
tika-s0501t0:1393_0: Kāmasaññāya virato vigatacitto yo khīṇāsavo sabbasaṃyojanātīto arahattamaggena sabbe saṃyojane atīto nandibhavaparikkhīṇo ahosi,
tika-s0501t0:1393_1: so khīṇāsavo gambhīre saṃsāraṇṇave na sīdatīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1393_2: Nandisaṅkhātā taṇhā ca kāmabhavarūpabhavaarūpabhavā ca nandibhavā,
tika-s0501t0:1393_3: nandibhavā parikkhīṇā yassa khīṇāsavassāti nandibhavaparikkhīṇoti samāso veditabbo.
tika-s0501t0:1394_0: Arahataṃ arahantānaṃ buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakānaṃ dhammaṃ sucaritādibhedañca sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyabhedañca
tika-s0501t0:1394_1: dhammaṃ yo paṇḍito saddahāno saddahanto hutvā nibbānappattiyā appamatto vicakkhaṇo hutvā sussūsaṃ sussūsanto bhave,
tika-s0501t0:1394_2: so paṇḍito paññaṃ lokiyalokuttarapaññaṃ labhate labhati.
tika-s0501t0:1395_0: Yo vīriyavā puggalo patirūpadesakārī desakālādīni ahāpetvā lokiyalokuttaradhammapatirūpaṃ adhigamūpāyaṃ karoti,
tika-s0501t0:1395_1: dhuravā cetasikavīriyena anikkhittadhuro uṭṭhātā kāyikavīriyavasena uṭṭhānasampanno hoti,
tika-s0501t0:1395_2: so vīriyavā puggalo dhanaṃ lokiyalokuttaradhanaṃ vindate adhigacchati.
tika-s0501t0:1395_3: Saccena vacīsaccena ca paramatthasaccena ca buddhādiko saccadhamme ṭhito sappuriso kittiṃ pappoti.
tika-s0501t0:1395_4: Dadaṃ dadanto yaṃ kiñci icchitaṃ patthitaṃ catusaṅgahavatthuṃ dadanto saṅgahanto sappuriso mittāni ekantamittāni ganthati sampādeti,
tika-s0501t0:1395_5: evaṃ catūhi saccadhammadhiticāgehi samannāgato so sappuriso asmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ pecca gantvā ekantena sokakāraṇassa abhāvato na socatīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1396_1: sabbaganthappahīno tīhi bhavehi vippamutto sato satisampanno tvaṃ, samaṇo,
tika-s0501t0:1396_2: aññaṃ devamanussādikaṃ yaṃ anusāsasi yaṃ anusāsanaṃ karosi,
tika-s0501t0:1396_3: taṃ anusāsanaṃ sabbaganthappahīnassa tīhi bhavehi vippamuttassa samaṇassa te tava na sādhūti sakkanāmako mārapakkhiko yakkho gāthāya ajjhabhāsi.
tika-s0501t0:1397_0: “Sakka sakkanāmaka yakkha anukampitena purisena saddhiṃ yena kenaci vaṇṇena kāraṇena saṃvāso ekasmiṃ ṭhāne sahavāso jāyati,
tika-s0501t0:1397_1: taṃ anukampitabbaṃ sahavāsagataṃ purisaṃ sappañño manasā anukampituṃ na arahati anukampituṃyeva arahati.
tika-s0501t0:1397_6: tāya anuddayāya mettāya muditāya ca samussāhitena pasannena manasā yo sappañño sappuriso aññaṃ devamanussādikaṃ yaṃ anusāsati yaṃ anusāsanaṃ karoti,
tika-s0501t0:1397_7: so sappañño sappuriso tena anusāsanena saṃyutto kāmacchandādīnaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ vasena ananulomasaṃyogena saṃyutto na hotīti bhagavā avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1398_1: rāgo ca doso ca ime dve dhammā kutonidānā,
tika-s0501t0:1398_4: arati ca rati ca lomahaṃso ca ime tayo kutojā kuto bhavanti?
tika-s0501t0:1398_5: Kumārakā dhaṅkaṃ kākaṃ gahetvā pāde dīghasuttakena bandhitvā suttakoṭiṃ aṅguliyaṃ veṭhetvā osajanti iva,
tika-s0501t0:1398_6: evaṃ manovitakkā kuto samuṭṭhāya cittaṃ osajantīti sūcilomayakkho bhagavantaṃ pucchi.
tika-s0501t0:1399_0: Rāgo ca doso ca ime dve dhammā itonidānā ito attabhāvato nidānā jāyanti;
tika-s0501t0:1399_1: arati ca rati ca lomahaṃso ca ime tayo itojā ito attato bhavanti;
tika-s0501t0:1399_2: kumārakā dhaṅkaṃ kākaṃ gahetvā pāde dīghasuttakena bandhitvā suttakoṭiṃ aṅguliyaṃ veṭhetvā osajanti iva,
tika-s0501t0:1399_3: evaṃ manovitakkā ito attabhāvato samuṭṭhāya cittaṃ osajanti.
tika-s0501t0:1400_0: Nigrodhassa khandhajā pārohā sākhāsu jāyanti iva,
tika-s0501t0:1400_1: vane rukkhaṃ nissāya jātā māluvā latā taṃ rukkhaṃ ajjhottharitvā vitatā otatavitatā tiṭṭhati iva, evaṃ, yakkha,
tika-s0501t0:1400_2: tvaṃ suṇohi snehajā taṇhāsnehato jātā attasambhūtā attani sambhūtā puna anekappakārā manovitakkā pāpamanovitakkā
tika-s0501t0:1400_3: ceva taṃsampayuttakilesā ca kāmesu vatthukāmesu visattā laggā saṃsibbitā ṭhitā.
tika-s0501t0:1401_0: Ye paṇḍitā “yaṃ nidānaṃ assa attabhāvassā”ti yatonidānaṃ naṃ kilesagahanaṃ samudayasaccaṃ pajānanti,
tika-s0501t0:1401_1: te paṇḍitā attabhāvasaṅkhātassa dukkhasaccassa nidānabhūtaṃ naṃ kilesagahanaṃ samudayasaccaṃ maggasaccena vinodenti.
tika-s0501t0:1401_2: Apunabbhavāya apunabhavasaṅkhātāya nirodhasaccatthāya atiṇṇapubbaṃ anamatagge saṃsāre supinenāpi atiṇṇapubbaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1401_3: duttaraṃ imaṃ oghaṃ catubbidhaṃ saṃkilesoghaṃ tarantīti bhagavā avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1402_2: samaṇadhammassa karaṇaṃ nāma sudukkaraṃ suṭṭhutaraṃ dukkara”nti eko kulaputto pabbajitvā samaṇadhammaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1402_3: katvā ariyabhūmiṃ appatvā kālaṃ katvā devaloke nibbatto,
tika-s0501t0:1402_4: so devaputto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā āha. Kāmada,
tika-s0501t0:1402_5: sīlasamāhitā ṭhitattā ṭhitasabhāvā satta sekkhā puggalā dukkaraṃ vāpi samaṇadhammaṃ karonti.
tika-s0501t0:1402_6: Anagāriyupetassa anagāriyaṃ niggehabhāvaṃ upagatassa pabbajitassa tuṭṭhi catupaccayasantoso sukhāvahā hotī”ti bhagavā avoca.
tika-s0501t0:1403_2: esā tuṭṭhi dullabhā”ti so devaputto āha. “Kāmada,
tika-s0501t0:1403_3: yesaṃ sekkhānaṃ mano divā ca ratto ca bhāvanāya rato cittavūpasame rato,
tika-s0501t0:1403_4: te sekkhā dullabhaṃ vāpi tussanaṃ labhantī”ti bhagavā avoca.
tika-s0501t0:1404_1: yadidaṃ yaṃ idaṃ cittaṃ bhāvanāya rataṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1404_2: taṃ cittaṃ dussamādaha”nti so devaputto āha. “Kāmada,
tika-s0501t0:1404_4: te ariyā dussamādahaṃ vāpi cittaṃ samādahanti, kāmada,
tika-s0501t0:1404_5: te ariyā maccuno jālaṃ kilesajālaṃ chetvā maggaṃ gacchantī”ti bhagavā avoca.
tika-s0501t0:1405_2: so maggo duggamo”ti so devaputto āha. “Kāmada,
tika-s0501t0:1405_3: ariyā duggame visame vāpi maggaṃ gacchanti,
tika-s0501t0:1405_5: ariyānaṃ so maggo samova bhave, na asamo.
tika-s0501t0:1405_6: Hi saccaṃ visame visattakāye ariyā samā bhavantī”ti bhagavā avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1406_2: idaṃ taṃ jetavanaṃ mama pītisañjananaṃ pītiyā sañjananaṃ karaṃ hi karaṃ eva.
tika-s0501t0:1407_0: Kammaṃ maggacetanākammañca vijjā maggapaññā ca dhammo samādhi ceva samādhipakkhiko ca dhammo sīlaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1407_3: gottena vā dhanena vā sattā na sujjhanti.
tika-s0501t0:1408_0: Tasmā maggeneva sattānaṃ visujjhanato attano atthaṃ sampassaṃ passanto paṇḍito poso yoniso upāyena dhammaṃ bodhipakkhiyadhammaṃ vicine vicineyya,
tika-s0501t0:1408_1: evaṃ vicinane sati tattha ariyamagge vicinanto puggalo sujjhati.
tika-s0501t0:1409_0: Sāriputto sīlena ca upasamena ca pāraṅgato iva,
tika-s0501t0:1409_1: evaṃ yopi bhikkhu sīlena ca upasamena ca pāraṅgato,
tika-s0501t0:1409_2: so bhikkhu etāva paramo sāriputtasadisova siyāti anāthapiṇḍikanāmo devaputto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā āhāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1410_1: anāgataṃ anāgatakkhandhapañcakaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhīhi nappaṭikaṅkhe na pattheyya.
tika-s0501t0:1410_2: Yaṃ yasmā atītaṃ pahīnaṃ niruddhaṃ atthaṅgataṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1410_3: tasmā atītassa pahīnattā niruddhattā atthaṅgatattā nānvāgameyya.
tika-s0501t0:1411_0: Paccuppannaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ vayadhammaṃ yattha yattha santāne vā,
tika-s0501t0:1411_3: tattha tattha araññādīsu vā naṃ paccuppannadhammaṃ yāhi aniccānupassanādīhi vipassati,
tika-s0501t0:1411_4: tāhi aniccānupassanādīhi nibbānaṃ rāgādīhi asaṃhīraṃ asaṃkuppaṃ bhavati,
tika-s0501t0:1411_5: taṃ nibbānaṃ vipassako puggalo vidvā nibbānārammaṇaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ appento hutvā anubrūhaye vaḍḍheyya.
tika-s0501t0:1412_0: Ātappaṃ saṃkilesānaṃ ātapantaṃ vīriyaṃ ajjeva kiccaṃ kātabbaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1412_1: suve jīvitaṃ vā maraṇaṃ vā ko jaññā jāneyya,
tika-s0501t0:1412_2: “suve vā dānādipuññaṃ jānissāmī”ti cittaṃ anuppādetvā “ajjeva karissāmī”ti evaṃ vīriyaṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1412_3: Hi saccaṃ maraṇakāraṇabhāvatāya ahivicchikavisasatthādianekāya senāya vasena mahāsenena tena maccunā
tika-s0501t0:1412_4: saddhiṃ mittasanthavākārena vā lañjadānena vā saṅgaraṃ natthīti.
tika-s0501t0:1413_0: Evaṃ manasi katvā vihāriṃ viharantaṃ ātāpiṃ ahorattaṃ atanditaṃ analasaṃ uṭṭhāhakaṃ sappurisaṃ “bhaddekaratto”ti
tika-s0501t0:1413_1: santo muni ve ekantena ācikkhate ācikkhatiyevāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1414_0: “Cattārimāni bhikkhave”tyādisuttaṃ pāḷito ca aṭṭhakathāto ca pākaṭaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1415_3: “katamaṃ asekkhabhāgiyaṃ sutta”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ asekkhabhāgiyaṃ sutta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1415_4: Tatthāti tesu soḷasasu saṃkilesabhāgiyādīsu suttesu katamaṃ suttaṃ asekkhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāmāti pucchati.
tika-s0501t0:1416_0: Yassa uttamapurisassa cittaṃ selūpamaṃ ṭhitaṃ lokadhammavātehi nānukampati,
tika-s0501t0:1416_2: so uttamapuriso kopaneyye alābhādike na kuppati,
tika-s0501t0:1416_3: tassa uttamapurisassa cittaṃ evaṃ aniccatādinā bhāvitaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1416_4: naṃ bhāvitacittaṃ uttamapurisaṃ vītikkantalokadhammahetukaṃ dukkhaṃ kuto essatīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1416_5: Idaṃ suttaṃ asekkhabhāge visaye vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato asekkhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1418_4: yo brāhmaṇo catumaggañāṇavedehi antaṃ nibbānaṃ gatattā vedantagū bhave,
tika-s0501t0:1418_6: Yassa brāhmaṇassa kuhiñci loke ussadā rāgussado dosussado mohussado mānussado diṭṭhussado natthi,
tika-s0501t0:1418_7: so brāhmaṇo brahmavādaṃ “ahaṃ brāhmaṇomhī”ti vācaṃ vadeyyāti bhagavā avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1419_0: Ye buddhā pāpake akusale dhamme bāhitvā sadā caranti satā satisampannā khīṇasaṃyojanā,
tika-s0501t0:1419_1: te buddhā lokasmiṃ brāhmaṇāti ve ekantena kathīyantīti avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1420_0: Yattha nibbāne āpo ca pathavī ca tejo ca vāyo ca na gādhati na patiṭṭhahati,
tika-s0501t0:1420_1: tattha nibbāne sukkā gahā ceva tārakā ca na jotanti,
tika-s0501t0:1421_0: Yo brāhmaṇo attanā sayaṃ muni monena yadā taṃ nibbānaṃ avedi vindati paṭilabhati paṭivijjhati,
tika-s0501t0:1421_1: atha paṭivijjhanakkhaṇe so brāhmaṇo rūpā rūpadhammato ca arūpā arūpadhammato ca sukhadukkhā sukhadukkhato ca pamuccatīti avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1422_1: yo brāhmaṇo sakesu sakaattabhāvesu dhammesu upādānakkhandhesu saccesu,
tika-s0501t0:1422_3: atha pāragamanakkhaṇe so brāhmaṇo etaṃ ajakalāpakaṃ tayā vuttaṃ etaṃ pisācaṃ kilesapisācañca,
tika-s0501t0:1423_0: Yo bhikkhu āyantiṃ āgacchantiṃ purāṇadutiyikaṃ bhariyaṃ vā,
tika-s0501t0:1423_1: aññaṃ āgacchantiṃ itthiṃ vā cittena na abhinandati,
tika-s0501t0:1423_3: aññaṃ pakkamantiṃ itthiṃ vā cittena na socati,
tika-s0501t0:1423_4: saṅgā pañcavidhatopi saṅgato muttaṃ saṅgāmajiṃ taṃ bhikkhuṃ “brāhmaṇa”nti ahaṃ vadāmīti avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1424_1: so bahujano nhāyako udakena udakanhānena sucī na hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1424_5: so puggalo brāhmaṇo ca hotīti avocāti yojanā;
tika-s0501t0:1425_0: Ātāpino jhāyato yassa brāhmaṇassa dhammā saccadhammā yadā have ekantena pātubhavanti,
tika-s0501t0:1425_1: tadā dhammānaṃ pātubhavanakkhaṇe so brāhmaṇo mārasenaṃ vidhūpayaṃ vidhūpayanto tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0501t0:1426_0: Yo paṃsukūliko bhikkhu sabbāni cattāri yogāni upātivatto sakiñcane loke akiñcano iriyati catubbidhairiyāpathaṃ vatteti.
tika-s0501t0:1426_1: Apahānadhammaṃ kenaci maggena appahānasabhāvaṃ appattakāyena appattaṃ tevijjapattaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1426_2: iriyamānaṃ santindriyaṃ taṃ paṃsukūlikaṃ bhikkhuṃ tumhe passatha.
tika-s0501t0:1427_0: Ājāniyaṃ purisaājānīyaṃ jātibalanisedhaṃ “ahaṃ jātibrāhmaṇo”ti jātimattakena pavattamānabalanisedhakaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1427_1: taṃ paṃsukūlikaṃ bhikkhuṃ sambahulā uḷārā devatā brahmaṃ vimānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā idha sāsane,
tika-s0501t0:1428_0: Purisājañña te tava amhākaṃ namo atthu,
tika-s0501t0:1428_1: purisuttama te tava amhākaṃ namo atthu,
tika-s0501t0:1428_2: yassa te tava nissayaṃ mayaṃ nābhijānāma,
tika-s0501t0:1428_3: so tvaṃ kiṃ puggalaṃ nissāya jhāyasīti avocunti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1429_0: Ye bhikkhū kālena kālaṃ dhammassavanavasena cirarattaṃ sametikā bhavanti,
tika-s0501t0:1429_2: Nesaṃ sahāyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhamme buddhappavedite dhamme saddhammo sameti.
tika-s0501t0:1430_0: Kappinena ariyappavedite dhamme suvinītā te sahāyakā bhikkhū savāhiniṃ māraṃ jetvā antimaṃ dehaṃ attabhāvaṃ dhārentīti avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1431_0: Sithilaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabbha sabbadukkhappamocanaṃ idaṃ nibbānaṃ yogāvacarena na adhigantabbaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1431_1: appena appakena thāmasā idaṃ nibbānaṃ na adhigantabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1432_1: yo puriso savāhiniṃ māraṃ jetvā antimaṃ dehaṃ attabhāvaṃ dhāreti,
tika-s0501t0:1432_2: so ayaṃ puriso so uttamapurisovāti avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1433_1: dubbaṇṇako lūkhacīvaro sadā sato satisampanno khīṇāsavo ca visaṃyutto ca katakicco ca anāsavo ca tevijjo
tika-s0501t0:1433_2: ca iddhippatto ca cetopariyāyakovido ca so bhikkhu savāhiniṃ māraṃ jetvā antimaṃ dehaṃ dhāretīti avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1434_2: Idaṃ suttaṃ asekkhabhāge visaye vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato asekkhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1435_3: “katamaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca vāsanābhāgiyañca sutta”nti vattabbattā “tattha katamaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca vāsanābhāgiyañca sutta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1435_4: Tatthāti tesu soḷasasu saṃkilesabhāgiyādīsu suttesu katamaṃ suttaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca vāsanābhāgiyañca suttaṃ nāmāti pucchati.
tika-s0501t0:1436_0: Channaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā channaṃ chādentaṃ bhikkhuṃ dukkaṭādivasso ativassati,
tika-s0501t0:1436_1: vivaṭaṃ āpattiṃ āpajjitvā vivaṭaṃ desentaṃ ācikkhantaṃ bhikkhuṃ dukkaṭādivasso nātivassati,
tika-s0501t0:1436_2: tasmā channassa ativassanato ca vivaṭassa nātivassanato ca channaṃ chāditabbaṃ āpattiṃ vivaretha desetha ārocetha,
tika-s0501t0:1436_3: evaṃ vivaraṇe sati taṃ vivarantaṃ bhikkhuṃ dukkaṭādivasso nātivassatīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1437_4: evaṃ taṃ nātivassatī’ti ayaṃ saṃkileso ca vāsanā cā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1437_8: evaṃ taṃ nātivassatī”ti ettakena ayaṃ saṃkileso ca dassito,
tika-s0501t0:1437_11: vassatī”ti suttaṃ saṃkilesabhāge visaye ca vāsanābhāge visaye ca vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato saṃkilesabhāgiyañca vāsanābhāgiyañca suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1438_0: “Saṃkilesabhāgiyañca vāsanābhāgiyañca suttaṃ ettakamevā”ti vattabbattā “cattārome mahārājā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1438_2: katame puggalā vāsanābhāgiyā”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha yo ca puggalo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1438_5: Idaṃ “cattārome”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyesu dvīsu puggalesu ca vāsanābhāgiyesu dvīsu puggalesu
tika-s0501t0:1438_6: ca vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato saṃkilesabhāgiyañca vāsanābhāgiyañca suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1439_0: Nānāvidhaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca vāsanābhāgiyañca suttaṃ ācariyena niddhāritaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1439_2: “katamaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañca suttaṃ nāmā”ti pucchitabbattā tattha katamaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca
tika-s0501t0:1440_0: Ayasaṃ yaṃ bandhanañca dārujaṃ yaṃ bandhanañca pabbajaṃ yaṃ bandhanañca loke atthi,
tika-s0501t0:1440_1: taṃ ayasādibandhanaṃ “daḷhaṃ bandhana”nti dhīrā buddhādayo paṇḍitapurisā na āhu.
tika-s0501t0:1440_2: Maṇikuṇḍalesu ca puttesu ca dāresu ca yā sārattarattā balavarāgarattā apekkhā loke vijjati,
tika-s0501t0:1440_3: taṃ sārattarattaapekkhāsaṅkhātaṃ rāgabandhanaṃ “daḷhaṃ bandhana”nti dhīrā paṇḍitapurisā āhu.
tika-s0501t0:1440_4: Iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ sārattarattaapekkhāsaṅkhāto akusaladhammo saṃkileso dassito.
tika-s0501t0:1441_1: Dhīrā paṇḍitapurisā etaṃ rāgabandhanaṃ “daḷhaṃ bandhana”nti āhu.
tika-s0501t0:1441_2: Etaṃ rāgabandhanaṃ ohārinaṃ heṭṭhā apāyaṃ avaharaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-s0501t0:1441_3: sithilaṃ bandhanaṭṭhāne chaviādīni akopetattā sithilaṃ hoti,
tika-s0501t0:1441_4: duppamuñcaṃ lobhavasena ekavārampi uppannassa rāgabandhanassa dummocayattā duppamuñcaṃ hoti,
tika-s0501t0:1441_5: paṇḍitapurisā etampi vuttappakāraṃ rāgabandhanampi maggena chetvāna anapekkhino hutvā kāmasukhaṃ pahāya paribbajanti.
tika-s0501t0:1441_6: Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ maggo nibbedho dassito.
tika-s0501t0:1441_7: Idaṃ “ayasa”ntiādikaṃ suttaṃ rāgādisaṃkilesabhāge visaye ca vāsanābhāge visaye ca vācakañāpakabhāvena
tika-s0501t0:1442_5: etaṃ cetanaṃ etaṃ pakappanaṃ etaṃ anusayanaṃ viññāṇassa ṭhitiyā ārammaṇaṃ paccayo hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1442_6: Ārammaṇe paccaye sati tassa abhisaṅkhāra viññāṇassa patiṭṭhā hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1442_7: Tasmiṃ abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇe patiṭṭhite viruḷhe sati āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti viññāṇādinibbatti hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1442_8: Āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattiyā sati āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇaṃ sambhavati.
tika-s0501t0:1443_3: atha tathāpi ce anuseti anusayanaṃ bhavati,
tika-s0501t0:1443_4: evaṃ sati etaṃ anusayanaṃ viññāṇassa abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa ārammaṇaṃ paccayo hoti…pe…
tika-s0501t0:1443_6: Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ vuttappakāro cetayanādiko akusaladhammo saṃkileso dassito.
tika-s0501t0:1444_5: etaṃ acetayanaṃ etaṃ akappanaṃ etaṃ ananusayanaṃ viññāṇassa abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa ārammaṇaṃ paccayo na hoti…pe…
tika-s0501t0:1444_10: Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ ariyamaggo nibbedho dassito.
tika-s0501t0:1444_11: Idaṃ “yañca bhikkhave”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ saṃkilesabhāge visaye ca nibbedhabhāge visaye ca vācakañāpakabhāvena
tika-s0501t0:1445_1: Nānāvidhaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañca suttaṃ ācariyena niddhāritaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1445_3: “katamaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca asekkhabhāgiyañca sutta”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca asekkhabhāgiyañca sutta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1446_1: assutavā puthujjano samuddo jalasāgarasamuddo “samuddo samuddo”ti bhāsati.
tika-s0501t0:1446_3: Duppūraṇaṭṭhena ca saṃsaraṇaṭṭhena ca duratikkamanaṭṭhena ca samuddoti bhāsati.
tika-s0501t0:1446_6: eso jalasāgarasamuddo ariyassa bhagavato vinaye vuttappakāraṭṭhena samuddo na hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1446_8: eso jalasāgarasamuddo mahā udakarāsi mahā udakaṇṇavo hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1446_13: Pathavito yāva akaniṭṭhabrahmalokā nīlādirūpārammaṇaṃ samosarantampi duppūraṇaṭṭhena ca anamatagge saṃsāre
tika-s0501t0:1446_14: saṃsaraṇaṭṭhena ca duratikkamanaṭṭhena ca cakkhumeva samuddo hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1446_15: Nīlādirūpāyatanassa appameyyassa appameyyena ūmimayena vegena saṃsaraṇaṭṭhena nīlādirūpameva vego hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1446_16: Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ cakkhu samuddo rūpamayo vego ca saṃkileso saṃkilesahetu dassito.
tika-s0501t0:1447_1: Yasmiṃ arahattaphale ṭhito yo arahā rūpamayaṃ taṃ vegaṃ sahati manāpe rūpe rāgaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1447_3: asamapekkhane mohaṃ anuppādento hutvā upekkhakabhāvena sahati,
tika-s0501t0:1447_6: saūmiṃ sāvaṭṭaṃ sagahaṃ sarakkhasaṃ cakkhusamuddaṃ atarīti vuccati,
tika-s0501t0:1447_7: tiṇṇo pāraṅgato thale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇoti vuccati.
tika-s0501t0:1447_8: Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ arahattaphalabhūto asekkho dassito.
tika-s0501t0:1448_0: “Sotaṃ bhikkhave”tiādīsupi iminā nayena yathāsambhavaṃ attho veditabbo.
tika-s0501t0:1448_1: Idaṃ “samuddo”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ saṃkilesabhāge visaye ca asekkhabhāge visaye ca vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato
tika-s0501t0:1449_2: lokasmiṃ sattānaṃ anayāya anatthāya pāṇīnaṃ byābādhāya ime mayā vuccamānā baḷisā cha bhavanti.
tika-s0501t0:1449_5: cakkhuviññeyyā cakkhuviññāṇena viññeyyā iṭṭhā kantā kāmanīyā manāpā manavaḍḍhakā piyarūpā piyasabhāvā
tika-s0501t0:1449_6: kāmūpasaṃhitā kilesakāmasahitā rajanīyā rūpā nīlādirūpārammaṇā santi,
tika-s0501t0:1449_7: taṃ vuttappakāraṃ rūpaṃ bhikkhu ce abhinandati sappītikataṇhāya abhimukho nandati,
tika-s0501t0:1449_8: ce abhivadati “aho sukhaṃ aho sukha”nti vadāpentiyā taṇhāyanavasena abhivadati,
tika-s0501t0:1449_9: ce ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati gilitvā viya pariniṭṭhapetvā tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0501t0:1449_15: rajanīyā”ti bahuvacananiddeso katopi rūpāyatanarūpārammaṇabhāvena ca cakkhuviññeyyabhāvena ca ekavidhataṃ
tika-s0501t0:1449_18: sotaviññeyyā”tiādīsupi iminā nayena yathāsambhavaṃ attho veditabbo.
tika-s0501t0:1449_19: Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ cakkhuviññeyyādiko chabbidho baḷiso saṃkileso kilesahetu dassito.
tika-s0501t0:1451_2: Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ arahattaphalabhūto asekkho dassito.
tika-s0501t0:1451_3: Idaṃ “chayime”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ vuttanayena saṃkilesabhāgiyañca asekkhabhāgiyañca suttaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1452_1: Nānāvidhaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca asekkhabhāgiyañca suttaṃ ācariyena niddhāritaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1452_3: “katamaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañca asekkhabhāgiyañca sutta”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1453_0: Ayaṃ loko sattaloko santāpajāto ñātibyasanādivasena jātasokasantāpo ceva rāgādivasena jātapariḷāhasantāpo
tika-s0501t0:1453_1: ca phassapareto anekehi dukkhasamphassehi abhibhūto rodaṃ rodanto vadati.
tika-s0501t0:1453_3: Attanā phuṭṭhaṃ dukkhaṃ abhāvitakāyatāya adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto hutvā “aho dukkhaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1453_4: īdisaṃ dukkhaṃ mayhaṃ sattunopi mā hotū”tiādinā rodanto vilapanto vadati,
tika-s0501t0:1453_5: “kasmā evaṃ vadatī”ti vattabbattā “attato yena yena hi maññantī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1453_6: Ete sattā yena yena kāmajjhosādinā pakārena attato dukkhassa paṭikāraṃ maññanti,
tika-s0501t0:1453_7: tato pakārato aññathā aññena pakārena taṃ dukkhaṃ tikicchitabbaṃ hi yasmā hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1454_1: yena yena vā paravihiṃsādipakārena attano vaḍḍhiṃ maññanti āsīsanti,
tika-s0501t0:1454_2: tato pakārato aññathā avaḍḍhi eva hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1454_3: Taṃ āsīsitabbaṃ aññathābhāvi avaḍḍhitabhāvi eva hi yasmā hoti,
tika-s0501t0:1454_4: tasmā maññitabbassa āsīsitabbassa aññathā bhavanasīlattā rodaṃ rodanto vadati,
tika-s0501t0:1454_5: ayaṃ sattaloko rodanto ca hutvā vadati.
tika-s0501t0:1454_7: Bhavasatto kāmabhavādīsu satto visatto loko bhavameva kāmabhavādibhavameva abhinandati.
tika-s0501t0:1454_11: taṃ jarāmaraṇādidukkhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato dukkhaṃ dukkhādhiṭṭhānaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1454_12: Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ santāpādiko saṃkileso saṃkilesahetu dassito.
tika-s0501t0:1455_2: Bhavavippahānāya kho pana kāmabhavādikassa bhavassa pajahanatthāya eva idaṃ mayā adhigataṃ maggabrahmacariyaṃ vussati.
tika-s0501t0:1455_3: Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ brahmacariyabhūto maggo nibbedho dassito.
tika-s0501t0:1456_2: “katamo aniyyānikamaggo”ti pucchitabbattā “ye hi keci samaṇā vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Hi-
tika-s0501t0:1456_4: Ye keci samaṇā vā ye keci brāhmaṇā vā bhavena rūpabhavena bhavassa kāmabhavassa vippamokkhaṃ āhaṃsu,
tika-s0501t0:1456_5: bhavena arūpabhavena bhavassa kāmabhavassa ceva rūpabhavassa ca vippamokkhaṃ āhaṃsu,
tika-s0501t0:1456_6: sabbe te samaṇā vā sabbe te brāhmaṇā vā bhavasmā vuttappakārabhavato avippamuttā bhavantīti ahaṃ vadāmi.
tika-s0501t0:1457_0: “Rūpabhavādinā ye ca kāmabhavādibhavassa vippamokkhaṃ āhaṃsū”ti vattabbattā vibhavena bhavassa nissaraṇaṃ āhaṃsūti dassetuṃ “ye vā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1457_1: Ye vā pana keci samaṇā vā ye vā pana keci brāhmaṇā vā vibhavena ucchedadiṭṭhiyā bhavassa saṃsārabhavassa nissaraṇaṃ āhaṃsu,
tika-s0501t0:1457_2: sabbe te samaṇā vā sabbe te brāhmaṇā vā bhavasmā saṃsārabhavato anissaṭāva hontīti ahaṃ vadāmi.
tika-s0501t0:1457_3: “Kasmā anissaṭā”ti vattabbattā anissaṭakāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “upadhiṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1457_4: Idaṃ dukkhaṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ upadhiṃ khandhūpadhikilesūpadhiabhisaṅkhārūpadhayo paṭicca hi yasmā sambhoti,
tika-s0501t0:1457_6: Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ micchādiṭṭhisaṅkhāto saṃkileso dassito.
tika-s0501t0:1458_2: Sabbupādānakkhayā ariyamaggato dukkhassa saṃsāradukkhassa sambhavo natthi.
tika-s0501t0:1458_3: Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ ariyamaggo nibbedho dassito.
tika-s0501t0:1459_1: Puthū visuṃ visuṃ avijjāya paretaṃ abhibhūtaṃ bhūtarataṃ bhūtesu itthipurisesu aññamaññarataṃ bhūtaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1459_2: khandhapañcakaṃ bhavehi aparimuttaṃ imaṃ lokaṃ mama citta tvaṃ passa.
tika-s0501t0:1459_3: Ye keci bhavā ittarakhaṇā vā bhavā,
tika-s0501t0:1459_6: asātavanto vā bhavā pañcakkhandhā sabbadhi “uddhaṃ adho tiriya”nti imesu sabbesu sabbatthatāya sabbatthabhāvena ahesuṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1459_7: sabbe te vuttappakārā bhavā niccadhuvarahitattā aniccā sampīḷitattā dukkhā vipariṇāmabhāvato vipariṇāmadhammā ahesuṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1459_8: Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ avijjādiko saṃkileso dassito.
tika-s0501t0:1460_2: Evaṃ vuttappakārena etaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya sassa attano maggapaññāya,
tika-s0501t0:1460_3: vipassanāpaññāya vā passato passantassa puggalassa bhavataṇhā pahīyati,
tika-s0501t0:1460_4: sammappaññāya yathābhūtaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ passanto vibhavaṃ ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ nābhinandati na pattheti.
tika-s0501t0:1460_5: Tassa puggalassa sabbaso taṇhānaṃ khayā asesavirāganirodho asesavirāgasaṅkhātena maggena nirodho nirujjhanaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbuti hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1460_6: Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ maggo nibbedho dassito.
tika-s0501t0:1461_2: Taṇhādiṭṭhinibbutassa tassa bhikkhuno anupādā kilesābhisaṅkhārānaṃ anuppādanato aggahaṇato punabbhavo na hoti,
tika-s0501t0:1461_3: evaṃbhūtena ariyapuggalena pubbe attānaṃ abhibhūto pañcavidho māro vijito ahosi,
tika-s0501t0:1461_4: anena ariyapuggalena pañcahi mārehi saṅgāmo vijito, saṅgāme,
tika-s0501t0:1461_5: iṭṭhāniṭṭhādīsu vā tādī tādilakkhaṇappatto ariyapuggalo sabbabhavāni upaccagā atikkantova jāto.
tika-s0501t0:1461_6: Iti iminā suttappadesena ayaṃ asekkho dassito.
tika-s0501t0:1461_7: Idaṃ vuttappakāraṃ “ayaṃ loko”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ saṃkilesabhāge visaye ca nibbedhabhāge visaye ca asekkhabhāge
tika-s0501t0:1461_8: visaye ca vācakañāpakabhāvena ekadesavasena pavattanato saṃkilesabhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañca asekkhabhāgiyañca
tika-s0501t0:1462_1: Andhaputhujjano saṃsārasotassa anukūlabhāvena gacchanato anusotagāmī nāma,
tika-s0501t0:1462_2: kalyāṇaputhujjano saṃsārasotassa nibbidānupassanādīhi paṭikkūlavasena pavattanato paṭisotagāmī nāma,
tika-s0501t0:1463_0: “Tesu catūsu puggalesu katamo puggalo saṃkilesabhāgiyādī”ti vattabbabhāvato “tattha yoya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1464_1: Nānāvidhaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañca asekkhabhāgiyañca suttaṃ ācariyena niddhāritaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1464_3: “katamaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca vāsanābhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañca sutta”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha katama”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1465_2: kaṇhadhammasamannāgatattā vā kaṇho kaṇhābhijātiko hutvā kaṇhaṃ kāḷakaṃ dasavidhaṃ dussīlyadhammaṃ abhijāyati pasavati,
tika-s0501t0:1465_4: Vuttappakārena kaṇho kaṇhābhijātiko hutvā sukkaṃ dasavidhaṃ kusaladhammaṃ abhijāyati,
tika-s0501t0:1465_6: Kaṇho kaṇhābhijātiko hutvā akaṇhaṃ asukkaṃ akaṇhaasukkavipākaṃ accantadiṭṭhaṃ nibbānaṃ ārādheti,
tika-s0501t0:1466_0: “Tesu katame puggalā saṃkilesabhāgiyā”tiādinā vattabbattā “tattha yo cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1468_1: Nānāvidhaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyañca vāsanābhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañca suttaṃ ācariyena niddhāritaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1468_3: “katamaṃ vāsanābhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañca sutta”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ vāsanābhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1469_4: “Katamaṃ kattabbaṃ kicca”nti vattabbattā kattabbakiccaṃ dassetuṃ “sukiccaṃ cevā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1469_6: saṃyojanavippahānaṃ vā kattabbattā sukiccaṃ nāmāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1470_0: “Tattha sutte katamena katamo dassito”ti vattabbattā “sukiccaṃceva puññānīti vāsanā,
tika-s0501t0:1471_1: Puññāni karitvāna katapuññā puggalā saggā saggato saggaṃyeva vajanti.
tika-s0501t0:1472_0: “Tattha sutte katamena katamo dassito”ti vattabbattā “puññāni karitvāna,
tika-s0501t0:1474_0: Nānāvidhaṃ vāsanābhāgiyañca nibbedhabhāgiyañca suttaṃ ācariyena niddhāritaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1474_3: Tatthāti tesu soḷasasu saṃkilesabhāgiyādīsu suttesu taṇhāsaṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ taṇhāpakkheneva niddisitabbaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1474_8: Yena yena vā pana vatthunā taṇhāpabhedaucchedādivatthunā ajjhositā bhavataṇhādivasena ajjhositā,
tika-s0501t0:1474_9: tena tena pakārena taṇhādinā vā taṇhāpabhedaucchedādivatthunā vā taṇhāsaṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ niddisitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1475_0: Taṇhāsaṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ taṇhāpakkheneva niddisitabbanti ācariyena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1475_2: “diṭṭhisaṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ kena pakkhena niddisitabba”nti vattabbattā “tattha diṭṭhisaṃkilesabhāgiya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1475_3: Yena yena vā pana vatthunāti diṭṭhippabhedaamarāvikkhepādivatthunā.
tika-s0501t0:1476_0: Diṭṭhisaṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ diṭṭhipakkheneva niddisitabbanti ācariyena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1476_2: “duccaritasaṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ kena pakārena niddisitabba”nti vattabbattā “tattha duccaritasaṃkilesabhāgiya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1477_2: taṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ soḷasahi saṃkilesabhāgiyādīhi suttehi ekadesaniddhāraṇavasena vibhajitaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1477_4: “kiṃ pana taṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ tehi soḷasahi eva saṃkilesabhāgiyādīhi vibhajitabbaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1477_5: udāhu aññehi suttehipi vibhajitabba”nti vattabbattā aññehi aṭṭhavīsasuttehipi vibhajituṃ “tattha katame aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā?
tika-s0501t0:1477_9: kasmā ‘tattha katame aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā’ti vuttā”ti ce?
tika-s0501t0:1477_13: Tāni mūlapadāni vibhajituṃ “tattha katame aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1478_0: “Evaṃ soḷasavidhena sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ nānāsuttehi udāharaṇavasena vibhajitvā idāni aṭṭhavīsatividhena sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1478_1: dassentena yasmā ayampi paṭṭhānavibhāgo mūlapadehi saṅgahito,
tika-s0501t0:1478_2: na imassāpi tehi asaṅgahito padeso atthi,
tika-s0501t0:1478_4: vibhajitabbatañca dassetuṃ ‘tattha katame aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā’ti pucchāya vasena mūlapadāni uddharitvā ‘lokiyaṃ lokuttara’ntiādinā nava tikā,
tika-s0501t0:1479_1: Tatthāti tesu soḷasahārapañcakanayaaṭṭhārasamūlapadesu katamāni padāni mūlapadāni hontīti pucchati.
tika-s0501t0:1479_3: loke vā vidūhi vidito sabhāvotipi lokiyo,
tika-s0501t0:1479_4: lokiyo sabhāvadhammo assa visesasuttassa atthīti taṃ visesasuttaṃ lokiyaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1479_15: Bhāvanā assa visesasuttassa pāḷiyā atthīti bhāvanā.
tika-s0501t0:1479_16: “Dassanañca bhāvanā cā”ti etthāpi esa nayo veditabbo.
tika-s0501t0:1479_28: Buddhādīnaṃ guṇe abhitthavati etena suttappadesenāti thavo,
tika-s0501t0:1480_0: “Tesu aṭṭhavīsatividhesu lokiyādīsu sāsanapaṭṭhānasuttesu katamaṃ suttaṃ lokiyaṃ sutta”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ lokiya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1480_1: Tatthāti tesu aṭṭhavīsatividhesu lokiyādīsu sāsanapaṭṭhānasuttesu katamaṃ suttaṃ lokiyaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ suttanti pucchati.
tika-s0501t0:1481_1: dhenuyā thanehi nikkhantaṃ sajjukhīraṃ nikkhantakkhaṇe na muccati na pariṇamati khīrabhāvaṃ pajahitvā dadhibhāvaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
tika-s0501t0:1481_2: takkādiambilasamāyogato pacchā khīrabhāvaṃ pajahati dadhibhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti iva,
tika-s0501t0:1481_3: evaṃ yena bālena pāpaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ kataṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1481_4: taṃ kammaṃ karaṇakkhaṇe tassa bālassa apāyadukkhādinibbattāpanavasena na vipaccati.
tika-s0501t0:1481_5: Dutiye pana vā tatiyādimhi vā attabhāve vipaccati.
tika-s0501t0:1481_6: Bhasmacchanno chārikāya paṭicchanno pāvako aggi akkantaṃ janaṃ akkamanakkhaṇe na ḍahati.
tika-s0501t0:1481_7: Chārikaṃ pana tāpetvā kālantare ḍahati iva,
tika-s0501t0:1481_8: evaṃ yena bālena pāpaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ kataṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1481_9: taṃ kammaṃ karaṇakkhaṇe taṃ bālaṃ apāyadukkhādinibbattāpanavasena ḍahāpentaṃ hutvā na anveti.
tika-s0501t0:1481_10: Dutiye vā tatiyādimhi vā attabhāve apāyadukkhādinibbattāpanavasena ḍahāpentaṃ hutvā ḍahantaṃ taṃ bālaṃ taṃ anvetīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1481_12: pāvako”ti suttaṃ lokiye atthe vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato lokiyaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1482_3: kāḷapakkheva candimā”ti suttaṃ lokiye atthe vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato lokiyaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1483_4: Idaṃ “aṭṭhime”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ lokiyesu aṭṭhavidhesu atthesu vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato lokiyaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1484_2: “katamaṃ suttaṃ lokuttara”nti vattabbattā “tattha katamaṃ lokuttara”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1485_0: Chekena sārathinā sudantā assā samathaṅgatā yathā,
tika-s0501t0:1485_1: evaṃ pahīnamānassa pahīnanavavidhamānassa yassa anāsavassa bhikkhuno indriyāni chabbidhāni cakkhundriyādīni samathaṅgatāni.
tika-s0501t0:1485_2: Tādino tādilakkhaṇena samannāgatassa anāsavassa tassa bhikkhuno devāpi manussāpi pihayantīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1485_3: Idaṃ “yassindriyānī”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ lokuttare atthe vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato lokuttaraṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1486_1: Idaṃ “pañcimānī”tiādikaṃ suttampi lokuttare atthe vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato lokuttaraṃ nāma. (1)
tika-s0501t0:1487_1: kiccaṃ akiccameva cā”tiādikā dve gāthā vuttā.
tika-s0501t0:1487_2: Iha gāthāsu “sukiccaṃ ceva puññānī”ti yaṃ gāthāpadañca “puññāni karitvāna,
tika-s0501t0:1487_3: saggā saggaṃ vajanti katapuññā”ti yaṃ gāthāpadañca vuttaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1487_4: idaṃ gāthāpadaṃ lokiye atthe vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato lokiyaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1489_1: viññāṇe āhāre āhārapaṭibaddhe chandarāge sati nāmarūpassa avakkanti hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1489_6: Idaṃ “viññāṇe ce bhikkhave”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ lokiye atthe ca lokuttare atthe ca ekadesavasena vācakañāpakavasena pavattanato lokiyañca lokuttarañca. (2)
tika-s0501t0:1490_1: Sattaloke sabbā disā anuparigamma kvaci disāyaṃ cetasā attanā attato piyataraṃ aññaṃ neva ajjhagā,
tika-s0501t0:1490_3: evaṃ paresaṃ sattānaṃ puthu visuṃ visuṃ attāva piyo piyataro,
tika-s0501t0:1490_4: tasmā attanova piyatarattā attakāmo attano hitakāmo paṇḍito sattaloko attānaṃ upamaṃ katvā paraṃ na hiṃse na hiṃseyyāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1490_5: Idaṃ “sabbā disā”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ sattesu vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato sattādhiṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1491_0: Ye keci khīṇāsavā puggalā bhūtāva na bhavissanti,
tika-s0501t0:1491_1: sabbe te khīṇāsavā puggalā dehaṃ attabhāvaṃ pahāya nibbānaṃ gamissanti.
tika-s0501t0:1491_2: Ye ca puthujjanādayo sattā punabbhavesu bhavissanti,
tika-s0501t0:1491_3: sabbe te puthujjanādayo sattā dehaṃ attabhāvaṃ pahāya paralokaṃ gamissanti,
tika-s0501t0:1491_4: taṃ sabbajāniṃ sabbassa sattassa hāniṃ maraṇaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1491_5: vināsaṃ vā kusalo yo puggalo vijānāti,
tika-s0501t0:1491_6: so kusalo puggalo taṃ sabbajāniṃ viditvā ātāpiyo brahmacariyaṃ careyyāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1492_0: Sattahi aṅgehi samannāgataṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ yāvajīvaṃ kusalena puggalena na vijahitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1492_2: Parisuddhasīlasampattiparisuddhadiṭṭhisampattīhi samannāgatattā piyo ca piyāyitabbo ca hoti,
tika-s0501t0:1492_6: no akālenā”tiādike pañcadhamme attani upaṭṭhāpetvā sabrahmacārīnaṃ vā sissānaṃ vā vinicchayaullumpanaovādadānabhāve ṭhatvā vattā ca hoti,
tika-s0501t0:1492_7: sabrahmacārīhi vā sissādīhi vā vuccamāno suvaco hutvā tesaṃ vacanakkhamo ca hoti,
tika-s0501t0:1492_8: saccapaṭiccasamuppādādigambhīraṃ vā aññaṃ gambhīraṃ vā kathaṃ kattā ca hoti,
tika-s0501t0:1492_9: dhammavinayādivaseneva dīpanato aṭṭhāne ca na niyojako hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1492_10: Imehi sattahi aṅgehi samannāgataṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ yāvajīvaṃ na vijahitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1492_12: Idaṃ “sattahī”tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ sugato vatvā athāparaṃ etaṃ gāthāvacanaṃ satthā avoca.
tika-s0501t0:1494_0: Gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattā, na caṭṭhāne niyojako;
tika-s0501t0:1497_0: Loke yaṃ kāmasukhañca yaṃ idaṃ diviyaṃ sukhañca atthi,
tika-s0501t0:1497_1: ete kāmasukhadiviyasukhā taṇhākkhayasukhassa soḷasiṃ kalaṃ na agghantīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1498_1: sammāsambuddhadesitaṃ asokaṃ virajaṃ khemaṃ taṃ nibbānaṃ susukhaṃ vatāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1499_0: Tīsu bhavesu sattānaṃ jananato taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ mātarañca,
tika-s0501t0:1499_1: pitaraṃ nissāya mānassa uppajjanato mānasaṅkhātaṃ pitarañca,
tika-s0501t0:1499_2: raṭṭhe loko raṭṭhissaraṃ rājānaṃ bhajati viya dvinnaṃ sassatucchedadiṭṭhīnaṃ sabbadiṭṭhigatehi bhajanīyattā
tika-s0501t0:1499_4: āyasādhako puriso raṭṭhe atthaṃ anucarati iva nandirāgassa dvādasāyatane anucaraṇato nandirāgasaṅkhātena
tika-s0501t0:1499_5: anucaraṇena saha pavattanaṭṭhānaṃ dvādasāyatanasaṅkhātaṃ raṭṭhañca khīṇāsavo yo brāhmaṇo hanati,
tika-s0501t0:1499_6: so brāhmaṇo hantvā anīgho niddukkho hutvā yātīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1500_1: So catūhi iddhipādehi samannāgato puggalo kāyepi karajakāyepi cittaṃ pādakajjhānacittaṃ samodahati pakkhipati,
tika-s0501t0:1500_2: so puggalo dissamānakāyena gantukāmo karajakāyagatikaṃ pādakajjhānacittaṃ adhiṭṭhahati.
tika-s0501t0:1500_3: Cittepi pādakajjhānacittepi kāyaṃ karajakāyaṃ samodahati pakkhipati,
tika-s0501t0:1500_4: so puggalo sīghaṃ aññaṃ gantukāmo pādakajjhānacittagatikaṃ karajakāyaṃ adhiṭṭhahati.
tika-s0501t0:1500_5: Kāye karajakāye sukhasaññañca sukhavihārasaññañca lahusaññañca lahugamanasaññañca okkamitvā aññaṃ gamaneyyaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1500_6: icchitaṭṭhānaṃ ekacittakkhaṇeneva ca gantvā upasampajja viharati.
tika-s0501t0:1501_1: Yaṃ sabbaññutañāṇaṃ lokuttaraṃ lokaṃ uttaritvā abhibhavitvā ṭhitaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1501_4: taṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ sabbakāle jānituṃ āvajjanakāle pavattatīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1501_5: Idaṃ “yaṃ ta”ntiādikaṃ ñāṇe atthe vācakañāpakabhāvenapi pavattanato ñāṇaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1502_1: sā nibbānagāminī maggapaññā sabbāhi lokiyāhi paññāhi seṭṭhā pasatthāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1503_1: vo tumhākaṃ santiṃ ahaṃ kittayissāmī”ti bhagavā avoca.
tika-s0501t0:1503_2: “Diṭṭhe dhamme dukkhādidhamme vā attabhāve vā sato aniccānupassanādisatisampanno hutvā caraṃ caranto
tika-s0501t0:1503_3: yogāvacaro anītihaṃ yaṃ santiṃ yaṃ nibbānaṃ ariyamaggena viditvā loke saṃsāraloke visattikaṃ visappakaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1504_0: Dhotako bhagavantaṃ vadati “mahesi mahante sīlakkhandhādī esanasīla, gotama,
tika-s0501t0:1504_1: sato ‘sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā’tiādisaraṇasampanno hutvā caraṃ caranto yogāvacaro uttamaṃ yaṃ santiṃ yaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1504_2: nibbānaṃ ariyamaggena viditvā loke saṃsāraloke visattikaṃ taṇhaṃ tare tareyyāti tañca vacanaṃ tañca santiṃ
tika-s0501t0:1505_1: “Uddhaṃ anāgataṃ upari adho atītaṃ heṭṭhā ca tiriyañcāpi majjhe paccuppannaṃ parito ca loke saṃsāraloke
tika-s0501t0:1505_2: etaṃ taṇhaṃ bhavābhavāya khuddakabhavamahantabhavatthāya saṅgo laggoti viditvā vicaranto tvaṃ taṇhaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1505_3: mākāsi mā akāsī”ti bhagavā dhotakaṃ avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1505_4: Idaṃ “kittayissāmī”tiādikaṃ ñeyye visaye atthe vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato ñeyyaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1506_2: catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ ariyabhāvakarānaṃ saccānaṃ ananubodhā abujjhanena appaṭivedhā appaṭivijjhanena
tika-s0501t0:1506_3: evaṃ iminā kāraṇena mamañceva tumhākañca dīghamaddhānaṃ idaṃ sandhāvitaṃ sandhāvanaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1506_6: ajja tayidaṃ taṃ idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ mayā anubuddhaṃ paṭividdhaṃ…pe…
tika-s0501t0:1506_7: tayidaṃ taṃ idaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṃ mayā anubuddhaṃ paṭividdhaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1506_12: sugato idaṃ “catunna”ntiādikaṃ vatvā athāparaṃ etaṃ “catunna”ntiādigāthāvacanaṃ satthā avocāti yojetvā gāthāyañca tatheva yojanā kātabbā.
tika-s0501t0:1507_1: viññāṇaṃ anicca”nti idaṃ suttaṃ ñeyye rūpādidhamme vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato ñeyyaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1508_0: Evaṃ “rūpaṃ anicca”ntiādinā pakārena jānaṃ jānanto evaṃ “rūpaṃ anicca”ntiādinā pakārena passaṃ passanto
tika-s0501t0:1508_1: ariyasāvako ariyassa bhagavato sāvako “idaṃ rūpaṃ anicca”nti rūpaṃ passati,
tika-s0501t0:1508_6: Iti idaṃ suttaṃ rūpādipassane ñāṇe vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato ñāṇaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1509_0: So “rūpaṃ anicca”ntiādinā pakārena passanto ariyasāvako rūpena rūparāgena parimuccati…pe…
tika-s0501t0:1509_1: viññāṇamhā viññāṇarāgamhā parimuccatīti dukkhasmā parimuccatīti ahaṃ vadāmīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1509_2: Idaṃ “so parimuccatī”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ ñāṇe ca ñeyye ca vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato ñāṇañca ñeyyañca hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1510_0: Sabbe pañcakkhandhā paccayehi saṅkharitattā saṅkhārā ādiantavantabhāvato,
tika-s0501t0:1510_3: Idaṃ “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”ti suttappadesavacanaṃ vuttanayena ñeyyaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1510_4: Yadā vipassanākaraṇakāle paññāya vipassanāpaññāya passati aniccatādikaṃ passati.
tika-s0501t0:1510_5: Idaṃ “yadā paññāya passatī”ti suttappadesavacanaṃ ñāṇaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1510_6: Atha passanakkhaṇe dukkhe pañcakkhandhe vipassako nibbindati,
tika-s0501t0:1510_7: nibbindanto puggalo dukkhādijānanādivasena cattāri saccāni paṭivijjhati,
tika-s0501t0:1511_1: Samaṇā bāhirakasamaṇā brāhmaṇā jātibrāhmaṇā aniccena rūpena,
tika-s0501t0:1511_3: vipariṇāmadhammena rūpena “ahaṃ parehi seyyo uttamo asmī”ti vā samanupassanti,
tika-s0501t0:1511_4: “ahaṃ parena sadiso samāno asmī”ti vā samanupassanti,
tika-s0501t0:1511_5: “ahaṃ parato hīno lāmako asmī”ti vā samanupassanti,
tika-s0501t0:1511_6: yathābhūtassa adassanā aññatra vajjetvā aññaṃ kiṃ nāma kāraṇaṃ siyā,
tika-s0501t0:1511_7: yathābhūtaṃ adassanato tāva samanupassanassa aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ natthi,
tika-s0501t0:1511_9: “Aniccāya vedanāyā”tiādīsupi iminā vuttanayena vuttanayānusārena yojanā kātabbā.
tika-s0501t0:1511_10: Idaṃ “ye hi kecī”tiādikaṃ suttappadesavacanaṃ ñeyyaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1511_11: “Ye ca kho kecī”tiādiko sukkapakkho pana vuttavipariyāyena veditabbo.
tika-s0501t0:1511_12: Idaṃ “ye ca kho”tiādikaṃ suttappadesavacanaṃ ñāṇaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1511_13: Idaṃ “ye hi kecī”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ ñāṇe ca ñeyye ca atthe vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato ñāṇañca ñeyyañca hoti. (6)
tika-s0501t0:1512_0: Nānāvidhaṃ ñāṇañca ñeyyañca sāsanapaṭṭhānasuttaṃ ācariyena niddhāritaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1512_3: Tatthāti tesu lokiyādīsu aṭṭhavīsatividhesu sāsanapaṭṭhānesu suttesu katamaṃ suttaṃ dassanaṃ nāmāti pucchati.
tika-s0501t0:1513_1: Gambhīrapaññena sabbaññubuddhena sudesitāni saṅkhepavitthārādīhi tehi tehi nayehi suṭṭhu desitāni ariyasaccāni
tika-s0501t0:1513_3: te bhāvitabhāvanā ariyapuggalā devarajjacakkavattirajjādipamādaṭṭhānaṃ āgamma bhusaṃ pamattā kiñcāpi honti,
tika-s0501t0:1513_4: tathāpi te bhāvitabhāvanā ariyapuggalā sotāpattimaggañāṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa nirodhena aṭṭhamabhavādīsu
tika-s0501t0:1513_5: uppajjanārahānaṃ nāmarūpānaṃ niruddhattā aṭṭhamakkhattuvasena aṭṭhamaṃ bhavaṃ na ādiyantīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1513_6: Idaṃ “ye ariyasaccānī”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ dassane paṭhamamaggañāṇe vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato dassanaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1514_0: Nagaradvārabāhathirakaraṇatthaṃ ummārabbhantare pathaviyaṃ aṭṭhahatthadasahatthappamāṇaṃ āvāṭaṃ khaṇitvā
tika-s0501t0:1514_1: tasmiṃ āvāṭe ussāpitattā pathavissito pathavinissito antopathavinissito indakhīlo sāradārumayo thambho
tika-s0501t0:1514_2: catubbhi catūhi disāhi āgatehi vātehi mahāvātehi asampakampiyo sampakampituṃ asakkuṇeyyo siyā yathā,
tika-s0501t0:1514_4: taṃ sappurisaṃ sabbatitthiyavādavātehi asampakampiyattā tathūpamaṃ ahaṃ vadāmīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1515_1: catūhi sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgato ariyasāvako ariyassa bhagavato sammāsambuddhassa sāvako ācikkhituṃ
tika-s0501t0:1515_2: ākaṅkhamāno hutvā attanāva sayameva attānaṃ byākareyya “bho,
tika-s0501t0:1515_3: mama atta ahaṃ idāni khīṇanirayo amhi,
tika-s0501t0:1517_0: Idha sāsane yassa ariyasāvakassa ajjhattaṃ kāmabhave nibbattāpakānaṃ orambhāgiyasaṃyojanānaṃ pajahanavasena
tika-s0501t0:1517_1: ca bahiddhā rūpārūpabhavesu nibbattāpakānaṃ uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanānaṃ pajahanavasena ca indriyāni saddhindriyādīni
tika-s0501t0:1517_2: indriyāni subhāvitāni ariyamaggabhāvanāvasena suṭṭhu bhāvitāni bhavanti,
tika-s0501t0:1517_3: bhāvito bhāvitamaggo sa danto so ariyasāvako imaṃ lokañca paraṃ lokañca nibbijjha nibbijjhitvā paṭivijjhitvā kālaṃ maraṇakāle,
tika-s0501t0:1517_5: Ayaṃ “yassindriyānī”tiādikā pāḷi bhāvanāya vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato bhāvanā nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1519_0: Devaputta chindanto puggalo pañca orambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni heṭṭhā maggattayena chinde chindeyya,
tika-s0501t0:1519_1: pajahanto puggalo pañca uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni arahattamaggena jahe pajaheyya,
tika-s0501t0:1519_2: bhāvayanto puggalo pañca saddhindriyādīni ca uttari bhāvaye bhāveyya.
tika-s0501t0:1519_5: “Pañca chinde pañca jahe”ti idaṃ vacanaṃ dassanaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1519_8: Idaṃ “pañcā”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ dassanañca bhāvanā ca hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1521_2: buddhāna sāsana”nti idaṃ suttaṃ sammāsambuddhassa vacanabhāvato sakavacanaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1522_1: bālassa bālalakkhaṇāni bālaupalakkhaṇakāraṇāni bālanimittāni “ayaṃ bālo”ti gahaṇakāraṇāni bālāpadānāni
tika-s0501t0:1522_2: bālassa apadānāni porāṇāni viruḷhāni kammāni yehi bālalakkhaṇādīhi bālaṃ “bālo”ti pare paṇḍitā sañjānanti,
tika-s0501t0:1522_6: bālo duccintitacintī ca duccintitaṃ abhijjhābyāpādamicchādassanaṃ cintī ca hoti,
tika-s0501t0:1522_7: dubbhāsitabhāsī dubbhāsitaṃ musāvādādiṃ bhāsī ca hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1522_8: dukkaṭakammakārī ca dukkaṭaṃ pāṇātipātādikammaṃ kārī ca hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1522_11: bālāpadānāni iminā mayā vuttāni tīṇi kho bhavanti.
tika-s0501t0:1522_13: Idaṃ “tīṇimāni bhikkhave”tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ sammāsambuddhassa vacanabhāvato sakavacanaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1523_1: Pātaṃ vuṭṭhaṃ udakaṃ ābhuso lābhi gaṇhātīti pātālo,
tika-s0501t0:1523_2: pātālena samo pātālasamo ninno na vijjati.
tika-s0501t0:1523_5: Idaṃ “pathavīsamo”tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ parassa devassa vacanabhāvato paravacanaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1524_5: atha kho asurindo vepacitti imaṃ vuccamānaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi “te paṭisedhako no ce assa no ce bhaveyya,
tika-s0501t0:1524_7: tasmā dhīro paṇḍito bhusena daṇḍena bālaṃ nisedhaye”ti.
tika-s0501t0:1525_5: atha kho asurindo vepacitti devānaṃ indaṃ sakkaṃ etaṃ vacanaṃ avoca “devānaminda,
tika-s0501t0:1525_6: tvaṃ gāthaṃ bhaṇa bhaṇāhī”ti etaṃ vacanaṃ avoca.
tika-s0501t0:1525_8: atha kho devānamindo sakko imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi “bālassa paṭisedhanaṃ paraṃ paccatthikaṃ saṅkupitaṃ ñatvā sato satimā yo paṇḍito kodhato upasammati,
tika-s0501t0:1525_9: tassa paṇḍitassa etadeva upasamaṃ varanti ahaṃ maññe”ti.
tika-s0501t0:1526_5: atha kho devānamindo sakko asurindaṃ vepacittiṃ etaṃ vacanaṃ avoca “vepacitti,
tika-s0501t0:1526_6: tvaṃ gāthaṃ bhaṇāhī”ti etaṃ vacanaṃ avoca.
tika-s0501t0:1526_8: atha kho asurindo vepacitti imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi “vāsava yadā titikkhati,
tika-s0501t0:1526_9: tadā naṃ titikkhantaṃ puggalaṃ bālo “ayaṃ me bhayā titikkhatī”ti maññati,
tika-s0501t0:1526_11: Vāsava gogaṇo palāyinaṃ gavaṃ ajjhottharati iva,
tika-s0501t0:1526_12: evaṃ dummedho khamantaṃ bhiyyo ajjhāruhati ajjhottharati.
tika-s0501t0:1527_4: Jāyamāne ca goyuddhe paṭhamaṃ dveyeva goṇā yujjhanti,
tika-s0501t0:1527_5: gogaṇo pana yāva eko goṇo na palāyati,
tika-s0501t0:1527_8: tadā sabbo goṇo taṃ palāyinaṃ gavaṃ bhiyyo ajjhottharatīti goyuddhasabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-s0501t0:1528_2: taṃ khamantaṃ puggalaṃ “ayaṃ me bhayā titikkhatī”ti kāmaṃ maññatu vā,
tika-s0501t0:1528_6: Khantyā khantito bhiyyo sadattho nāma na vijjati.
tika-s0501t0:1529_0: Yo balavā santo dubbalassa have titikkhatīti tassa balavantassa taṃ titikkhanaṃ paramaṃ khantinti sappurisā āhu,
tika-s0501t0:1530_3: tassa dhammaguttassa tassa balassa paṭivattā paṭippharitvā vattā na vijjati.
tika-s0501t0:1531_1: yo puggalo kuddhaṃ paṭhamaṃ kujjhantassa paṭikujjhati,
tika-s0501t0:1531_2: so paṭikujjhanto puggalo tena paṭikujjhanena tassa paṭhamaṃ kujjhantassa pāpapuggalassa pāpapuggalato pāpiyo eva pāpataro hīnataro eva bhave.
tika-s0501t0:1532_1: yo sappuriso sato satimā paraṃ saṅkupitaṃ ñatvā paṭhamaṃ kujjhantassa appaṭikujjhantova bhave,
tika-s0501t0:1532_2: so sappuriso dujjayaṃ saṅgāmaṃ jeti nāma,
tika-s0501t0:1532_3: attano ca parassa ca ubhinnaṃ atthaṃ carati nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1533_0: Attano ca parassa ca tikicchantānaṃ ubhinnaṃ kodho upasammati,
tika-s0501t0:1533_3: te janā khamantaṃ sappurisaṃ “ayaṃ bālo”ti maññanti,
tika-s0501t0:1533_4: tesaṃ akovidānaṃ janānaṃ taṃ maññanaṃ nipphalanti.
tika-s0501t0:1534_4: Idaṃ “bhiyyo bālā”tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ sakkavepacittīnaṃ vacanabhāvato paravacanaṃ nāma. (9)
tika-s0501t0:1535_2: āyatiṃ pattabbaṃ adhigataṃ yañca kāmūpakaraṇaṃ atthi,
tika-s0501t0:1535_3: etaṃ ubhayaṃ rajānukiṇṇaṃ rāgarajādikiṇṇaṃ iti āturassa āturānaṃyeva puggalānaṃ santike anusikkhato anusikkhantassa sikkhāsārā hutvā upaṭṭhahanti,
tika-s0501t0:1535_4: sīlaṃ vataṃ jīvitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ ime sikkhāsārā hutvā upaṭṭhahantīti ye upaṭṭhānasārā puggalā sārato gahetvā ṭhitā.
tika-s0501t0:1535_9: Tesaṃ upaṭṭhānasārānaṃ puggalānaṃ ayaṃ vādo eko paṭhamo anto lāmako.
tika-s0501t0:1535_10: Ye ca puggalā “kāmesu doso natthī”ti evaṃvādino evaṃdiṭṭhino hutvā ṭhitā,
tika-s0501t0:1535_11: tesaṃ puggalānaṃ ayaṃ vādo eko dutiyo anto lāmako.
tika-s0501t0:1535_12: Iccete ubho antā antavādā puggalā kaṭasivaḍḍhanā kaṭasiyo diṭṭhiṃ vaḍḍhenti.
tika-s0501t0:1535_13: Ete ubho ante attakilamathānuyoge kāmasukhallikānuyoge eke puggalā anabhiññāya olīyanti,
tika-s0501t0:1535_15: Idaṃ “yañca patta”ntiādikaṃ vacanaṃ paresaṃ puggalānaṃ vacanabhāvato paravacanaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1536_0: Ye ca sammādiṭṭhipuggalā te ubho ante attakilamathānuyogakāmasukhallikānuyoge abhiññāya tatra ca ante na ahesuṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1536_1: Tena ca abhijānanena te ubho ante na amaññiṃsu,
tika-s0501t0:1536_2: tesaṃ sammādiṭṭhipuggalānaṃ vaṭṭaṃ tividhaṃ vaṭṭaṃ paññāpanāya natthi.
tika-s0501t0:1536_3: Iti evaṃ idaṃ “ye cā”tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ bhagavato vacanabhāvato sakavacanaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1536_5: paññāpanāyā”ti ayaṃ udāno vuttanayena sakavacanañca paravacanañca hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1537_0: Pasenadi nāma kosalo kosalissaro rājā bhagavantaṃ etaṃ “idha mayhaṃ…pe…
tika-s0501t0:1537_1: tesaṃ piyo attā”ti vacanaṃ avoca. Bhante,
tika-s0501t0:1537_2: idha rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa mayhaṃ mama cetaso cittassa evaṃ parivitakko udapādi,
tika-s0501t0:1537_3: kesaṃ sattānaṃ attā piyo nu kho,
tika-s0501t0:1537_4: kesaṃ sattānaṃ attā appiyo nu kho iti etaṃ parivitakkanaṃ udapādi. Bhante,
tika-s0501t0:1537_6: ye ca keci sattā kāyena duccaritaṃ caranti kho…pe…
tika-s0501t0:1537_9: Te duccaritaṃ carantā sattā “no attā piyo”ti evaṃ kiñcāpi vadeyyuṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1537_10: atha kho tesaṃ duccaritaṃ carantānaṃ sattānaṃ attā appiyova.
tika-s0501t0:1537_12: Appiyo appiyassa anatthāya yaṃ duccaritaṃ kareyya,
tika-s0501t0:1537_13: taṃ duccaritaṃ te duccaritaṃ carantā sattā attanāva. sayameva.
tika-s0501t0:1537_15: tasmā tesaṃ duccaritaṃ carantānaṃ sattānaṃ attā appiyovāti etaṃ parivitakkanaṃ ahosi.
tika-s0501t0:1538_1: ye ca keci sattā kāyena sucaritaṃ caranti kho…pe…
tika-s0501t0:1538_3: tesaṃ sucaritaṃ carantānaṃ sattānaṃ attā piyo kho,
tika-s0501t0:1538_4: te sucaritaṃ carantā sattā “no attā appiyo”ti evaṃ kiñcāpi vadeyyuṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1538_5: atha kho tesaṃ sucaritaṃ carantānaṃ sattānaṃ attā piyova.
tika-s0501t0:1538_7: Piyo piyassa atthāya yaṃ sucaritaṃ careyya,
tika-s0501t0:1538_8: taṃ sucaritaṃ te sucaritaṃ carantā sattā attanāva sayameva attano atthāya hi yasmā karonti,
tika-s0501t0:1538_9: tasmā tesaṃ sucaritaṃ carantānaṃ sattānaṃ attā piyovāti etaṃ parivitakkanaṃ ahosi.
tika-s0501t0:1539_0: “Evametaṃ mahārājā”ti vacanaṃ paṭhamaṃ vatvā “ye hi kecī”tiādike bhagavato vuttavacanepi yojanā tatheva kātabbā.
tika-s0501t0:1540_0: Gāthāsu pana yo paṇḍito attānaṃ “piya”nti ce jaññā,
tika-s0501t0:1540_1: evaṃ sati so paṇḍito naṃ attānaṃ pāpena kammena na saṃyuje na saṃyojeyya,
tika-s0501t0:1540_2: taṃ vacanaṃ hi saccaṃ piyaṃ attānaṃ sulabhaṃ na hoti,
tika-s0501t0:1541_0: Antakena maccunā adhipannassa mānusaṃ bhavaṃ jahato pajahantassa tassa maraṇamukhe ṭhitassa sattassa kiṃ sakaṃ hoti,
tika-s0501t0:1541_1: maraṇamukhe ṭhito so satto kiñca ādāya paralokaṃ gacchati,
tika-s0501t0:1541_3: evaṃ assa paralokagatassa sattassa kiñca anugaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1542_2: Idha loke yo macco yaṃ puññañca yaṃ pāpañca ubho kamme kurute karoti,
tika-s0501t0:1542_3: tassa paralokagatassa maccassa taṃ puññapāpadvayaṃ sakaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1542_4: Paralokaṃ gato macco taṃva puññapāpadvayaṃ ādāya paralokaṃ gacchati,
tika-s0501t0:1542_6: evaṃ assa paralokagatassa maccassa taṃva puññapāpadvayaṃ anugaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1543_0: Tasmā paṇḍito samparāyikaṃ samparāye phalanibbattāpakaṃ kalyāṇaṃ nicayaṃ nicayanto hutvā kareyya.
tika-s0501t0:1543_3: Idaṃ “rājā pasenadī”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ kosalarañño vacanabhāvato paravacanaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1543_5: evametaṃ mahārājā”tiādikā anugīti bhagavato vacanabhāvato sakavacanaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1543_6: Idaṃ dvayaṃ vacanaṃ sakavacanañca paravacanañca hoti. (10)
tika-s0501t0:1544_6: ime kusalākusalā dhammā evaṃ kusalākusalabhāvena gahitā anavajjasāvajjabhāvena vā gahitā sukhavipākadukkhavipākabhāvena vā gahitā,
tika-s0501t0:1544_7: idaṃ iṭṭhavipākaṃ idaṃ aniṭṭhavipākaṃ phalaṃ nibbattayaiti evaṃgahitānaṃ tesaṃ kusalākusaladhammānaṃ ayaṃ vuḍḍhi attho,
tika-s0501t0:1544_9: Iti idaṃ “pañhe pucchite”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ vissajjanīye atthe vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato vissajjanīyaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1545_0: “Uḷāro buddho bhagavā”ti iminā padena buddhauḷārataṃ ekaṃseneva ekakoṭṭhāseneva niddise.
tika-s0501t0:1545_1: “Svākkhāto dhammo”ti iminā padena dhammasvākkhātataṃ ekaṃseneva ekakoṭṭhāseneva niddise.
tika-s0501t0:1545_2: “Suppaṭipanno saṅgho”ti iminā padena saṅghasuppaṭipattiṃ ekaṃseneva ekakoṭṭhāseneva niddise “sabbe saṅkhārā
tika-s0501t0:1545_3: aniccā”ti iminā padena saṅkhārāniccataṃ ekaṃseneva niddise.
tika-s0501t0:1545_4: “Sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā”ti iminā padena saṅkhāradukkhataṃ ekaṃseneva niddise.
tika-s0501t0:1545_5: “Sabbe dhammā anattā”ti iminā padena dhammānattataṃ ekaṃseneva niddise.
tika-s0501t0:1545_6: “Sabbe saṅkhārā anattā”ti avatvā “sabbe dhammā anattā”ti vuttena iminā padena saṅkhārehi aññaṃ yaṃ vā
tika-s0501t0:1545_8: taṃ maggaphalanirodhasamāpattidhammajātampi evaṃjātiyaṃ evaṃ ekaṃsabyākaraṇīyanti maggaphalanirodhasamāpattidhammajātassāpi
tika-s0501t0:1545_10: Idaṃ “uḷāro”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ vissajjanīye buddhauḷāratādike vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato vissajjanīyaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1546_0: Naradammasārathi ākaṅkhato te bhagavato manasā sabbaññutaññāṇasahitādimanasā vicintitaṃ ñeyyadhammaṃ devā manussā sabbe pāṇino na jaññā na jāneyyuṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1546_1: Santaṃ araṇaṃ samādhiṃ nisevato te bhagavato manasā vicintitā kasiṇāpi sabbe pāṇino na jaññā na jāneyyuṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1546_2: Kasiṇāpi vā kasiṇārammaṇāya paññāyapi na jaññā na jāneyyuṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1546_5: Atha vā “yaṃ ākaṅkhati yaṃ ākaṅkhanaṃ karoti,
tika-s0501t0:1546_6: taṃ ākaṅkhanaṃ kiṃ katama”nti pucchitaṃ pañhaṃ aññesaṃ avisayattā avissajjanīyaṃ hotīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1546_7: Idaṃ “ākaṅkhato”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ avissajjanīye visaye vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato avissajjanīyaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1547_5: bhagavā iriyāyaṃ kāyavacīsamācāre kāyavacīsamācārahetu ettako etaparimāṇo,
tika-s0501t0:1547_9: bhagavā iddhiyaṃ iddhividhahetu ettako etaparimāṇoti avissajjanīyoti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1547_10: Idaṃ “ettako”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ avissajjanīye visaye vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato avissajjanīyaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1548_1: arahato sammāsambuddhassa tathāgatassa loke uppādā uppādahetu tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ uppādo sambhavati,
tika-s0501t0:1548_3: ekassa buddharatanassa dharamānakkhaṇena hi aññassa buddharatanassa anuppajjanato āyatinti vuttaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1548_6: “Tāni tīṇi ratanāni guṇato kiṃpamāṇānī”ti pucchite sati tāni tīṇi ratanāni guṇato etaparimāṇānīti na vissajjitabbānīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1548_7: Idaṃ “tathāgatassā”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ avissajjanīye visaye vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato avissajjanīyaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1549_3: avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ pubbā koṭi na paññāyati taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1549_9: sakiṃ manusse sandhāvataṃ saṃsarataṃ sattānaṃ pubbā koṭi na paññāyati na dissati na upalabbhatīti.
tika-s0501t0:1549_10: “Sā pubbā koṭi katamā”ti kenaci kataṃ pucchanaṃ avissajjanīyaṃ saṃsārassa pubbakoṭiyā abhāvato avissajjanīyaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1549_13: “Na paññāyatī”ti desanā attano ceva sāvakānañca ñāṇavekallena kātabbā siyāti codanaṃ manasi katvā “duvidhā
tika-s0501t0:1549_18: katamā parūpanāyikā desanā”ti pucchitabbattā niyametvā dassetuṃ “na paññāyatī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1549_19: “Na paññāyatī”ti desanā sāvakānaṃ netabbānaṃ vasena desitattā parūpanāyikā desanā nāma,
tika-s0501t0:1549_20: “natthi buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ avijānanā”ti desanā attano netabbassa vasena desitattā attūpanāyikā desanā nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1549_21: “Natthi buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ avijānanā”ti vuttattā pubbāya koṭiyā abhāvato eva na paññāyatīti viññāyati,
tika-s0501t0:1549_22: bhagavato ñāṇassa paññāpanaṃ kātuṃ asamatthattā na paññāyatīti na viññāyati tena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “natthi
tika-s0501t0:1549_23: buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ avijānanāti etena purimāya koṭiyā abhāvato eva na paññāyati,
tika-s0501t0:1549_24: na tattha ñāṇassa paṭighātoti dassetī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1550_0: “Kathaṃ pana buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ avijānanāya natthibhāvovijānitabbo”ti vattabbattā avijānanāya natthibhāvaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1550_4: taṃ aññesaṃ appameyyampi bhagavato na appameyyanti bhagavato sabbattha appaṭihatañāṇataṃ dassetuṃ ‘yathā
