tika-s0501t0:1550_6: Bhagavā kokālikaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha “kīva dīghaṃ nu kho, bhante,
tika-s0501t0:1550_7: padume niraye āyuppamāṇa”nti pañhaṃ pucchitvā nisinnaṃ aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ yathā yena pakārena “seyyathāpi…pe…
tika-s0501t0:1550_9: Tato tena pakārena avijānanāya natthibhāvo vijānitabboti attho gahetabbo.
tika-s0501t0:1551_2: kokāliko vīsatikhāriko kosalako tilavāho rāsiṃ katvā ṭhapito,
tika-s0501t0:1551_3: tato tilato puriso vassasatassa vassasatassa accayena ekamekaṃ tilaṃ uddhareyya,
tika-s0501t0:1551_4: so vīsatikhāriko kosalako tilavāho iminā uddharānupakkamena khippataraṃ parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ seyyathāpi gaccheyya,
tika-s0501t0:1551_5: eko abbudo nirayo parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ na tveva gaccheyya.
tika-s0501t0:1551_6: Vīsati abbudā nirayā tattake kāle parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ seyyathāpi gaccheyyuṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1551_7: evameva eko nirabbudo nirayo tattake kāle parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ na tveva gaccheyya.
tika-s0501t0:1551_9: Sāriputtamoggallānesu cittaṃ āghātetvā padumaṃ nirayaṃ kokāliko bhikkhu upapanno kho, bhikkhu,
tika-s0501t0:1551_10: tvaṃ evaṃ sallakkhehīti bhagavā āhāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1551_11: Bhagavā “ayaṃ appameyyo ayaṃ asaṅkhyeyyo”ti vā na kiñci āha.
tika-s0501t0:1551_13: tasmiṃ asaṅkhyeyye katamo asaṅkhyeyyo”ti kenaci kataṃ pucchanaṃ buddhavisayattā avissajjanīyaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1553_0: “Kathaṃ kena pakārena jino”ti upakena kataṃ pucchanaṃ “kilesappahānapakārena jino”ti vissajjanīyattā vissajjanīyaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1553_1: “Kena pakārena jino”ti upakena kataṃ pucchanaṃ “pāpakānaṃ dhammānaṃ jitattā jino”ti vissajjanīyattā vissajjanīyaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1553_2: “Katamo jino”ti kataṃ pucchanaṃ “rūpādiko jino”ti vā “rūpādikaṃ muñcitvā añño jino”ti vā vissajjetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā avissajjanīyaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1553_6: katamo mohakkhayo”ti kataṃ pucchanaṃ “nibbānaṃ āsavakkhayo”ti vā “arahattamaggo āsavakkhayo”ti vā “arahattaphalaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1553_7: rāgakkhayo”ti vā iti evamādinā vissajjanīyattā vissajjanīyaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1553_11: kittako mohakkhayo”ti kataṃ pucchanaṃ “ettako etaparimāṇo āsavakkhayo”ti evamādinā avissajjanīyattā avissajjanīyaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1553_12: Idaṃ vuttappakāraṃ suttaṃ vuttanayena vissajjanīyañca avissajjanīyañca hoti. (12)
tika-s0501t0:1554_0: “Tathāgato satto atthī”ti pucchanaṃ “pañcakkhandhe upādāya paññāpetabbo sattabhūto atthī”ti vissajjanīyattā vissajjanīyaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1554_1: “Atthi rūpa”nti kataṃ pucchanaṃ rūpassa vissajjamānattā “āmantā”ti vissajjanīyattā vissajjanīyaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1554_2: “rūpaṃ tathāgato”ti kataṃ pucchanaṃ tathābhāvato alabbhanato avissajjanīyattā avissajjanīyaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1554_4: Idaṃ vuttappakāraṃ suttaṃ vuttanayena vissajjanīyañca avissajjanīyañca hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1555_1: yathākammūpage satte pajānātī”ti kataṃ pucchanaṃ “passati bhagavā”ti vā…pe…
tika-s0501t0:1555_4: katamo tathāgato”ti kataṃ pucchanaṃ paramatthato alabbhanato avissajjanīyattā avissajjanīyaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1556_0: “Atthi tathāgato”ti kataṃ pucchanaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayena vissajjanīyaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1556_1: “Atthi tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti kataṃ pucchanaṃ “atthi tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti vissajjamāne sati ca idhaloko eva paralokoti āpajjati,
tika-s0501t0:1556_2: “natthi tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti vissajjamāne sati ca idhalokato añño paralokoti āpajjati,
tika-s0501t0:1556_4: Idaṃ vuttappakāraṃ suttaṃ vissajjanīye visaye ca avissajjanīye visaye ca vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato vissajjanīyañca avissajjanīyañca hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1557_3: “katamaṃ suttaṃ kamma”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ kamma”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1558_1: chāyāva anapāyinī”ti idaṃ suttaṃ puññakammapāpakammadvaye vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato kammaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1559_2: (Anuṭṭhānagilānaṃ) anuṭṭhānagilānassa pīṭhasamāruḷhaṃ pīṭhasamāruḷhassa bālaṃ bālassa vā mañcasamāruḷhaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1559_3: mañcasamāruḷhassa bālaṃ bālassa vā chamāyaṃ bhūmiyaṃ semānaṃ semānassa sayantassa bālaṃ bālassa vā kāyena
tika-s0501t0:1559_4: duccaritāni vācāya duccaritāni manasā duccaritāni pāpakāni yāni kammāni pubbe pubbakāle vā atīte anekakappakoṭisatasahasse
tika-s0501t0:1559_6: tāni pāpakāni kammāni tamhi pīṭhasamāruḷhādisamaye olambanti viya upaṭṭhahanti ajjholambanti viya upaṭṭhahanti abhippalambanti viya upaṭṭhahanti.
tika-s0501t0:1559_8: mahataṃ mahantānaṃ pabbatakūṭānaṃ chāyā sāyanhasamayaṃ pathaviyaṃ seyyathāpi olambanti ajjholambanti abhippalambanti yathā,
tika-s0501t0:1559_13: tatra tasmiṃ upaṭṭhānākāre upaṭṭhānākārahetu bālassa katapāpassa evaṃ parivitakko hoti “me mayā kalyāṇaṃ akataṃ vata,
tika-s0501t0:1559_19: bho agilāna sappurisa akatakalyāṇānaṃ akatakusalānaṃ akatabhīruttāṇānaṃ katapāpānaṃ kataluddānaṃ katakibbisānaṃ yāvatā gati duggati atthi,
tika-s0501t0:1559_20: taṃ gatiṃ ahaṃ pecca gacchāmī”ti evaṃ parivitakko hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1559_21: Evaṃ vitakkento so bālo socati kilamati paridevati,
tika-s0501t0:1560_0: Pabbatakūṭānaṃ chāyā nāma sūriyuggamanakālepi pathaviyā olambantīpi chāyā hāyanavasena olambanti.
tika-s0501t0:1560_2: tatheva kammānipi tasmiṃ kāle vaḍḍhanavasena upaṭṭhahanti,
tika-s0501t0:1560_5: Idaṃ “puna capara”ntiādikaṃ suttadvayaṃ kusalakammaakusalakammesu vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato kammaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1561_2: “katamo vipāko”ti pucchitabbattā tattha katamo vipāko”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1561_3: Tattha tesu aṭṭhavīsatividhesu lokiyādīsu sāsanapaṭṭhānesu katamo vipākoti pucchati.
tika-s0501t0:1561_6: te manussattasaddhāpaṭilābhādayo vo tumhākaṃ lābhā bhavanti.
tika-s0501t0:1561_8: taṃ catupārisuddhisīlādisampādanaṃ vo tumhākaṃ suladdhaṃ bhavati.
tika-s0501t0:1561_10: yo buddhuppādo navamo khaṇo tumhehi laddho,
tika-s0501t0:1561_11: so buddhuppādo navamo khaṇo vo tumhākaṃ brahmacariyavāsāya paṭiladdho bhavati.
tika-s0501t0:1562_2: tattha tesu diṭṭhesu chaphassāyatanikesu nāma nirayesu yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ cakkhunā passati,
tika-s0501t0:1563_16: bhikkhave”tiādiko pāṭho vipāke vācakañāpakabhāveneva pavattanato vipāko nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1564_0: Mārisā niraye paccamānānaṃ amhākaṃ sabbaso nimujjanaummujjanavasena saṭṭhivassasahassāni paripuṇṇāni,
tika-s0501t0:1564_1: nirayassa anto pariyosānaṃ kadā kasmiṃ kāle bhavissati.
tika-s0501t0:1565_2: Nirayassa anto pariyosānaṃ amhākaṃ na paṭidissati. Mārisā,
tika-s0501t0:1565_3: yadā tumhe ca ahañca seṭṭhiputtā jātā,
tika-s0501t0:1565_4: tadā tuyhaṃ tumhākañca mayhaṃ mama ca pāpaṃ hi yasmā pakataṃ pakārehi kataṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1565_5: tasmā nirayassa anto pariyosānaṃ amhākaṃ na dissatīti ayaṃ pāṭho vipāke vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato vipāko nāma. (13)
tika-s0501t0:1566_1: Adhammacārī naro kusaladhammesu pamatto hi yasmā hoti,
tika-s0501t0:1566_2: tasmā so adhammacārī pamatto naro yahiṃ yahiṃ yaṃ yaṃ duggatiṃ gacchati,
tika-s0501t0:1566_3: taṃ taṃ gacchantaṃ adhammacāriṃ naṃ naraṃ attanā carito so dhammova hanati.
tika-s0501t0:1566_5: Sayaṃ attanā gahito kaṇhasappo gaṇhantaṃ janaṃ hanati yathā,
tika-s0501t0:1566_6: evaṃ attanā carito adhammo adhammacāriṃ naṃ hanati.
tika-s0501t0:1566_7: “Na hi dhammo adhammo cā”tiādigāthāya attho pākaṭo.
tika-s0501t0:1566_8: Idaṃ suttadvayaṃ kamme ca vipāke ca vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato kammañca vipāko ca hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1567_4: etaṃ “puññānī”ti adhivacanaṃ iṭṭhassa kantassa piyassa manāpassa sukhassa sukhavipākajanakassa kammassa adhivacanaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1567_6: ahaṃ dīgharattaṃ katānaṃ puññānaṃ dīgharattaṃ paccanubhūtaṃ iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ piyaṃ manāpaṃ abhijānāmi kho.
tika-s0501t0:1567_8: pubbe satta vassāni mettacittaṃ mettāya sahitaṃ dutiyajjhānacittaṃ bhāvetvā satta saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe imaṃ lokaṃ manussalokaṃ puna na āgamāsiṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1567_16: tatra brahmavimāne tatra upapajjamāne upapajjamānahetu ahaṃ brahmā homi,
tika-s0501t0:1567_19: aññadatthu ekaṃsena daso ahaṃ vasavattī homi.
tika-s0501t0:1568_1: ahaṃ devānamindo sakko chattiṃsakkhattuṃ ahosiṃ kho,
tika-s0501t0:1568_2: dhammiko dhammarājā cāturanto vijitāvī janapadatthāvariyappatto cakkaratanādisattaratanasamannāgato cakkavattirājā anekasatakkhattuṃ ahosiṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1569_1: tassa cakkavattirājabhūtassa mayhaṃ etaṃ parivitakkanaṃ ahosi “yena phalena yena vipākena ahaṃ etarahi evaṃmahiddhiko evaṃmahānubhāvo amhi,
tika-s0501t0:1569_2: taṃ idaṃ phalaṃ kissa kammassa phalaṃ nu kho,
tika-s0501t0:1569_3: so ayaṃ vipāko kissa kammassa vipāko nu kho”ti etaṃ parivitakkanaṃ ahosi.
tika-s0501t0:1569_5: tassa vitakkentassa mayhaṃ etaṃ parivitakkanaṃ ahosi “yena phalena yena vipākena ahaṃ etarahi evaṃmahiddhiko evaṃmahānubhāvo amhi,
tika-s0501t0:1569_6: me pavattaṃ taṃ idaṃ phalaṃ tiṇṇaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ kho,
tika-s0501t0:1569_7: so ayaṃ vipāko tiṇṇaṃ kammānaṃ vipāko kho,
tika-s0501t0:1569_8: seyyathidaṃ katamesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipāko?
tika-s0501t0:1569_9: Dānassa damassa saṃyamassāti tiṇṇaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipāko”ti etaṃ parivitakkanaṃ ahosīti avocāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1570_7: Tappaccayo taṃkammapaccayo paccayuppannabhūto paccanubhūto yo vipāko atthi,
tika-s0501t0:1570_9: ayaṃ vipāko taṃvācakañāpako pāṭhopi vipāko nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1571_0: Todeyyaputtassa subhassa māṇavassa yaṃ suttaṃ bhagavatā desitaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1571_1: tattha sutte vuttā ye pāṇātipātādayo dhammā appāyukadīghāyukatāya saṃvattanti,
tika-s0501t0:1571_14: Idaṃ subhasuttaṃ kusalākusalakamme ceva vipāke ca vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato kammañca vipāko ca hoti. (14)
tika-s0501t0:1572_5: so puggalo isippaveditaṃ maggaṃ ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ ārādhaye ārādhayeyyāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1572_6: Idaṃ “vācānurakkhī”tiādikaṃ suttaṃ kusale vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato kusalaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1573_0: Yassa puggalassa kāyena dukkaṭaṃ duggatisaṃvattaniyakammaṃ natthi,
tika-s0501t0:1573_3: tīhi ṭhānehi uppajjanaṭṭhānehi saṃvutaṃ taṃ puggalaṃ “brāhmaṇa”nti ahaṃ vadāmīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1574_4: kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā vijjā pubbaṅgamā hoti,
tika-s0501t0:1575_0: Māluvā sālaṃ rukkhaṃ onataṃ bhūmiyaṃ patanaṃ karoti iva,
tika-s0501t0:1575_1: tathā yassa janassa accantaṃ dvīsu tīsu bhavesu dussīlyaṃ atthi,
tika-s0501t0:1575_2: so jano attānaṃ onataṃ apāyesu pākaṭaṃ karoti.
tika-s0501t0:1575_5: tathā īdiso dussīlo naṃ attānaṃ anatthaṃ karotīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1576_0: Asmamayaṃ asmasaṅkhātaṃ pāsāṇamaṇimayaṃ vajiraṃ vajirassa uṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ pāsāṇamaṇiṃ abhimatthati vidhaṃseti iva,
tika-s0501t0:1576_1: tathā attanā hi sayameva kataṃ attajaṃ attasambhavaṃ pāpaṃ dummedhaṃ pāpaṃ karontaṃ janaṃ abhimatthatīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1577_0: Devate kusalehi vivajjitā akusalā dasa kammapathe niseviya katvā garahā gārayhā bhavanti,
tika-s0501t0:1578_0: “Tīṇimāni, bhikkhave…pe… akusalamūlānī”ti idaṃ vacanaṃ vuttanayena akusalaṃ. (15)
tika-s0501t0:1579_1: taṃ bījaṃ tādisaṃ phalaṃ harate iva,
tika-s0501t0:1579_2: tathā kalyāṇakārī paṇḍito kalyāṇaṃ phalaṃ harate,
tika-s0501t0:1579_3: pāpakārī bālo ca pāpakaṃ phalaṃ harateti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1579_4: Tattha “yādisa”ntiādike sutte “kalyāṇakārī kalyāṇa”nti yaṃ vacanaṃ āha,
tika-s0501t0:1579_8: Idaṃ dvivacanaṃ vuttanayena kusalañca akusalañca hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1580_0: Kalyāṇakārī sappurisā subhena kammena suggatiṃ vajanti gacchanti,
tika-s0501t0:1580_1: pāpakārī kāpurisā asubhena kammunā apāyabhūmiṃ vajanti gacchanti,
tika-s0501t0:1580_2: kammassa abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇasahagatakammassa khayā khayanato vimuttacetasā samucchedavimuttipaṭippassaddhivimutticittā te sappurisā asubhe nibbanti.
tika-s0501t0:1580_5: tathā te sappurisā kammassa khayā anavasesakhayanato nibbantīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1580_8: idaṃ “subhena…pe…suggati”nti vacanaṃ kusale vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato kusalaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1580_11: kammunā”ti vacanaṃ akusale vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato akusalaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1580_12: Idaṃ “subhenā”tiādikaṃ gāthāvacanaṃ vuttanayena kusalañca akusalañca hoti. (16)
tika-s0501t0:1581_2: munī care”ti idaṃ gāthāvacanaṃ anuññāte caraṇe vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato anuññātaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1582_0: Bhamaro nāma puppharasapivanagahaṇavasena caraṇako madhukarādiko bhamaro.
tika-s0501t0:1582_1: So puppharasaṃ gaṇhanto mandavego hutvā pupphañca vaṇṇañca gandhañca avināsetvā yāvadatthaṃ puppharasaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1582_2: pivitvā madhukaraṇatthāya ca puppharasaṃ gahetvā madhukaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ paleti.
tika-s0501t0:1582_4: Evameva piṇḍāya gāmaṃ pavisanto muni pasādajanakaṃ ālokanavilokanagamanatiṭṭhanādikaṃ janetvā pītisomanassasahitaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1582_5: pasādaṃ janetvā saddhādeyyaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ yāpanamattaṃ paṭiggahetvā gāmato nikkhamitvā udakaphāsukaṭṭhāne
tika-s0501t0:1582_8: piṇḍapātaṃ paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjitvā bhamaro vane madhuṃ karoti viya,
tika-s0501t0:1582_9: kammaṭṭhānānurūpaṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ pavisitvā jhānamaggaphalanibbattanatthāya samaṇadhammakaraṇatthāya gāme care careyyāti adhippāyo veditabbo.
tika-s0501t0:1583_5: bhikkhūnaṃ tīṇi karaṇīyānī”ti idaṃ suttaṃ bhagavatā anuññāte ācāre atthe vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato anuññātaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1583_6: Tasmiṃ sutte yo bhikkhu sīlaṃ pāti rakkhati,
tika-s0501t0:1583_7: iti rakkhaṇato so bhikkhu pāti nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1583_8: Yaṃ sīlaṃ taṃ pātiṃ bhikkhuṃ apāyādidukkhato moceti,
tika-s0501t0:1583_9: iti mocanato taṃ sīlaṃ pātimokkhaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1583_11: iti saṃvaraṇakaraṇato taṃ sīlaṃ saṃvaraṃ nāma,
tika-s0501t0:1583_13: pātimokkhasaṃvarena saṃvuto samannāgato hutvā saṃvuṇanato catuiriyāpathesu cārako hoti,
tika-s0501t0:1583_16: Vārittacāraṃ vajjetvā cārittasīlaṃ ādāya caraṇaṃ ācāro,
tika-s0501t0:1584_3: Idaṃ “dasā”tiādikaṃ suttampi anuññāte dasavidhe paccavekkhitabbe dhamme vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato anuññātaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1584_5: karaṇīyānī”ti idaṃ suttampi anuññāte tividhe sucarite vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato anuññātaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1585_2: “katamaṃ suttaṃ paṭikkhitta”nti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ paṭikkhitta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1590_0: Natthi paññāsamā ābhā, vuṭṭhi ve paramā sarā”ti. –
tika-s0501t0:1591_1: Ettha etasmiṃ gāthādvaye yaṃ “natthi puttasamaṃ pema”ntiādikaṃ purimakaṃ hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1591_2: Idaṃ “natthi puttasamaṃ pema”ntiādikaṃ devaputtavacanaṃ bhagavatā paṭikkhittattā,
tika-s0501t0:1591_3: paṭikkhitte atthe pavattanato ca paṭikkhittaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1592_0: Dubbhikkhakāle vā kantāre vā mātāpitaro puttadhītaro ghātetvāpi attānameva posenti,
tika-s0501t0:1592_3: gomahiṃsādīnipi dhaññagahaṇatthāya dhaññassāmikānaṃ datvā dhaññameva gaṇhanti,
tika-s0501t0:1592_6: paññā pana dasasahassilokadhātumpi ekapajjotaṃ ekobhāsaṃ kātuṃ samatthā,
tika-s0501t0:1592_10: so ca deve avuṭṭhe sati khayanasabhāvo bhaveyya,
tika-s0501t0:1592_11: vuṭṭhi pana koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesupi yāva ābhassarā brahmalokāpi pūrā bhavati,
tika-s0501t0:1593_1: Idaṃ “tīṇimānī”tiādikaṃ suttampi paṭikkhitte duccarite vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato paṭikkhittaṃ nāma. (17)
tika-s0501t0:1594_3: “katamaṃ anuññātañca paṭikkhittañcā”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha katamaṃ anuññātañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1595_2: Idha loke anekā yā janatā bhītā,
tika-s0501t0:1595_4: Yo ca maggo anekāyatano iti pavutto,
tika-s0501t0:1595_5: so ca maggo kiṃsu katamo bhave.
tika-s0501t0:1595_6: Kismiṃ dhamme ṭhito jano paralokaṃ na bhāye na bhāyeyyāti pucchatīti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1596_2: kāyena pāpāni akubbamāno ca bhave, ayaṃ eko.
tika-s0501t0:1596_3: Bahvannapānaṃ gharaṃ āvasanto ca bhave, ayaṃ eko.
tika-s0501t0:1596_4: Saddho saddhāsampanno cittamudubhāvena mudu ca bhave, ayaṃ eko.
tika-s0501t0:1596_5: Vadaññū yācakānaṃ yācanavasena vuttavacanaññū hutvā saṃvibhāgī ca bhave, ayaṃ eko.
tika-s0501t0:1596_6: Iti etesu catūsu dhammesu ṭhito jano dhammesu ṭhito hutvā paralokaṃ na bhāye na bhāyeyyāti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1597_1: katamaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ nāmā”ti pucchitabbattā “tattha yaṃ āhā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1597_2: Tattha tasmiṃ “kiṃsūdhā”tiādipañhāya vissajjane “vācaṃ manañcā”tiādivacane “vācaṃ manañca paṇidhāya sammā”ti yaṃ vacanaṃ bhagavā āha,
tika-s0501t0:1597_4: sammā”ti vacanaṃ anuññāte vacanīyādike atthe vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato anuññātaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1597_7: māno”ti vacanaṃ pāpakubbena paṭikkhitte vuttanayena pavattanato paṭikkhittaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1597_11: na bhāye”ti vacanaṃ vuttanayena anuññātaṃ nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1597_12: Idaṃ “vāca”ntiādikaṃ vacanaṃ vuttanayadvayena anuññātañca paṭikkhittañca hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1600_0: “Kiñca vaḍḍhanahāyanaṃ āgamma kāyasamācārādikaṃ sevitabbāsevitabbabhedena vutta”nti vattabbabhāvato “kiñcetaṃ paṭiccā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1601_3: “katamo suttaviseso thavo”ti pucchitabbattā tathā pucchitvā ayaṃ suttaviseso thavo nāmāti viññāpetuṃ “tattha katamo thavo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1601_4: Tattha tatthāti tesu aṭṭhavīsatividhesu lokiyādīsu sāsanapaṭṭhānasuttesu katamo suttaviseso thavo nāmāti pucchati.
tika-s0501t0:1602_0: Maggānaṃ jaṅghamaggadiṭṭhimaggādīnaṃ aṭṭhaṅgiko sammādiṭṭhimaggaṅgādiaṭṭhaṅgiko maggo seṭṭho uttamo.
tika-s0501t0:1602_3: Dhammānaṃ sabbasaṅkhatasappaccayadhammānaṃ virāgo asaṅkhatanibbānasaṅkhāto virāgo dhammo seṭṭho uttamo.
tika-s0501t0:1602_4: Dvipadānaṃ sabbadevamanussādīnaṃ dvipadānaṃ cakkhumā pañcavidhacakkhumā bhagavā seṭṭho uttamoti yojanā.
tika-s0501t0:1602_5: Ayaṃ “maggānaṭṭhaṅgiko”tiādisuttaviseso thave atthe vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato thavo nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1603_9: nevasaññīnāsaññino bhavagge nibbattasattā vā yāvatā yattakā sattā saṃvijjanti,
tika-s0501t0:1603_10: tesaṃ tattakānaṃ apadādīnaṃ sattānaṃ yadidaṃ yo ayaṃ arahaṃ sammāsambuddho tathāgato uppanno,
tika-s0501t0:1603_11: so ayaṃ arahaṃ sammāsambuddho tathāgato aggaṃ aggoti akkhāyati,
tika-s0501t0:1604_1: asaṅkhatānaṃ paccayehi asaṅkharitānaṃ paṇṇattimattabhūtānaṃ dhammānaṃ vā yāvatā yattakā paṇṇattī voharīyanti,
tika-s0501t0:1604_2: tattakehi paṇṇattīhi paññapetabbānaṃ tesaṃ saṅkhatāsaṅkhatānaṃ dhammānaṃ yadidaṃ yo ayaṃ madanimmadano…pe…
tika-s0501t0:1604_5: so ayaṃ madanimmadanādiko dhammo aggaṃ aggoti akkhāyati…pe…
tika-s0501t0:1605_3: tattakehi paṇṇattīhi paññapetabbānaṃ tesaṃ saṅghagaṇādīnaṃ yāni imāni cattāri puggalāni purisayugāni,
tika-s0501t0:1605_6: so ayaṃ catupurisayugādiko tathāgatasāvakasaṅgho aggaṃ aggoti akkhāyati…pe…
tika-s0501t0:1606_2: narasīhassa satthuno gaṇo ca iti tīṇi satthudhammagaṇaratanāni aggāni,
tika-s0501t0:1606_3: tāni tīṇi satthudhammagaṇaratanāni visissare guṇavasena visissanti.
tika-s0501t0:1607_0: Samaṇapadumasañcayo sare ruhamānaṃ padumaṃ sobhanaṃ iva sāsane sobhanasamaṇapadumasamūho gaṇo ca,
tika-s0501t0:1607_2: vidūnaṃ sakkato naravaradamako naravarānaṃ brahmadevamanussarājarājamahāmaccādīnaṃ damako anudamako cakkhumā
tika-s0501t0:1607_3: sambuddho ca iti tīṇi gaṇadhammabuddharatanāni lokassa uttari bhavanti.
tika-s0501t0:1608_2: sabbo dhammo ca ariyo gaṇavaro ca iti yāni tīṇi buddhadhammagaṇaratanāni aggāni,
tika-s0501t0:1609_0: Saccanāmo avitathasaccadesanato saccanāmo khemo sabbābhibhū sabbe manussadevādike anabhibhavamānopi guṇātirekavasena
tika-s0501t0:1609_1: abhibhavamāno viya pavattanato sabbābhibhū jino ca,
tika-s0501t0:1609_3: tassa saccadhammassa uttari uttamo añño dhammo natthi,
tika-s0501t0:1609_4: viññūnaṃ niccaṃ pūjito pūjāraho ariyasaṅgho ca iti tīṇi lokassa uttari uttamāni bhavanti.
tika-s0501t0:1610_1: Jātikhayantadassī hitānukampī bhagavā ekāyanaṃ maggaṃ pajānāti.
tika-s0501t0:1610_3: tena maggena kiṃ taratī”ti vattabbabhāvato “etena maggenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1610_5: etena maggena pubbe atītamaddhānaṃ buddhādayo ariyā oghaṃ saṃsāroghaṃ tariṃsu,
tika-s0501t0:1610_9: visuddhipekkhā visuddhiṃ apekkhamānā sattā devamanussaseṭṭhaṃ tādisaṃ yathāvuttaguṇaṃ taṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ namassanti,
tika-s0501t0:1610_11: ratanattayaguṇe ca vācakañāpakabhāvena pavattanato thavo nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1610_12: Iccetaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānasuttavisesadassako saṃvaṇṇanāvisesopi sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ nāmāti veditabbo.
tika-s0501t0:1611_3: “tesu saṃkilesabhāgiyādīsu sāsanapaṭṭhānasuttavisesesu katamaṃ suttavisesaṃ katamena suttavisesena saṃsanditvā
tika-s0501t0:1611_6: “evaṃ duvidhampi sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ nānāsuttapadāni udāharantena vibhajitvā idāni saṃkilesabhāgiyādīhi saṃsanditvā
tika-s0501t0:1612_0: Tattha tatthāti tesu soḷasavidhesu saṃkilesabhāgiyādīsu sāsanapaṭṭhānasuttavisesesu ceva aṭṭhavīsatividhesu
tika-s0501t0:1612_1: lokiyādīsu sāsanapaṭṭhānasuttavisesesu ca akusalapakkhe pavattaṃ lokiyaṃ suttaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyasuttena
tika-s0501t0:1612_3: kusalapakkhe pavattaṃ lokiyaṃ suttaṃ vāsanābhāgiyasuttena samānatthabhāvena saṃsandati,
tika-s0501t0:1612_4: tasmā lokiyaṃ suttaṃ ekavidhampi saṃkilesabhāgiyena ca vāsanābhāgiyena ca dvīhi suttehi niddisitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1612_5: Dassanapakkhe pavattaṃ lokuttaraṃ suttaṃ dassanabhāgiyena samānatthabhāvena saṃsandati,
tika-s0501t0:1612_6: bhāvanāpakkhe pavattaṃ lokuttaraṃ suttaṃ bhāvanābhāgiyena samānatthabhāvena saṃsandati,
tika-s0501t0:1612_7: asekkhapakkhe pavattaṃ lokuttaraṃ suttaṃ asekkhabhāgiyena samānatthabhāvena saṃsandati,
tika-s0501t0:1612_8: tasmā lokuttarampi suttaṃ dassanabhāgiyena ca bhāvanābhāgiyena ca asekkhabhāgiyena ca tīhi suttehi niddisitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1613_0: Amhākācariya tumhehi amhākācariyehi nayadassanavasena suttavisesasaṃsandanaṃ dassitaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1613_2: “kimatthāya saṃkilesabhāgiyādibhedena vibhajitvā bhagavatā vutta”nti vattabbattā “vāsanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1614_1: taṃ sattādhiṭṭhānaṃ kittakehi suttehi vibhajitvā niddisitabba”nti vattabbattā “lokuttaraṃ suttaṃ sattādhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1614_3: “Te chabbīsati puggalā katihi suttehi samanvesitabbā”ti vattabbattā “te tīhī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1614_6: asekkhabhāgiyena sattādhiṭṭhānena cāti tīhi suttehi te chabbīsati puggalā samanvesitabbā.
tika-s0501t0:1615_0: “Katamehi katamehi katamaṃ katamaṃ suttaṃ niddisitabba”nti vattabbattā “tattha dassanabhāgiya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1615_1: Tattha tatthāti tesu tīsu dassanabhāgiyādīsu suttesu.
tika-s0501t0:1615_3: Sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ dassanabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ ekabījinā puggalena ca niddisitabbaṃ…pe…
tika-s0501t0:1615_5: iti imehi pañcahi puggalehi sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ dassanabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ niddisitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1616_0: Saddhānusārī pana yo vipassanākkhaṇe saddhaṃ dhuraṃ katvā sotāpattimaggaṃ nibbatteti,
tika-s0501t0:1616_3: iti saddhāya samāpattiyā anussaraṇato sotāpattimaggaṭṭho puggalo saddhānusārī nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1616_4: So puggalo sotāpattiphalakkhaṇe saddhāya vimuttattā saddhāvimutto hutvā ekabījikolaṃkolasattakkhattuparamo bhavati.
tika-s0501t0:1616_5: Yo pana puggalo vipassanākkhaṇe paññaṃ dhuraṃ katvā sotāpattimaggaṃ nibbatteti,
tika-s0501t0:1616_8: iti dhammena paññāya samāpattiyā anussaraṇato dhammānusārī nāma.
tika-s0501t0:1616_9: So puggalo phalakkhaṇe diṭṭhiyā paññāya nirodhaṃ pattattā diṭṭhipatto hutvā ekabīji…pe…
tika-s0501t0:1616_14: sampiṇḍite pana pañcahi ariyapuggalehi sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ dassanabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ niddisitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1617_0: Imesaṃ ekabījiādīnaṃ puggalānaṃ sattādhiṭṭhānekadesatthattā ceva dassanabhāgiyatthattā ca sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1617_1: dassanabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ ettakehi puggalehi niddisitabbanti niyametvā ācariyena vibhattaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1617_3: “sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ dassanabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ kittakehi puggalehi niddisitabba”nti pucchitabbattā –
tika-s0501t0:1618_0: “Bhāvanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ dvādasahi puggalehi niddisitabbaṃ sakadāgāmiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipannena,
tika-s0501t0:1618_11: kāyasakkhinā cāti bhāvanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ imehi dvādasahi puggalehi niddisitabba”nti –
tika-s0501t0:1619_8: avihādīsu pañcasu suddhāvāsesu āyuvemajjhaṃ anatikkamitvā arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāyanasabhāvena antarāparinibbāyīnāmakena anāgāminā,
tika-s0501t0:1619_9: āyuvemajjhaṃ atikkamitvā arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāyanasabhāvena upahaccaparinibbāyīnāmakena anāgāminā,
tika-s0501t0:1619_10: asaṅkhārena appayogena arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāyanasabhāvena asaṅkhāraparinibbāyīnāmakena anāgāminā,
tika-s0501t0:1619_11: sasaṅkhārena sappayogena arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāyanasabhāvena sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyīnāmakena anāgāminā,
tika-s0501t0:1619_12: avihādīhi uddhaṃ atappādīsu upapattisotena arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāyanasabhāvena uddhaṃsotanāmakena anāgāminā,
tika-s0501t0:1619_13: akaniṭṭhaṃ gantvā arahattaṃ patvā parinibbāyanasabhāvena akaniṭṭhagāmīnāmakena anāgāminā,
tika-s0501t0:1619_15: diṭṭhiyā paññāya nirodhaṃ pattattā diṭṭhippattanāmakena anāgāminā cāti imehi ekādasahi ajhānalābhīpuggalehi ca,
tika-s0501t0:1619_16: kāyena nāmakāye phuṭṭhānaṃ arūpajhānānaṃ anantaraṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikaroti,
tika-s0501t0:1619_17: iti sacchikaraṇato kāyasakkhīnāmakena jhānalābhinā cāti dvādasahi puggalehi niddisitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1620_0: Imesaṃ vuttappakārānaṃ puggalānaṃ sattādhiṭṭhānekadesatthattā ceva bhāvanābhāgiyatthattā ca sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1620_1: bhāvanābhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ ettakehi puggalehi niddisitabbanti niyametvā ācariyena vibhattaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1620_3: “kittakehi puggalehi sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ asekkhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ niddisitabba”nti vattabbattā –
tika-s0501t0:1621_8: sammāsambuddhehi cāti asekkhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ imehi navahi puggalehi niddisitabba”nti –
tika-s0501t0:1622_1: Tattha sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ asekkhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ niddisitabbanti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1622_2: Saddhāya kilesehi vimuttattā arahattaphalakkhaṇe saddhāvimutto arahā,
tika-s0501t0:1622_12: Ubhato rūpakāyanāmakāyato ubhatobhāgato vimuttattā ubhatobhāgavimutto arahā,
tika-s0501t0:1623_3: Imesu tīsu samasīsīsu yo arahā catūsu iriyāpathesu ekekasmiṃ iriyāpathe arahattaṃ patvā aññaṃ iriyāpathaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1623_6: Yo arahā yasmiṃ roge uppanne arahattaṃ patvā tato rogato anuṭṭhahitvā tasmiṃ rogeyeva parinibbāyati,
tika-s0501t0:1623_8: Yo arahā paccavekkhaṇavīthiyānantaraṃ bhavaṅgaṃ otaritvā tato maraṇāsannajavanavīthiyānantarameva parinibbāyati,
tika-s0501t0:1623_10: Vārasamatāti ca paccavekkhaṇavīthi maggavithyānuvattakattā paccavekkhaṇavīthianantaraṃ pavattamānāyapi
tika-s0501t0:1624_0: Saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇīti etthapi paccavekkhaṇavīthiyānantaraṃ bhavaṅgaṃ otaritvā bhavaṅgato
tika-s0501t0:1624_3: Bhagavato sabbaññutaññāṇampi paccavekkhaṇavīthiyānantaraṃ bhavaṅgaṃ otaritvā bhavaṅgato vuṭṭhāya pavattavīthiyā paṭhamaṃ pavattatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1624_6: sabbehi sammāsambuddhehi cāti imehi navahi puggalehi sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ asekkhabhāgiyaṃ suttaṃ niddisitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1625_0: Imesaṃ puggalānaṃ sattādhiṭṭhānekadesatthattā ceva asekkhabhāgiyatthattā ca evaṃ iminā “lokuttaraṃ suttaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1625_1: sattādhiṭṭhāna”ntiādinā pakārena vuttehi imehi chabbīsatiyā puggalehi ariyehi dassanabhāgiyavāsanābhāgiyaasekkhabhāgiyasuttānaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1625_2: vasena lokuttaraṃ suttaṃ sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ suttaṃ niddisitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1626_0: Imesaṃ chabbīsatiyā puggalānaṃ sakalalokuttarasuttatthattā ceva sattādhiṭṭhānekadesasuttatthattā ca lokuttaraṃ sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ suttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1626_1: Ettakehi puggalehi niddisitabbanti ācariyena niyametvā vibhattaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1626_3: “lokiyaṃ sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ suttaṃ kittakehi puggalehi niddisitabba”nti vattabbattā “lokiyaṃ suttaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1626_5: “Te ekūnavīsati lokiyā puggalā katamehi dhammehi niddiṭṭhā samanvesitabbā”ti vattabbattā “te caritehī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1626_6: Te ekūnavīsati lokiyā puggalā caritehi caritavisesehi niddiṭṭhā samanvesitabbāti.
tika-s0501t0:1626_11: Iti niddiṭṭhehi imehi ekūnavīsatiyā puggalehi lokiyasattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ suttaṃ niddisitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1627_0: Lokiyaṃ sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ suttaṃ ettakehi puggalehi niddisitabbanti ācariyena niyametvā vibhattaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1627_2: “vāsanābhāgiyaṃ sattādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ suttaṃ katamehi puggalehi niddisitabba”nti vattabbattā “vāsanābhāgiya”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1627_5: “Kittakā sīlavantapuggalā”ti vattabbattā “te sīlavanto pañca puggalā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1627_8: pakatisīlavanto ca samādānasīlavanto ca cittappasādavanto ca samathavanto ca vipassanāvanto cāti pañca puggalā,
tika-s0501t0:1627_9: pakatisīladhammo ca samādānasīladhammo ca cittappasādadhammo ca samathadhammo ca vipassanādhammo cāti pañca dhammāti imehi pañcahi puggalehi,
tika-s0501t0:1627_10: imehi pañcahi dhammehi vāsanābhāgiyaṃ sattādhiṭṭhānekadesadhammādhiṭṭhānekadesaṃ suttaṃ yathākkamaṃ niddisitabbanti.
tika-s0501t0:1628_0: Lokuttaraṃ sattādhiṭṭhānaṃ suttaṃ dassanabhāgiyavāsanābhāgiyaasekkhabhāgiyasuttehi niddisitabbanti ācariyena niyametvā vibhattaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1628_2: “lokuttaraṃ dhammādhiṭṭhānaṃ suttaṃ kittakehi suttehi niddisitabba”nti vattabbattā “lokuttaraṃ suttaṃ dhammādhiṭṭhānaṃ…pe…
tika-s0501t0:1629_0: “Lokiyañca lokuttarañca sattādhiṭṭhānañca dhammādhiṭṭhānañca kittakehi niddisitabba”nti vattabbattā “lokiyañca…pe…
tika-s0501t0:1630_2: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sutte ñāṇaṃ ñāṇapariyāyena paññādinā niddisitabbanti.
tika-s0501t0:1631_2: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sutte ñeyyaṃ ñeyyapariyāyena niddisitabbanti.
tika-s0501t0:1632_0: “Ñāṇañca ñeyyañca kittakena niddisitabba”nti vattabbattā “ñāṇañca ñeyyañca tadubhayenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1632_2: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sutte ñāṇañeyyā ñāṇañeyyapariyāyena niddisitabbanti.
tika-s0501t0:1633_4: Tadubhayaṃ dassanañca bhāvanā ca sutte yathā niddiṭṭhaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1634_0: “Sakavacanaṃ paravacana”ntiādīsupi evameva visuṃ visuṃ ca ekato ca sutte yathā niddiṭṭhaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1634_1: tathā upadhārayitvā labbhamānato niddisitabbanti yojanā kātabbā.
tika-s0501t0:1635_2: Taṇhāsaṅkhāto samudayo vā kilesasaṅkhāto samudayo vā akusalasaṅkhāto samudayo vā saṃkilesabhāgiyena suttena samānatthabhāvena niddisitabbo.
tika-s0501t0:1635_3: Lokiyakusalahetusaṅkhāto samudayo vā lokiyakusalasaṅkhāto samudayo vā vāsanābhāgiyena suttena samānatthabhāvena niddisitabbo.
tika-s0501t0:1636_0: Kammañca vipāko ca yathārahaṃ labbhamānasuttena niddisitabboti sāmaññavasena vibhatto,
tika-s0501t0:1636_2: Tatthāti tesu aṭṭhavīsatiyā sāsanapaṭṭhānasuttesu kusalaṃ catūhi suttehi samānatthabhāvena niddisitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1636_10: “Kusalañca akusalañca katamena niddisitabba”nti vattabbattā “kusalañca akusalañca tadubhayena niddisitabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1636_12: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sutte āgatena tadubhayena niddisitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1637_3: Yaṃ anuññātaṃ yāsu yāsu bhūmīsu dissati,
tika-s0501t0:1637_4: taṃ anuññātaṃ tāsu tāsu bhūmīsu āgatena samānena kappiyānulomena niddisitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1638_0: Anuññātaṃ iminā niddisitabbanti ācariyena niyametvā vibhattaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1638_2: Bhagavatā paṭikkhittaṃ bhagavatā paṭikkhittakāraṇena sutte āgatena vatthunā kāraṇaphalabhāvena niddisitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1638_3: Yaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ yāsu yāsu bhūmīsu dissati,
tika-s0501t0:1638_4: taṃ pana paṭikkhittaṃ tāsu tāsu bhūmīsu āgatena pākaṭena akappiyānulomena niddisitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1639_0: “Anuññātañca paṭikkhittañca katamena niddisitabba”nti vattabbattā “anuññātañca paṭikkhittañca tadubhayena niddisitabba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1639_1: Yasmiṃ yasmiṃ sutte anuññātañca paṭikkhittañca āgataṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1639_2: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sutte āgatena tadubhayena niddisitabbaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1640_1: Yasmiṃ yasmiṃ sutte yā yā pasaṃsā āgatā,
tika-s0501t0:1640_2: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sutte āgatāya tāya tāya pasaṃsāya thavo niddisitabbo.
tika-s0501t0:1640_4: so thavo katividhena niddisitabbo”ti vattabbattā “so pañcavidhenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1640_5: Bhagavato thavo ca dhammassa thavo ca ariyasaṅghassa thavo ca ariyadhammānaṃ sikkhāya thavo ca lokiyaguṇasampattiyā thavo cāti pañcavidhena veditabbo.
tika-s0501t0:1640_6: Iti evaṃ vuttappakārena pañcavidhena thavo niddisitabbo.
tika-s0501t0:1641_0: Amhākācariya amhākācariyena aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā sāsanapaṭṭhāne daṭṭhabbāti vuttā,
tika-s0501t0:1641_2: Sāsanapaṭṭhāne indriyabhūmi saddhindriyādiindriyabhūmi yehi navahi padehi niddisitabbā,
tika-s0501t0:1641_3: sāsanapaṭṭhāne kilesabhūmi yehi navahi padehi niddisitabbā,
tika-s0501t0:1641_4: evaṃ iminā pakārena etāni mūlapadāni nava padāni kusalapadāni,
tika-s0501t0:1641_5: nava padāni akusalapadānīti aṭṭhārasa mūlapadāni honti.
tika-s0501t0:1641_7: “kena kāraṇena aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā sāsanapaṭṭhāne daṭṭhabbāti viññāyatī”ti vattabbattā “tathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1641_8: Tathā hīti tato eva aṭṭhārasamūlapadānaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhāne daṭṭhabbattā “aṭṭhārasa mūlapadā kuhiṃ daṭṭhabbā?
tika-s0501t0:1641_11: “Kena mūlapadānaṃ navakusalapadanavaakusalapadabhāvena aṭṭhārasabhāvo viññāyatī”ti vattabbattā “tenāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1642_0: “Navahi ca padehi kusalā, navahi ca yujjanti akusalapakkhā;
tika-s0501t0:1643_0: Ete kho mūlapadā, bhavanti aṭṭhārasa padānī”ti. –
tika-s0501t0:1644_2: padānī”ti vacanena mūlapadānaṃ navakusalapadanavaakusalapadabhāvena aṭṭhārasabhāvo viññāyatīti.
tika-s0501t0:1645_0: “Yaṃ yaṃ saṃkilesabhāgiyādisoḷasavidhaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānañceva yaṃ yaṃ lokiyādiaṭṭhavīsatividhaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānañca ācariyena niddhāritaṃ,
tika-s0501t0:1645_2: aññaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ niddhāretvā yuttaṃ yujjitabbaṃ natthī”ti vattabbattā “niyuttaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1645_3: Yathāniddhāritasāsanapaṭṭhānato yaṃ yaṃ aññaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ niddhāritaṃ atthi,
tika-s0501t0:1645_4: taṃ taṃ aññaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhānaṃ niyuttaṃ yathārahaṃ niddhāretvā yuttaṃ yujjitabbanti attho gahetabboti.
tika-s0501t0:1646_6: mūlasaṅgītiyaṃ saṅgāyantehi therāsabhehi yā netti saṅgītā,
tika-s0501t0:1646_8: niyuttaṃ sāsanapaṭṭhāna”nti ettāvatā vacanakkamena samattā paripuṇṇāva hoti.
tika-s0501t0:1647_0: Iti samattāya āyasmatā mahākaccānena bhāsitāya bhagavatā anumoditāya mūlasaṅgītiyaṃ saṅgāyantehi therāsabhehi
tika-s0501t0:1647_1: saṅgītāya nettiyā atthavaṇṇanā saddhammapālanāmena mahādhammarājagurunā mahātherena racitā jinaputtānaṃ
tika-s0501t0:1647_2: hitakarā nettivibhāvanā chabbīsādhikanavasate sakkarāje sāvaṇamāse sukkapakkhe navamadivase sūriyuggamanasamaye samattā.
tika-s0501t0:1654_0: Dvisahassaṃ yadā pattaṃ, nimmalaṃ vaḍḍhanaṃ subhaṃ.
tika-s0501t0:1661_0: Yattakaṃ sāsanaṃ ṭhitaṃ, tattakaṃ racitaṃ mayā;
tika-s0501t0:1663_0: Iti taṃ racayantena, puññaṃ adhigataṃ mayā;
tika-s0501t0:1666_0: Sabbe rajjasukhe ṭhatvā, carantu caritaṃ sukhī.
tika-s0501t0:1667_0: Devo kāle suvassatu, sabbo raṭṭhajano sukhī;
